data.what_is:
Insider--a single platform for building individualized, cross-channel experiences--enables enterprise marketers to connect customer data across channels and systems, predict their future behavior with an AI intent engine, and build individualized customer experiences. Marketers use Insider's platform to deliver consistent and engaging experiences across Web, App, Web Push, Email, SMS, WhatsApp Commerce, and more.

Having recently unlocked unicorn status, Insider was also congratulated by NASDAQ for becoming one of the only woman-founded, women-led B2B SaaS unicorns in the world. Insider was named a leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Personalization Engines 2023, The Forrester Wave for Cross-Channel Campaign Management 2021, IDC MarketScape WorldWide Omni-Channel Marketing Platforms for B2C Enterprises 2023 Assessment, and IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Customer Data Platforms Focused on Front-Office Users 2021-22 Vendor Assessment. The company has been named the #6 Best Software Company in the world, according to G2's Spring'23 reports. Insider is also the #1 G2 Leader in 6+ categories, including Customer Data Platforms (CDP), Personalization Engines, Personalization Software, Mobile Marketing, Customer Journey Analytics, and E-commerce Personalization. CrunchBase recently ranked Insider's co-founder and CEO Hande Cilingir as one of the top women CEOs outside the US. 

One-third of Fortune 500 companies and top brands across retail, automotive, and travel choose Insider to deliver AI-led personalized experiences that exceed customer expectations. Insider is trusted by over 1,200 global businesses, including Singapore Airlines, Estee Lauder, Virgin, Toyota, New Balance, IKEA, GAP, L'Oreal, Samsung, Vodafone, Allianz, Santander, BBVA, Pizza Hut, Newsweek, MediaMarkt, Nissan, AVIS, MAC, Marks & Spencer, Madeira Madeira, Avon, and CNN.
data.product_description: Insider is the first integrated Growth Management Platform helping digital marketers drive growth across the funnel, from Acquisition to Activation, Retention, and Revenue from a unified platform powered by Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

initial_reviews.review_title: Revenue is all time high, thanks to Insider personalization capabilities
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Having a wide range of products and categories, it wasn't easy for us to introduce our customers to new products as most of them generally come with a particular product on their mind they want to buy. That's when we came across Insider's Social Proof feature which allowed them to view how many other customers have purchased the product they were looking to buy.
It also enabled them to see the number of people viewing the same product in real-time. Implementing this solution we were able to inculcate trust in our customers, which led to a massive hike in our revenue. Really impressed with the fact that the integration process was quite easy and fast.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It could've been better if the panel could offer localized language support. Other than that, we have found it to be very useful and rich in functionalities. Great team, amazing tool.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're an ecom company and it's because of Insider that we have achieved so much and that too in such a short span of time. We are able to not only meet the expectations of our customers but surpass them and it wouldn't have been possible without Insider.

initial_reviews.review_title: Insider's products uplifted our CR by 30%
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider helped us track each visitor's purchasing habits, interactions with the brand, and their likelihood to convert and use that information to create 1:1 experiences for each visitor. As we wanted to improve the experience for our app users as well, we used their ready-to-use in-app templates. These templates made our mobile application look more appealing to them and enabled us to personalize content and product recommendations based on specific needs and interests of each unique user. In a short span of time, we were able to boost our app retention rates and uplift conversions by 30%. As we had a large set of customer databases, we needed a solution that could enable us to send personalized emails to our inactive users and encourage them to visit our website and app. Glad that Insider's email and SMS did a wonderful job and we were able to reach out to create different segments for existing, churned, and potential customers in no time using AI and reach out to them with appropriate messaging.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing at the moment. The platform really surpassed our expectations and helped us achieve more than we anticipated. We're really impressed with the Insider products as well as their support team and we'd love to continue this partnership in the future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Earlier, we were struggling to gain understanding of each website and app user and because of this it was a challenge for us to create personalized experiences. When Insider came into the picture, everything seemed so easy. Leveraging their products and expertise of their team, we were able to create individualized experiences, widen our audience reach, bring back churned users, and delight our existing customers. Overall, the results have been amazing. High CR, high engagement, high retention, and app/web personalization are some of the achievements we've been able to make after parting with Insider. Would love to use their other products and recommend this platform to others as well.

initial_reviews.review_title: Drastically improved our marketing strategies with Insider's cross-channel orchestrator, Architect
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our marketers managed marketing campaigns more accurately after integrating with Architect's AI and Machine Learning capabilities. The tool provided us with some crucial information about our customers' behavior based on their browsing habits, product viewing habits, and more. With the use of these insights, we were able to target our marketing suggestions to them in accordance with what could appeal to them. We were able to boost engagement across multiple channels using Architect and by using multiple templates of theirs.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Working with Architect first seemed a little hard to us due to its extensive library of pre-built templates, segmentation tools, and channels to use but with patience and the Insider team's assistance, we integrate effectively and begin going right away.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Due to sub-par marketing tactics, our brand needed to gain a competitive edge. However, since AI and machine learning technologies supported Insider's Architect tool, it allowed our marketers to quickly construct experiences using pre-built templates for the most frequently explored routes. Now our marketers could build and work on better marketing techniques as they were getting precise insights about our customer's behavior, which eventually helped our brand recommend better products and increase our sales growth.

initial_reviews.review_title: Pushing our way to higher conversion rates with Insider's Web push
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is one of the best tools out there for web and app push. There segmentation capabilities help us deploy relevant campaigns to the right audience easily. We have been able to nudge customers make a purchase with pushes like price alerts and back in stock alerts. Our conversions and recovered revenue rates have gone up since implementing some of these campaigns.
Cart abandonment and browse abandonment web pushes have been two of our most successful campaigns with highest conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Would be great if we can have visualized reporting that can help us tie together some of these revenue metrics.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were initially a little skeptical about web push as a channel owing to opt-in mandates and other reasons. With Insider coming into the picture, we are more than happy and confident that we made the right decision. I can say that we finally found the best product for web push with standout features that help us manage opt-ins and optimize these campaigns for engagement without spamming our users.

initial_reviews.review_title: 134% increase in session duration with Insider's mobile banner overlay
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers a diverse range of flexible, easy-to-use templates to make our website more interactive for our users. We use web push, the spinning wheel, and their banner overlay templates to build a completely engaging website experience for our users. With the banner overlay, for instance, we were able to achieve a significant increase in session duration of 134%.

We have observed that using Insider, web push has become an important channel for us which enables us to re-engage our website visitors and bring them back. By being able to automate our push notifications, Insider has helped us become more efficient than ever, while also delivering results that are promising. Using their web push, too, we got some desirable campaign results, contributing to almost 2% of our total traffic.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's panel show's real time results and data from each campaign. However, the data is a bit hard to understand without further information or explanation on the panel. Most of the time we rely on the consultant to help us understand where the numbers coming from. Would appreciate if the panel is a little easier to decipher for ourselves so we can be more self served.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to increase and improve the traffic and its quality coming into our website. We also needed solutions to help us increase the exposure for our marketing campaigns and better user engagement. Insider's web push solved the problem of traffic for us, and their onsite templates like the banner overlay and spinning wheel solved the problem of improving user engagement and retention.

initial_reviews.review_title: Conversion rate improved by 15% with Insider's omnichannel marketing automation tool, Architect
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Teaming up with Insider has been tremendously advantageous for our business. From the
moment we began utilizing Insider's app push notifications for our university's growth initiatives,
their dedicated growth team has consistently provided invaluable support with personalized
guidance. Their commitment to our success is truly commendable.

In particular, Insider's personalized communication through Course Application Reminder
notifications has proven highly effective in not only helping us achieve our recruitment goals but
also enhancing the engagement and conversion of potential applicants. The strategic
implementation of these notifications has significantly contributed to our overall success in
attracting qualified candidates.

With Insider's Journey Builder 360, we enjoyed a bird's eye view of our potential enrollers' onsite
experience. This helped us address their pain points and highlight our offerings as a University
up a notch. Insider's exclusive WhatsApp recommendations enabled us to approach student
recruitment through multiple channels easily.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's tools and products have predominantly catered to retail businesses. Certain
implementations took a little longer to come through than expected. This was totally
understandable and we had all the help we needed from Insider's service team to resolve the
problems at hand.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
To attain the objective of maximum engagement, we were in search of a comprehensive web
suite or platform that would suit our needs to a tee. This is when we decided to use Insider's
WhatsApp templates and Architect tool features. Insider's WhatsApp product in conjunction
with their marketing automation tool, Architect allowed us to create highly personalized
WhatsApp campaigns tailored to individual user preferences. In just the first 3 months of
working with Insider, we managed to override our own expectations and clocked in 2X ROI when
the target ROI was set at 1X. Insider also offered us extensive support for various campaign types, including promotional,
triggered, and transactional campaigns, and provided us with a range of templates that align
with our specific campaign objectives. Among these templates, we particularly favor the CTA
template and conversational template, as they enable us to deliver a more engaging and
interactive onsite experience to our target audience. The result of this was a 15% boost in 15%
in conversion rates.

The intuitive journey builder canvas and 70+ pre-built templates for various use cases.

Detailed analytics provided clear visibility into channel performance boosting conversions by 40% and ROI by 5X within 2 months.
The AI-led predictive intelligence helped engage users contextually at the right moments to influence purchase behavior.

initial_reviews.review_title: Insider increased our conversion rates by 17%, maximized ROI by 5x
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What we liked the most about Insider is that the Growth Management Platform offers excellent solutions for businesses of all sizes and industries. Another factor that sets Insider apart from its competitors is their highly supportive and experienced customer support team, which is always available to assist their partners in navigating even the most challenging business issues.

We're glad that with this platform, we were able to not only provide our customers with a delightful experience but also generate 5X more ROI, drive more conversions, and improve overall business profitability.

What do you dislike about Insider?
So far, we have used Insider's Mobile App, Eureka, Web Suite, and InStory tools and have seen

tremendous growth in our business' bottom line. We'd love to leverage their other tools in the near future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an online beauty and hygiene brand, our goal was to effectively promote our new product launches to our valued customers. To achieve this, we needed a solution that could captivate our target audience's attention, enhance product visibility, and present our products in engaging and interactive formats. The Growth Consultants at Insider provided a brilliant suggestion: implementing their InStory tool to transform our product presentations into captivating social media-like stories on our

They also advised us to incorporate gamified templates into both our website and mobile applications. As suggested, we introduced 'Spin the Wheel' on both platforms, providing our website visitors and app users an opportunity to win exciting discount coupons. The results were remarkable - our engagement rates surged, and conversion rates saw a 10% increase. All thanks to Insider's InStory campaigns and gamification strategy.

We also leveraged their Eureka feature to personalize the search experience for our website visitors and mobile app users, helping them to discover their most desired products more swiftly. This strategic implementation propelled our conversion rates, achieving an impressive 17% boost and maximizing our overall business' ROI.

initial_reviews.review_title: 45% reduction in bounce rates
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using the CDP, Architect, and Mobile App by Insider and Mobile App is our favorite hands down. It totally transformed the look and feel of our mobile store front. InStory's attractive visuals ensured customers spent time exploring our store. The pop of attractive discounts at checkout using Smart Overlays ensured higher average order values.
Customers finally started spending time on our app, enjoyed the immersive experiences of the newly revamped storefront using Insider Mobile App and our bounce rates reduced by a whopping 90%.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The ease with which one can use Insider tools is simply amazing. Absolutely no tech support required and campaigns can be launched with the blink of an eye.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our mobile storefront was not the most appealing and user-friendly to say the least. We were rather embarrassed and no wonder the bounce rates were extremely high. This is when we asked Insider to step in and take charge. First they suggested we use the Mobile App channel to make our mobile store appealing and user-friendly.
Next we leveraged the Architect and CDP to centralize all customer data at one place and track the entire customer journey. This helped identify the loopholes and plug them. Our bounce rate slashed down by 90%, average order value increased, and our customer engagement was at an all time high.

initial_reviews.review_title: 38% Increase in customer retention with Insider.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The growth managers and support team at Insider is the best thing we liked about Insider. We kept adding new products to our catalog every 15 days but were still experiencing high customer churn. This is when the growth managers suggested we use the Customer Data Platform, Architect, and Mobile App by Insider. Architect tracked the customer journey across all touch points and helped us run consistent campaigns across channels and improve visibility.
The CDP helped us get a 360 degree view of all customer data at one place which was siloed earlier and identify the triggers behind the churn. Using the Mobile App we were able to fix the pain points and enhance user experience. Within a month we saw a significant decline in customer churn and a 28% increase in customer retention rate.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The growth managers at Insider truly work as your own team and come up with solutions that deliver remarkable results.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a retail business, we have a wide array of products, new product launches every fortnight, and really great deals to offer our customers. But despite so many things going good for us our customer churn was a bit too much and that hurt.  This is when we approached Insider and they helped us solve the most pressing issues systematically one at a time. First they suggested implementing CDP so that we could have a single source of customer data which was earlier siloed.
This helped us identify the triggers that lead to disengagement and subsequent churn.

Next was the Architect, which tracked all customer touchpoints. We soon realized that our mobile store front did not deliver a user-friendly experience and customers often failed to find what they were looking for.
This is when we utilized the Mobile App tool by Insider and transformed the look and feel of our mobile store front and there has been no looking back since. Our customer churn is at an all-time low, in fact insignificant and the customer retention is up by 28%.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Smart Recommender offered a wide variety of recommendation algorithms that optimized product suggestions for our users. This ensured that the right products were displayed to the appropriate audience, significantly boosting our conversions and sales.

Additionally, by integrating its capabilities with the Email and Web Suite, we doubled the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. With the double opt-in, we verified user authenticity, ensuring if they genuinely wanted to receive communications. This prevented us from spamming our users with unwanted content.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider support team is very responsive and highly knowledgeable. We have a wide range of products and services and the Insider's team assisted us at every step.

Our campaign ROI was not as we had expected. Insider helped us orchestrate a data-driven buying experience for our users by predicting buyer behavior and placing relevant complementary recommendations across different touchpoints. These recommendations were also auto-optimized, leading to improved conversion rates.

The Smart Recommendation, combined with predictive segmentation, was extremely effective and helped us hyper-target our users. Behavioral targeting allowed us to better understand customer behavior and make decisions accordingly.

The Web Suite's Cookieless Personalization was also a significant advantage.

initial_reviews.review_title: Insider delivers the best marketing automation experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Before we began using Insider's tools, our website and app had low engagement, and giving each visitor a personalized experience was a distant dream. We needed help determining what was going wrong or where people lost interest. Insider's growth managers suggested using  their Web Suite, Architect, and Customer Data Platform tools, and things turned around.

Using Architect's dynamic traffic allocation, we can automatically assign traffic based on channel engagement and performance. Now, we can reach our users through channels like Web push, WhatsApp, SMS, and email at the right moment in their buying journey. This change has greatly improved our growth in subscribers and increased our sales, and we don't think there's another platform out there that could have done it as smoothly as Insider did.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider has everything we need, whether it's something big or even the tiniest details to help us meet our goals.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As mentioned, we were dealing with a low engagement issue and tried many tools, but we needed an innovative approach. Here we would like to take a minute and praise the Insider's support team. These guys are incredibly polite and patient no matter what's the issue. Following their advice, we used their web tools to improve the look of our website. Also, we used their dynamic category optimizer to make category search seamless for our potential customers.

It worked like a charm! The CDP tool helped us gather information about our customers (from both online and offline sources) and improved our data collection. Working with Insider really improved our marketing campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: Eureka's personalized customer experience increased ROI by 20%
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
After integrating Insider's online personalization tools, our ROI increased by 20%. We selected their Web Suite, Smart Recommender, and Eureka tools. Features of Eureka, such as Search Keyword Preview, Search Relevance, and Localization, were instrumental in marketing and attracting new customers. We efficiently reached a broader target audience in a shorter time, promoting our supplemental products and offering tailored experiences to potential customers.

The Web Suite's gamified templates boosted our customer growth and effectively optimized our CAC. Of all the features, the interactive coupon placement stood out, enhancing our gross profit margin and average order value.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We really love how Insider transformed our retail brand website into an interactive and user-friendly platform. Working with Insider was our best decision. We highly recommend them.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We aimed to offer a more personalized experience to our retail customers. Insider's product suite met these needs and entirely transformed our customer experience.

Individualized customer journey
Using Insider's segmentation, dynamic content, user attributes, and product attributes, we were able to truly individualize customer journeys for different personas.

Better product discovery
The Smart Recommender engine enhanced product discovery by presenting users with items they'd likely appreciate. By utilizing different AI algorithms on various website pages, we observed significant positive outcomes.
Improved search recommendations
Eureka enabled us to designate specific keywords and phrases for customer searches. This ensured that our customers could swiftly and effortlessly locate the products and information they were looking for.

initial_reviews.review_title: 70% ATC lift with Insider's marketing suite
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using many tools from Insider such as Onsite, WebPush, and Smart Recommender. Though all the tools we have used are best in their own right and we intend to use a couple of more tools in the near future, my personal favorite is the Smart Recommender. It's truly transformed the user experience, and now we are able to showcase exactly what they wish to see which nudges their sweet spot and we are able to get conversions in a jiffy.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Understanding the capability of various tools and utilizing them to their full potential sometime, however the Insider support team helped us navigate through these and in a short span of time we were able to leverage the tools to our advantage.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had unsatisfactory sales per click and an overall low conversion rate. By utilizing Onsite, Web push, and Smart Recommender by Insider we were able to get a 2% uplift in conversion rate, a 70% uplift in add to cart rates, and an incremental revenue of 33k. The benefits have been far too many, and we are looking forward to using some more tools from Insider.

initial_reviews.review_title: Boosted customer engagement and conversions with Insider Web Suite
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's web suite helped jazz up our website and add smart banners tailored according to the users past browsing history and buying behavior. Since what they saw was of interest to them they ended up spending more time on the website. The recommendation feature by Insider displayed related and alternate budget friendly product options . This ensured that a majority of visitors converted to actual buyers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
All in all we are very happy with Insider's Web suite and Recommender. Infact, we are planning to tinker with some more of their products.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had many people visiting our website and app but very few actually converted. This is when we realized that something was amiss, probably lack of personalization and difficulty in finding products from our humongous catalog. Insider's web suite and recommender helped overcome both these challenges and we witnessed a significant boost in conversions within two weeks.

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect fit for your App SDK to activate new users and improve retention
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is more than just a platform that helps us achieve our targets, they truly care about our continued success. Ever since we started leveraging Insider's app push notifications, the growth team at Insider always supported us with all the relevant items whenever we needed help. Insider's Cart Reminder Push Notifications proved to be highly effective in helping us realize our revenue goals and improving the retention of our mobile app users.

And, their exclusive in-app recommendations helped us revamp our merchandising strategy with impressive results.

What do you dislike about Insider?
So far, Insider has been able to demonstrate tremendous results for the use cases that we've deployed. We're really thrilled to see and explore other AI-backed micro-segmentation strategies we could adopt to boost the results further.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our objective when we onboarded Insider was to build a comprehensive App Engagement strategy to hyper-personalize every interaction with the brand within and outside the website. Insider helped us design highly-tailored mobile app experiences based on user behaviour, and attributes to improve retention and revenue. We leveraged a combination of various behavioural and time-based mobile app push notifications orchestrated to deliver a unique experience and achieve their specific goals--including first-time purchases and reactivation. And, we also adopted specific recommendation strategies for different app pages, that helped improve the discoverability of items for the users.

initial_reviews.review_title: The Ferrari of CRO tools
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
When choosing a data tool, Insider is the one you need to look at. With Insiders help, we can communicate with customers and organize them into segments based on their interests. We can test different variations of our website and see which works best. Also, it's great that we don't have to import any data because the templates make it easy to change the designs on our website. If we don't understand something about our results, the support team always helps us solve our questions without a fuss.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Insider interface is not very intuitive.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to drive more sales through a better customer conversion rate. Thanks to Insider's conversion suite and web push notifications tools, we implemented a campaign on our web homepage that displayed personalized recommendations. This campaign significantly increased our customer conversion rate, which means more purchases and good sales. We also wanted to ensure that visitors didn't leave the site without seeing all of our products, so Insider's scroll tracking tool helped us track where visitors did and didn't scroll down.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Product Owner - Media & Acquisition (TikTok, YouTube, Google, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest)

initial_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us discover our perfect customers from the big audience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing about our Insider experience was the segmenting capability present in the Web Suite. The ability to connect with our users online and get to know them better through Architect and tailoring customer journeys that led to conversion was very satisfying as well. The technical support we received from Insider was remarkable and helped us solve the problems that lay ahead of us, enabling us to succeed in lead generation and improve our sales too.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Not really a con, but worth mentioning that if the user cannot be identified, then the online and offline efforts of converting leads would become difficult. Improvement here will be great.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The bounce rates on our website were low. We could see that the users were interested in our blogs but weren't purchasing much. Our business happens offline, but because we couldn't identify or target individual users, our campaigns were largely unsuccessful. It was also very difficult for us to A/B test the scenarios on the web. By leveraging Insider's Web Suite and the Architect tool, we were able to collect the leads that matter and contact them offline. The conversion rate also improved by 33%, which led to a corresponding increase in our ROI for the year. Thanks to Insider, we now know exactly who among the users engaging online are interested to buy from us, and we can target them accordingly using Architect.

initial_reviews.review_title: Insider helped reduce customer churn and build loyalty
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
When customers fail to find what they are looking for, they don't come back resulting in customer churn. However the conversion suite by Insider helped us achieve the impossible, we were not only able to significantly reduce and prevent customer churn but we were also able to reactivate customers who had stopped engaging with us. Conversion suite helped us identify the reasons for the churn which helped us design appropriate campaigns which we could then run in an automated and timely manner. The insights that we gathered using the suite helped us run recommendations using Insider's smart recommender, InStory, and Emails. In short we were able to nudge our customers at multiple touchpoints and show them what they wanted to see.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Understanding Insider tools and utilizing them to their full potential takes time given the plethora of features they come loaded with. However, the growth team at Insider understands what we need and proactively recommends what needs to be done to realize the full potential. I will happily recommend Insider to others.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the last six months or so we saw customer churn at an unprecedented rate. The Insider team suggested we use their conversion suite to identify where the leak is and plug it. We are happy to report that the insider's conversion suite turned tables around within a few days and there has been no looking back since.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Choosing Insider was our best business decision. From integrating their tools to using them, the entire process was smooth. We picked tools like Email, SMS, and Eureka, which helped us drive high sales and achieve our targets. Using AI-powered Eureka tools, we were able to deliver personalized recommendations to our customers, which ultimately boosted our engagement rates and helped us achieve high ROI.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Insider support team is proactive. Their tools enabled us to deliver our trendsetting products to the right customers at the right time. We would be more than happy to recommend them.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Low customer engagement was a major concern for our company. Multiple marketing campaigns were ineffective in boosting the engagement rates of our fashion products and accessories. However, switching to Insider changed everything. First, we used their solutions desktop web and mobile web, to improve the UX of the website. SMS, Email, and Eureka helped us to deliver personalized experiences to our customers across different channels.We knew exactly what to send and when to send to our customers. The messages we sent were what they wanted to see. In just three months, we made more sales, our customer attrition was at an all time low, and retention at an all time high. It's all thanks to Insider.

initial_reviews.review_title: Customer loyalty was increased through efficient retargeting and personalization suite of Insider
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Choosing a favorite is difficult. We love the entire Insider suite of products. Being in the banking sector keeping our customers informed, transparency, and building trust is the top priority. Insider helped us achieve this and more. As a result, through word of mouth and positive feedback by our existing customers we were able to acquire nearly 50% more customers than what we usually do in a month.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes creating campaigns weren't as easy as we thought that it would beans the platform isn't as DIY (Do-it-yourself) as it initially seemed. However, the team ensured that this wouldn't be a problem for us. Our interaction with Insider has been wonderful thus far. The service of Insider has been nothing but an absolute delight!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were juggling multiple marketing campaigns at once, which was consuming a lot of our time and energy. Unfortunately, neither the conversion rates nor the value of the basket increased. We employed the Conversion suite for desktop, mobile, and web push, with the assistance of the Insider team. Through Insider's web suite, we have been able to considerably increase conversion rates since we began working with them.
Our only goal was to increase customer loyalty by using efficient push notifications to retarget customers at a time when their conversion potential is the highest. With Insider's service, we were able to build custom campaigns and discounts to advertise our campaigns to loyal customers through web push notifications, greatly raising the conversion rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Revenue is all time high, thanks to Insider personalization capabilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Having a wide range of products and categories, it wasn't easy for us to introduce our customers to new products as most of them generally come with a particular product on their mind they want to buy. That's when we came across Insider's Social Proof feature which allowed them to view how many other customers have purchased the product they were looking to buy.
It also enabled them to see the number of people viewing the same product in real-time. Implementing this solution we were able to inculcate trust in our customers, which led to a massive hike in our revenue. Really impressed with the fact that the integration process was quite easy and fast.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It could've been better if the panel could offer localized language support. Other than that, we have found it to be very useful and rich in functionalities. Great team, amazing tool.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're an ecom company and it's because of Insider that we have achieved so much and that too in such a short span of time. We are able to not only meet the expectations of our customers but surpass them and it wouldn't have been possible without Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's products uplifted our CR by 30%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider helped us track each visitor's purchasing habits, interactions with the brand, and their likelihood to convert and use that information to create 1:1 experiences for each visitor. As we wanted to improve the experience for our app users as well, we used their ready-to-use in-app templates. These templates made our mobile application look more appealing to them and enabled us to personalize content and product recommendations based on specific needs and interests of each unique user. In a short span of time, we were able to boost our app retention rates and uplift conversions by 30%. As we had a large set of customer databases, we needed a solution that could enable us to send personalized emails to our inactive users and encourage them to visit our website and app. Glad that Insider's email and SMS did a wonderful job and we were able to reach out to create different segments for existing, churned, and potential customers in no time using AI and reach out to them with appropriate messaging.

Nothing at the moment. The platform really surpassed our expectations and helped us achieve more than we anticipated. We're really impressed with the Insider products as well as their support team and we'd love to continue this partnership in the future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Earlier, we were struggling to gain understanding of each website and app user and because of this it was a challenge for us to create personalized experiences. When Insider came into the picture, everything seemed so easy. Leveraging their products and expertise of their team, we were able to create individualized experiences, widen our audience reach, bring back churned users, and delight our existing customers. Overall, the results have been amazing. High CR, high engagement, high retention, and app/web personalization are some of the achievements we've been able to make after parting with Insider. Would love to use their other products and recommend this platform to others as well.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our marketers managed marketing campaigns more accurately after integrating with Architect's AI and Machine Learning capabilities. The tool provided us with some crucial information about our customers' behavior based on their browsing habits, product viewing habits, and more. With the use of these insights, we were able to target our marketing suggestions to them in accordance with what could appeal to them. We were able to boost engagement across multiple channels using Architect and by using multiple templates of theirs.

Working with Architect first seemed a little hard to us due to its extensive library of pre-built templates, segmentation tools, and channels to use but with patience and the Insider team's assistance, we integrate effectively and begin going right away.

Due to sub-par marketing tactics, our brand needed to gain a competitive edge. However, since AI and machine learning technologies supported Insider's Architect tool, it allowed our marketers to quickly construct experiences using pre-built templates for the most frequently explored routes. Now our marketers could build and work on better marketing techniques as they were getting precise insights about our customer's behavior, which eventually helped our brand recommend better products and increase our sales growth.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is one of the best tools out there for web and app push. There segmentation capabilities help us deploy relevant campaigns to the right audience easily. We have been able to nudge customers make a purchase with pushes like price alerts and back in stock alerts. Our conversions and recovered revenue rates have gone up since implementing some of these campaigns.
Cart abandonment and browse abandonment web pushes have been two of our most successful campaigns with highest conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Would be great if we can have visualized reporting that can help us tie together some of these revenue metrics.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were initially a little skeptical about web push as a channel owing to opt-in mandates and other reasons. With Insider coming into the picture, we are more than happy and confident that we made the right decision. I can say that we finally found the best product for web push with standout features that help us manage opt-ins and optimize these campaigns for engagement without spamming our users.

all_reviews.review_title: 134% increase in session duration with Insider's mobile banner overlay
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers a diverse range of flexible, easy-to-use templates to make our website more interactive for our users. We use web push, the spinning wheel, and their banner overlay templates to build a completely engaging website experience for our users. With the banner overlay, for instance, we were able to achieve a significant increase in session duration of 134%.

We have observed that using Insider, web push has become an important channel for us which enables us to re-engage our website visitors and bring them back. By being able to automate our push notifications, Insider has helped us become more efficient than ever, while also delivering results that are promising. Using their web push, too, we got some desirable campaign results, contributing to almost 2% of our total traffic.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's panel show's real time results and data from each campaign. However, the data is a bit hard to understand without further information or explanation on the panel. Most of the time we rely on the consultant to help us understand where the numbers coming from. Would appreciate if the panel is a little easier to decipher for ourselves so we can be more self served.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to increase and improve the traffic and its quality coming into our website. We also needed solutions to help us increase the exposure for our marketing campaigns and better user engagement. Insider's web push solved the problem of traffic for us, and their onsite templates like the banner overlay and spinning wheel solved the problem of improving user engagement and retention.

all_reviews.review_title: Conversion rate improved by 15% with Insider's omnichannel marketing automation tool, Architect
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Teaming up with Insider has been tremendously advantageous for our business. From the
moment we began utilizing Insider's app push notifications for our university's growth initiatives,
their dedicated growth team has consistently provided invaluable support with personalized
guidance. Their commitment to our success is truly commendable.

In particular, Insider's personalized communication through Course Application Reminder
notifications has proven highly effective in not only helping us achieve our recruitment goals but
also enhancing the engagement and conversion of potential applicants. The strategic
implementation of these notifications has significantly contributed to our overall success in
attracting qualified candidates.

With Insider's Journey Builder 360, we enjoyed a bird's eye view of our potential enrollers' onsite
experience. This helped us address their pain points and highlight our offerings as a University
up a notch. Insider's exclusive WhatsApp recommendations enabled us to approach student
recruitment through multiple channels easily.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's tools and products have predominantly catered to retail businesses. Certain
implementations took a little longer to come through than expected. This was totally
understandable and we had all the help we needed from Insider's service team to resolve the
problems at hand.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
To attain the objective of maximum engagement, we were in search of a comprehensive web
suite or platform that would suit our needs to a tee. This is when we decided to use Insider's
WhatsApp templates and Architect tool features. Insider's WhatsApp product in conjunction
with their marketing automation tool, Architect allowed us to create highly personalized
WhatsApp campaigns tailored to individual user preferences. In just the first 3 months of
working with Insider, we managed to override our own expectations and clocked in 2X ROI when
the target ROI was set at 1X. Insider also offered us extensive support for various campaign types, including promotional,
triggered, and transactional campaigns, and provided us with a range of templates that align
with our specific campaign objectives. Among these templates, we particularly favor the CTA
template and conversational template, as they enable us to deliver a more engaging and
interactive onsite experience to our target audience. The result of this was a 15% boost in 15%
in conversion rates.

Another factor that sets Insider apart from its competitors is their highly supportive and experienced customer support team, which is always available to assist their partners in navigating even the most challenging business issues.

We're glad that with this platform, we were able to not only provide our customers with a delightful experience but also generate 5X more ROI, drive more conversions, and improve overall business profitability.

We also leveraged their Eureka feature to personalize the search experience for our website visitors and mobile app users, helping them to discover their most desired products more swiftly. all_reviews.review_title: 38% Increase in customer retention with Insider.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The growth managers and support team at Insider is the best thing we liked about Insider. We kept adding new products to our catalog every 15 days but were still experiencing high customer churn. This is when the growth managers suggested we use the Customer Data Platform, Architect, and Mobile App by Insider. Architect tracked the customer journey across all touch points and helped us run consistent campaigns across channels and improve visibility.
The CDP helped us get a 360 degree view of all customer data at one place which was siloed earlier and identify the triggers behind the churn. Using the Mobile App we were able to fix the pain points and enhance user experience. Within a month we saw a significant decline in customer churn and a 28% increase in customer retention rate.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The growth managers at Insider truly work as your own team and come up with solutions that deliver remarkable results.

This is when we approached Insider and they helped us solve the most pressing issues systematically one at a time. First they suggested implementing CDP so that we could have a single source of customer data which was earlier siloed.
This helped us identify the triggers that lead to disengagement and subsequent churn.

This is when we utilized the Mobile App tool by Insider and transformed the look and feel of our mobile store front and there has been no looking back since. Our customer churn is at an all-time low, in fact insignificant and the customer retention is up by 28%.

Insider's Smart Recommender offered a wide variety of recommendation algorithms that optimized product suggestions for our users. This ensured that the right products were displayed to the appropriate audience, significantly boosting our conversions and sales.

Additionally, by integrating its capabilities with the Email and Web Suite, we doubled the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. With the double opt-in, we verified user authenticity, ensuring if they genuinely wanted to receive communications. This prevented us from spamming our users with unwanted content.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: Insider support team is very responsive and highly knowledgeable. We have a wide range of products and services and the Insider's team assisted us at every step.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Our campaign ROI was not as we had expected. Insider helped us orchestrate a data-driven buying experience for our users by predicting buyer behavior and placing relevant complementary recommendations across different touchpoints. These recommendations were also auto-optimized, leading to improved conversion rates.

The Smart Recommendation, combined with predictive segmentation, was extremely effective and helped us hyper-target our users. Behavioral targeting allowed us to better understand customer behavior and make decisions accordingly.

The Web Suite's Cookieless Personalization was also a significant advantage.

all_reviews.review_title: Data-backed customer journeys that work
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's customer journey orchestration tool is the best in class that I have come across. It is so comprehensive and covers a wide range of channels used by most marketers worldwide. It brings together everything you need under one roof in an easy-to-use interface.
Backed by Insider's strong capabilities as a customer data platform, the journey builder tool is a winner all the way. We have consistently built customer journeys based on the data we have which shows the next best channel, and the best time, too, to ensure that the customer engages with us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The tool presents a wide range of possibilities that my team needed a little time to simply wrap their heads around everything that we can do using it.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have multiple channels of communication with our customers and it is important for us to maintain brand coherence and consistency across these, while also being there just enough and not overwhelming our customers. Insider's data-powered customer journey orchestration tool is the most thoughtfully created technology that makes it possible to create experiences that are enjoyable for our customers and prove beneficial for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider delivers the best marketing automation experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Before we began using Insider's tools, our website and app had low engagement, and giving each visitor a personalized experience was a distant dream. We needed help determining what was going wrong or where people lost interest. Insider's growth managers suggested using  their Web Suite, Architect, and Customer Data Platform tools, and things turned around.

Using Architect's dynamic traffic allocation, we can automatically assign traffic based on channel engagement and performance. Now, we can reach our users through channels like Web push, WhatsApp, SMS, and email at the right moment in their buying journey. This change has greatly improved our growth in subscribers and increased our sales, and we don't think there's another platform out there that could have done it as smoothly as Insider did.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider has everything we need, whether it's something big or even the tiniest details to help us meet our goals.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As mentioned, we were dealing with a low engagement issue and tried many tools, but we needed an innovative approach. Here we would like to take a minute and praise the Insider's support team. These guys are incredibly polite and patient no matter what's the issue. Following their advice, we used their web tools to improve the look of our website. Also, we used their dynamic category optimizer to make category search seamless for our potential customers.

It worked like a charm! The CDP tool helped us gather information about our customers (from both online and offline sources) and improved our data collection. Working with Insider really improved our marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Eureka's personalized customer experience increased ROI by 20%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
After integrating Insider's online personalization tools, our ROI increased by 20%. We selected their Web Suite, Smart Recommender, and Eureka tools. Features of Eureka, such as Search Keyword Preview, Search Relevance, and Localization, were instrumental in marketing and attracting new customers. We efficiently reached a broader target audience in a shorter time, promoting our supplemental products and offering tailored experiences to potential customers.

The Web Suite's gamified templates boosted our customer growth and effectively optimized our CAC. Of all the features, the interactive coupon placement stood out, enhancing our gross profit margin and average order value.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We really love how Insider transformed our retail brand website into an interactive and user-friendly platform. Working with Insider was our best decision. We highly recommend them.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We aimed to offer a more personalized experience to our retail customers. Insider's product suite met these needs and entirely transformed our customer experience.

Individualized customer journey
Using Insider's segmentation, dynamic content, user attributes, and product attributes, we were able to truly individualize customer journeys for different personas.

Better product discovery
The Smart Recommender engine enhanced product discovery by presenting users with items they'd likely appreciate. By utilizing different AI algorithms on various website pages, we observed significant positive outcomes.
Improved search recommendations
Eureka enabled us to designate specific keywords and phrases for customer searches. This ensured that our customers could swiftly and effortlessly locate the products and information they were looking for.

all_reviews.review_title: 70% ATC lift with Insider's marketing suite
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using many tools from Insider such as Onsite, WebPush, and Smart Recommender. Though all the tools we have used are best in their own right and we intend to use a couple of more tools in the near future, my personal favorite is the Smart Recommender. It's truly transformed the user experience, and now we are able to showcase exactly what they wish to see which nudges their sweet spot and we are able to get conversions in a jiffy.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Understanding the capability of various tools and utilizing them to their full potential sometime, however the Insider support team helped us navigate through these and in a short span of time we were able to leverage the tools to our advantage.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had unsatisfactory sales per click and an overall low conversion rate. By utilizing Onsite, Web push, and Smart Recommender by Insider we were able to get a 2% uplift in conversion rate, a 70% uplift in add to cart rates, and an incremental revenue of 33k. The benefits have been far too many, and we are looking forward to using some more tools from Insider.

all_reviews.review_content:

Insider's web suite helped jazz up our website and add smart banners tailored according to the users past browsing history and buying behavior. Since what they saw was of interest to them they ended up spending more time on the website. The recommendation feature by Insider displayed related and alternate budget friendly product options . This ensured that a majority of visitors converted to actual buyers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
All in all we are very happy with Insider's Web suite and Recommender. Infact, we are planning to tinker with some more of their products.

We had many people visiting our website and app but very few actually converted. This is when we realized that something was amiss, probably lack of personalization and difficulty in finding products from our humongous catalog. Insider's web suite and recommender helped overcome both these challenges and we witnessed a significant boost in conversions within two weeks.

And, we also adopted specific recommendation strategies for different app pages, that helped improve the discoverability of items for the users.

all_reviews.review_content:

When choosing a data tool, Insider is the one you need to look at. With Insiders help, we can communicate with customers and organize them into segments based on their interests. We also wanted to ensure that visitors didn't leave the site without seeing all of our products, so Insider's scroll tracking tool helped us track where visitors did and didn't scroll down.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us discover our perfect customers from the big audience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing about our Insider experience was the segmenting capability present in the Web Suite. The ability to connect with our users online and get to know them better through Architect and tailoring customer journeys that led to conversion was very satisfying as well. The technical support we received from Insider was remarkable and helped us solve the problems that lay ahead of us, enabling us to succeed in lead generation and improve our sales too.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Not really a con, but worth mentioning that if the user cannot be identified, then the online and offline efforts of converting leads would become difficult. Improvement here will be great.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The bounce rates on our website were low. We could see that the users were interested in our blogs but weren't purchasing much. Our business happens offline, but because we couldn't identify or target individual users, our campaigns were largely unsuccessful. It was also very difficult for us to A/B test the scenarios on the web. By leveraging Insider's Web Suite and the Architect tool, we were able to collect the leads that matter and contact them offline. The conversion rate also improved by 33%, which led to a corresponding increase in our ROI for the year. Thanks to Insider, we now know exactly who among the users engaging online are interested to buy from us, and we can target them accordingly using Architect.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped reduce customer churn and build loyalty
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
When customers fail to find what they are looking for, they don't come back resulting in customer churn. However the conversion suite by Insider helped us achieve the impossible, we were not only able to significantly reduce and prevent customer churn but we were also able to reactivate customers who had stopped engaging with us. Conversion suite helped us identify the reasons for the churn which helped us design appropriate campaigns which we could then run in an automated and timely manner. The insights that we gathered using the suite helped us run recommendations using Insider's smart recommender, InStory, and Emails. In short we were able to nudge our customers at multiple touchpoints and show them what they wanted to see.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Understanding Insider tools and utilizing them to their full potential takes time given the plethora of features they come loaded with. However, the growth team at Insider understands what we need and proactively recommends what needs to be done to realize the full potential. I will happily recommend Insider to others.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the last six months or so we saw customer churn at an unprecedented rate. The Insider team suggested we use their conversion suite to identify where the leak is and plug it. We are happy to report that the insider's conversion suite turned tables around within a few days and there has been no looking back since.

all_reviews.review_content:

We offer a vast product catalog, with numerous items across categories and sub-categories. Presenting these products on our website in a manner that makes them easily discoverable for our customers was daunting. However, the Insider team went above and beyond to support our objectives. We adopted several tools, including Email, WhatsApp, SMS, Eureka, and Mobile App.

Of these, Eureka's AI-powered Search Recommendations feature stood out. It tailored search outcomes for every shopper based on their previous interests and anticipated behaviors, providing AI-driven search results and suggestions. This enhanced the customer experience and had a positive impact on our sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing we dislike about working with Insider. Their support team is responsive and friendly. We would highly recommend them.

We wanted to improve our email campaign click-through rates, but we lacked the necessary resources and expertise. all_reviews.review_title: Witnessed an uplift in conversion rates on email campaigns that were powered by Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been working with Insider for the past 6-7 months now and what we really like about the platform is that it's capable of showing results from the first month itself. We believe it's all because of their time that works 24*7 to make the tool implementation process faster.
We've been able to show personalized emails to boost engagement and conversions for a wide variety of use cases thanks to Insider's exhaustive pre-built template store. Their template store has been extremely helpful in allowing us to get started pretty quickly with creating personalized campaigns for different user segments.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing specific that we can point out here, but one thing we'd like to add is in the initial stage, it's sometimes difficult to get used to the platform. But with some frequent training sessions from the experts and continuous support from the customer success team, understanding all the features of the platform becomes easy.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were finding it difficult to engage with our inactive and churned users. That's why we need a solution that could help us bring back those users to our website, and keep them engaged and retained. Thus, to re-develop interest among them, we decided to use email as a channel to communicate with them. It took us a few days to decide which platform we should use and then we came to know about Insider.
With the help of their Digital Growth team, we were able to create segmented email campaigns as well as newsletters. Given that all these campaigns were highly personalized, we observed a good opt-in rate. Not just that, we also achieved a conversion rate slightly higher than that we used to receive from the website.

all_reviews.review_title: Consistent growth in CTR and website revenue using Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is a very potent, all-in-one platform that functions smoothly like clockwork. It has proven highly capable and effective for us, and we have witnessed consistent growth in CTR using their Smart Recommender. Revenue from these clicks make up almost 24% of the overall website revenue, so we are quite happy with the growth we have achieved using Insider.

The team has also been very helpful in shaping an O2O strategy that works. The biggest advantage that we have had from using Insider is how we now have to use only one platform to carry out many different marketing functions as opposed to separate individual tools that are hard to keep track of. By eliminating these silos in our work flow, Insider has effectively made our marketing team more productive and efficient.

Insider's Customer Data Platform has helped us integrate data that existed in silos and bring it into one central location from where we could gain actionable insights to launch campaigns across channels. The CDP has been central to all our business functions and has helped us improve the cross-channel experience for our users.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It takes a fair amount of back and forth between our team and Insider's to finalize email campaigns. This is something we would like to see improved. It would be great if we're able to build campaigns on our without needing too much support.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to decrease bounce rate and capture our user data better to bring them into our marketing funnels. Earlier, without Insider, we were losing a lot of website traffic simply because we didn't have the means to follow up with them. Insider has been amazing in helping us sort this out and create effective customer journey flows that are peppered with personalized elements that convince and convert at every step along the way

all_reviews.review_title: 10% increase in conversion rates with AI-powered personalized product recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We wanted to dive deep into growth possibilities by offering highly personalized recommendations on each page for our users. With Insider's flexible Smart Recommender, we are able to place these recommendations in different ways according to different page layouts, and target users with the most relevant products related to their queries. Through these recommendations, we achieved a 7-8% uplift in CR. We look forward to the CRM integration with Insider and 91APP in the near future to achieve even more accurate onsite recommendation and use case.

We also used the hello bar to alert users of important updates, delivery information, and more. Even this resulted in an increase in CR and AOV. We also really appreciated the pop up message that triggered at the checkout page that helped us increase LINE account users significantly.

The Customer Support provided by Insider's Account Management team was also really valuable.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We struggled a little bit with the Insider's panel at first with its comprehensive functions. Insider provided instruction videos instead of written articles/ instructions that we did not find too helpful.

Customized features also took some time to communicate and discuss with the customer success team. So it took us some time to get a hang of some of the products.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main goal was to simply offer deep personalized experiences to our users in the best way we could. Insider's Smart Recommender made it unbelievably easy for us to do so. In a matter of a few clicks, we are able to set up highly relevant and intelligent recommendations on any page, anywhere we want. There is never a doubt about the relevance of these recommendations, and we have gotten good results, with a 10% increase in conversions and a boost in AOV because of these.

We also used the hello bar to alert users of important updates, delivery information, and more. Even this resulted in an increase in CR and AOV. We also really appreciated the pop up message that triggered at the checkout page that helped us increase LINE account users significantly.

The Customer Support provided by Insider's Account Management team was also really valuable.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer:
We struggled a little bit with the Insider's panel at first with its comprehensive functions. Insider provided instruction videos instead of written articles/ instructions that we did not find too helpful.

Customized features also took some time to communicate and discuss with the customer success team. So it took us some time to get a hang of some of the products.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our main goal was to simply offer deep personalized experiences to our users in the best way we could. Insider's Smart Recommender made it unbelievably easy for us to do so. In a matter of a few clicks, we are able to set up highly relevant and intelligent recommendations on any page, anywhere we want. There is never a doubt about the relevance of these recommendations, and we have gotten good results, with a 10% increase in conversions and a boost in AOV because of these.

This technique ensured that we boost conversions and revenues while seeing a 27X ROI in 6 months.

We also love the Call an API channel on Architect that allows us to extend our messaging to other non-native channels like Line and VIber - allowing us to create true omnichannel CX.
We also love the Insider team throughout - and they're always super supportive.

What do you dislike about Insider?

This empowers our business to make data-driven decisions that optimize website elements and user journeys, ultimately driving higher conversion rates.

It's also a comprehensive platform that helped us revamp our website from start to finish which uplifted the retention and conversion rate. The platform as a whole has been a great addition to our airline business as it helped us in crafting a great product roadmap.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Product Development and Web Analytics Manager

all_reviews.review_title: 3.5X increase in conversion rate using Insider's AI-powered product recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Personalized product recommendations powered by AI have helped us scale our customer experience as we're now able to show our users the products that they'd love to see and purchase across different pages of our website. With Insider's personalized recommendations, we were able to improve product discovery and reduce the time users would need to spend looking for those products. This has helped us reduce bounce rate as customers end up staying on the platform browsing more products for a longer duration of time.

We observed that the conversion rate using Insider is 80% higher than our CR otherwise, which is 3 times more. This is a telling metric for how well Insider is working for us.

We also used Web Push to target users who have visited our platform and made some engagement and also the users who haven't visited our website for a long time. We were able to send out instant push messages once users left the website after viewing products and brought them back to our website to complete the purchase. And we were also able to get users who haven't been to our website for a good time back by showing them discount coupons to encourage them to purchase.

Their AI-powered segmentation capabilities is extremely good and they were crucial in helping us target different segments of users for personalized and contextual messages.

All in all, Insider's Growth Management Platform has really helped us improve our customer engagement and experience and it's a tool we would recommend other brands also to use if they wish to improve their cross-channel marketing automation.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Though Insider supports many different languages, Chinese is not yet supported on their platform. We would love local Chinese language support on the platform. Having said that, their Account Management team has been extremely supportive in helping us bridge this gap.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our lookout was for a solution that will help us personalize our complete website experience easily. We also hoped that these personalization efforts would result in a decrease in bounce rate, an increase in revenue and conversions and with Insider, we achieved precisely that.

Personalized product recommendations have really changed the way our users experience and interact with our website. We have achieved higher AOV and increased cart size since the deployment of these AI-based recommendations. Users are spending more time on the website browsing products, and they also end up adding more products to wishlist and the carts since they are seeing more relevant recommendations.

We were also able to carry out efficient retargeting using Insider's Web Push feature. On the whole, Insider has been a breeze to use and highly effective for our business.

Their products are easy to use and easy to deploy. The integration time is quite less and we're able to see results quite quickly in a matter of a month. Their AI technology does all the running most of the work for us. All this has led to us seeing an extremely positive ROI!

all_reviews.review_title: Solid increase in bookings using Insider, RoAS uplifted by 78%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We're highly impressed by the capabilities of Insider Growth Management Platform and the insights it provides. Not only did it help us target the right set of audience with the right messaging at the right time, we were also able to gather valuable data about what makes our customers convert.
Using Insider's various products including SMS, Email, and WhatsApp we were able to communicate with our customers across multiple channels and influence their decision to make a booking with us. Because of its stellar capabilities and feature-rich solutions, Insider has truly become a must-have tool in our marketing arsenal.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's Growth Management Platform is one of the best marketing automation tools for businesses looking to fastrack their growth. Its analytics dashboard is quite detailed and offers several customized reports to gain a comprehensive view of business performance. We're happy with the results we have achieved using insider's product suite.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
When it comes to travel, everybody evaluates multiple portals before reaching the final stage of making a booking. Because of this, we were experiencing a high user churn rate. In order to bring users back to our portal and book their flights with us, we needed a solution that could help us reach out to our customers across different communication channels and automate our marketing efforts by notifying them of fluctuations in the price and seat availability. After evaluating an array of platforms, we came across Insider and were particularly impressed with the platform's solutions and their capabilities. The growth team at Insider recommended we use their AI-backed customer journey builder - Architect, to instantly activate new user journeys and nurture them by notifying them about price drop alerts. Their growth team also advised us to use their WhatsApp, Email, and SMS channels to send out welcome emails and messages to new users and alert them about the reduced ticket fare in real time.

By utilizing Insider's 40+ pre built templates for email to notify our users about the incomplete bookings, and encouraging them to make a purchase, we were able to accelerate our campaign launch and increase open rates by as high as 90%. As suggested by their growth team, we also added countdown timers and coupons in our email campaigns that uplifted our engagement rates by a whopping 62% and conversion rates by 12%. In just 3 months after the implementation, we observed a substantial uplift of 78% in our Return on Ad Spend (RoAS) and 23% decrease in cost per transaction.
