all_reviews.review_title: Insider's campaigns increased our CVR by 65%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing we liked about working with Insider is that they spent substantial time understanding the core problems our business was facing and suggested solutions and implementations that truly did wonders to our business. Their solutions enabled us to create personalised website experiences, re-engage visitors, highlight top meals for specific occasions, and improve discount code redemption with side coupons at checkout. The advanced segmentation and reporting capabilities allowed us to conduct A/B tests for specific customer segments and monitor key metrics like AOV and conversion rate in real-time. The Web Push technology's exceptional performance led to a significant 25% increase in CVR. With the help desk technical team, we continuously analysed and optimised campaign settings to achieve our goals, such as increasing purchases and clicks.

What do you dislike about Insider?
As of now, there's nothing negative about the Insider platform. Pricing may seem higher, but honestly, investing in this tool is totally worth it.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tortuga's main purpose in engaging with Insider is to complement the gaps and missing features on the website of both brands. As it is currently, the set-up and coding of both websites are extensive and complicated, which in turn, results in a long turnaround time with limited resources on our internal Tech team. Due to the fast-paced nature of campaigns and being in the competitive Food & Beverages (F&B) industry, Insider has helped enhance and update our website features with a shorter turnaround time along with technical expertise. Insider has also helped the business stay ahead of the market by implementing features & important website communications quickly and efficiently to drive either brand awareness or sales-driven campaigns.

In addition to this, the enhanced Insider features allow us to also improve the User Interface (UI) / User Experience (UX) flow of our customers. Communication is more intuitive and user-friendly when the business is able to leverage useful Insider features such as the sidebar menu, pop-ups and engaging visuals that build up our branding while helping make our website look more appealing and instinctive.

Subsequent to all the features and technical expertise that we obtain from our partnership with Insider, it is also important that the business is able to conduct A/B tests and create customer segmentation to assess performance and obtain direct feedback on messaging effectiveness and appeal of creative designs. Utilising Insider's dashboards help the business gain insights faster and in a high-level review format that is easy to understand and action on.

With regards to specific features that have been beneficial for the business lately, the sidebar menu and coupon have been useful to reduce new customer drop-off as well as highlight certain exclusive or top meals during special events. With easy configuration and set-up, both features have helped drive awareness and sales, which would have otherwise taken weeks to develop using our internal devs and tech team due to the manual configuration of our current websites. The support and help desk from Insider has also been very supportive and friendly towards any questions or assistance needed from our team.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The integration was seamless and the Account Management team played a crucial role in knitting it together to ensure that there were no hassles. It was extremely quick and we were able to get started pretty quickly. Our expectation was that it would take some for us to observe the results but it just took us 2 months to see substantial results. This exceeded our expectations! We have been using them to create personalized website experiences easily.

We wanted to use our website and mobile app traffic more effectively by showing them relevant campaigns. Using Insider, we managed to do that as we were able to show personalized campaigns that resonated with each user. This ensured that our users started returning back more frequently and this led to an increase in the Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV).

all_reviews.review_title: Great uplift in sales with web products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With the right team and technology by your side, you can achieve great results all year round just as in the holiday season. Insider's Web Push, Smart Recommender and Eureka helped us get a whopping 60% more sales than what we usually do, making all of them our favorite. Every time we launch a new item on our menu Eureka ensures the same is easily visible to our customers.

With Web Push we are able notify customers with back in stock alerts and great deals on their favorite snack bundles. This helped us get great sales on some of our premium-priced snacks which were on discount in the off-season. The 'Smart Recommender' helped us target the customers looking for great deals and share with them customized recommendations relevant to them. We are happy to have Insider as our growth partner.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider is the perfect combination of a great support team and smart growth tools. We strongly recommend them to anyone aiming for great sales throughout the year and not just Christmas.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our snacks are devoured by our customers and a few categories get sold out quickly. However, being a perishable commodity these need to move off-the shelf fast. We are sold out during the holiday season but the pace usually slows down round the year given the price point of our products. So we started putting a few customer favorites with short shelf life on discount. The challenge was to keep our customers informed about this. The second challenge was making our new launch easily discoverable to our customers.

We approached Insider for a solution. The growth team recommended we use Eureka, Web Push, and Smart Recommender and it truly has been a game changer. Web Push helped us analyze customer buying behavior and send alerts on ongoing offers well in time. When they visited our web and app store Eureka displayed new launches in the form of stories and Smart Recommender displayed related products and user reviews using smart overlays. This helped us sell all the fresh stock even during the off-season and we achieved 60% more sales than usual.

all_reviews.review_title: Conversion rates increased by 30% thanks to Insider's Smart Recommender tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been using Insider for every aspect of our website and mobile application, including Web Suite, Smart Recommeder, Email, and Web Push. We're truly amazed with the results we've got after implementing their Smart Recommender technology. In just a week after the implementation, we observed that our conversion rates improved significantly and the churn reduced by 60%.

The best thing that we like about their AI-backed tools is that they help us encourage our users across different touch points. We also received great results through web push notifications as we were able to engage users who were not even on our website. This way we were able to drive more users back onto our website and increase our revenues.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We haven't faced any major challenge so far working with the Insider team. The only thing which we can point out here is that it took us a while to get a hang of their products as Insider has a number of tools to offer. However, with the support of their customer success team, we were able to manage it.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a retail chain, we have multiple retail stores across different locations. But since we wanted to drive more conversions online, we were looking for a solution to improve user experience and increase installs for our mobile application. That's why we decided to try out Insider's Growth Management Platform. After understanding our requirements, the account management team at Insider recommended that we leverage their Web Suite to improve UI/UX of our website and Mobile App Suite to create individualized customer experiences for our app users.

The team also suggested that we implement their AI-powered Smart Recommender tool on our website to make product recommendations personalized based on unique user behavior and preferences. We also used their Email solution to nudge and encourage our customers to visit our website and install our mobile application. Within a short span of time, we observed a spike of 40% in our Product Page Views.

Furthermore, delivering
personalized experiences to our website visitors and app users, which further decreased our bounce rate by a whopping 68% and conversion rates were increased by 30%.

all_reviews.review_title: 6.5% uplift in Onsite conversion rates with AI-backed Smart Recommender tool over past 6 months
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As a user of Insider, we're impressed with the platform's features, particularly Smart Recommendations, InStory, and Email. The Smart Recommendations feature is a game-changer, providing personalized product recommendations to customers based on their browsing history and preferences. This has helped to increase customer engagement and drive sales for my business.

The InStory feature is also a standout, allowing me to create interactive and engaging stories within the website, which has improved the customer experience and encouraged brand loyalty.

The Email feature is comprehensive and user-friendly, providing a range of tools for automating, segmenting, and personalizing email campaigns. This has made it easier for me to reach and engage with my target audience effectively. Overall, we highly recommend Insider for businesses looking to enhance their online presence and drive sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, we needed a little hand-holding to get started with the products. But the Insider team proactively supported us in integrating tools. Overall, we are happy with the results we've seen so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
After implementing the products by Insider, we've seen a tremendous improvement on our website. With their Smart Recommender, we were able to remove all the clutter from our website and provide our users with a personalized and convenient overlay. This further improved our cart cleaning and abandonment rates which boosted the online conversion rates by 6.5% over 6 months time.

With the help of their InStory tool, we were able to capture the attention of our website visitors with personalized stories, which further significantly increased engagement rates on our website. Apart from this, we were also looking for an automated email solution to drive more leads.

We're also glad we used Insider's email tool as it not only improved segmentation but also helped us drive more leads and uplifted the conversion rates by 23.30%.

all_reviews.review_title: Boosted conversion rates, sales, and revenue using Social Proof
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Social Proof technology is something that we were looking for to drive more conversions and purchases. The best part of using Social Proof is that all its campaigns are customizable. And because of this, we were able to personalize them to our business requirements. The campaign showed how many website visitors were viewing each of the products and this motivated our users to buy the popular products that were in demand. This led to a boost in conversions and revenues.

What do you dislike about Insider?
However, we had our doubts on its effectiveness, we were surprised with the results that we received. In just a month's time, our sales and revenue were a lot more than we were expecting.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We saw a drastic drop in customer purchase intention to actual purchasing during their session on the website, which resulted in a significant decrease in add-to-cart actions. In addition, the number of sessions with add-to-cart dropped and was less than that of transactional sessions. Having understood our challenge, Insider suggested that we leverage web push notifications to drive people down the sales funnel and implement social proof strategies to create FOMO. After employing these strategies, we were able to drive add-to-cart and purchase triggers, which made the purchase decision easier for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Gurgencler review for Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Whatever strategies the Insider team suggested to us, all worked flawlessly and the results were as expected. The tools we selected were named Web Suite, Architect, Customer Data Platform. The Web Suite tool is the master of delivering personalized customer experiences and the best in town platform for getting users to come back to our site and buy things again. This was exactly what our company needed.
The Customer Data Platform, or CDP, helped us organize all our information. It took data that was scattered in different places and put it all together in one spot. The Architect tool made it easy to run advertising campaigns across different platforms. It's really the architect of creating personalized campaigns on different channels at scale. Now we can reach our customers on our website, mobile app, web push, SMS, and WhatsApp. We're even thinking about using it for emails soon as we keep get

What do you dislike about Insider?
The system worked incredibly well for our business. Architect's AI capabilities helped us guide our customers through our website in a way that's unique to each person.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to reach users everywhere was causing problems like too many messages and people losing interest. We wanted a feature that was subtle and specific. Insider's Next Best Channel was the result of our searching. This tool lets us talk to each user the way they like best. We could plan how to reach different customers at different points in their buying process.
Now, we can reach people through Web push, WhatsApp, and email, depending on what stage they're at. By understanding our customers' likely actions and needs, we've been able to make our advertising more powerful. This has made people more interested in what we're offering, helped us keep customers for longer, and made us more money.

all_reviews.review_title: Reaching customers and delighting them where they are with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We use Insider's WhatsApp product along with their marketing automation product Architect to create promotional campaigns on WhatsApp. We chose Insider's WhatsApp mainly for three reasons.
1) Their segmentation capabilities are the best in the market. This amount of segmentation helps us design the most personalized WhatsApp campaigns.
2) They support different types of campaigns like promotional, triggered, and transactional and have different templates to help us achieve our goals. We mostly prefer the CTA template and conversational template to create a more interactive experience.
3) Finally, we love their provision of opt-in templates to increase our WhatsApp subscriber base.
We've been running some revenue-driven campaigns like price alert, replenishment, and back-in-stock campaigns that have helped us with increased revenue and sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The capabilities they offer as part of their cross-channel journey orchestration suite are much wider than their stand-alone product. We felt this when we initially used the standalone WhatsApp product and eventually moved to using WhatsApp in Architect to run more complex campaigns.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider's array of products are sophisticated, reliable, and easily the best in the industry for marketers across different verticals. Our recommendation is to consult with the team to understand the use cases and functionalities of each product very well before deciding exactly what you'd want to go for.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us engage with our customer and improved conversion rate on our website
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The revenue that we generated by sending out automated push notifications were significantly higher than manual push notifications. Also, as the tool offers a number of predefined templates, it didn't take much time for us to edit campaigns. Using this solution, we were able to update our target customers about their latest interest on our website/APP based on their previous onsite behavior. This has helped us increase our customer's brand favorability toward us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The integration took longer than expected. The project timeline was delayed due to the extra effort that we have to invest in integration. APP's missing countdown function is a pity. Hoping the mobile web, website and APP template can be in sync.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before using Insider, we were able to send bulk push notifications in the text format. However, we wanted to explore a solution that can help us automate the process, create deep segments based on their predicted behavior, events, and visits, and engage with customers who had abandoned their carts.

Insider's team of Growth Consultants recommended us to use their web push channel to send messages to target customers who had a higher purchase intent. We were also able to re-engage customers who haven't visited our website for a long time. By sending out personalized Cart Abandonment Push Campaigns using predefined templates, we were able to capture their attention and bring them back on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: The Web Suite helped us create FOMO and Web Push helped bring back dormant readers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best feature would have to be the ability to edit the font, style and color of every button on our text content sharing website. Generally a marketing tool may not go into so much depth and be so versatile, but Insider's Web Suite is an exception to that rule.Design is absolutely paramount to our website and Insider was able to help us in this regard. Another great bit was keeping the customer engaged and Web Push helped us send timed notifications to every customer no matter what stage of the journey they were in.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We love Insider's Web Suite and Web Push for their great features and ease of use. We have no dislikes at all!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our content (text) sharing website was getting in the numbers in the beginning because it was a novel idea at the time. But as competitors came in with better looking websites, we took a hit in customer views and reads. We had to do better, but did not know how.
So we improved the font, style and color of everything on our website down to each button. We also optimized the layout to a more compact one to offer a better reading experience.Insider helped us accomplish both. We also leveraged the Web Suite's social proof feature to let people know how many times a text was downloaded, effectively driving more clicks and increasing the downloads even more.
Insider's Web Push also sent timed notifications to readers to continue with their read or pick up a new one if they were done. Eventually, it helped boost our online readership and we couldn't be happier!

all_reviews.review_title: More conversions from customers with short attention spans with consistent communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Today an average customer uses more than 3 channels at any given point in time namely, email - social media - chat. Insider's comprehensive suite of tools has helped us communicate with customers with a multi-channel marketing strategy.
We reached out to customers on their preferred channel rather than them reaching out to us. Insider's Web Push, Mobile App, and Email tools enabled us to maintain a consistent communication with our users. Web Suite ensured we keep these communications personalized and relevant to our customers, and Recommendation ensured we only flash information the customer is genuinely interested in.
Architect played an instrumental role in automating our marketing processes and efficiently mapping customer touchpoints which ensured that messages across multiple channels (web notification, email, app notification) were consistent, relevant, and personalized and constantly nudged the buyer to take action just in time.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider offers a plethora of templates across each of its tools be it emails, app notifications, or web push notifications which kind of boggled us in the beginning. However, Insider's growth experts were quick to step in and help us pick and choose the templates most suited to our needs. The results have been indeed mind-blowing.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest challenge we faced was perhaps sending a consistent message across all communication channels, and Insider helped us achieve that. We can now segment, and group customers based on their likes, demographics, last purchase, etc., and then run different campaigns targeted for each customer group.
The messaging is mapped to their stage in the customer lifecycle thanks to Architect and relevant, and the same message is delivered using Mobile App, Web Push, and Emails. Recommendations are on point and help grab customers' attention with short attention spans. We have truly been successful in sending a consistent message across channels and driving more conversion and sales.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: E-Commerce Personalization And Campaign Management Assistant Specialist

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome 30% CR boost using Insider's omnichannel marketing automation platform, Architect
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We believe that Insider's offers way more capabilities than any other marketing automation, cross-channel journey orchestration, and personalization solution. We haven't found any other platform which allows us to seamlessly integrate onsite and offsite experiences and siloed data to provide us with a single and unified view of each user to understand their behavior across different devices, channels and touchpoints. Insider's Customer Data Platform (CDP) is also the best in the business as it is able to capture siloed user data from these different channels and bring them to one central location for us to draw insights and act on it to create engaging personalized cross-channel experiences.

When using Insider, another important feature that played a key role for us was dynamic segmentation between our users from different countries. This may seem like a pretty simple concept, but it was something that no other vendor previously offered us.

We are very impressed by the effectiveness of the various tools on Insider. For example, the side discount coupon tool increased our conversion rate by 30% while the cart reminder feature increased our conversion rate by 20%. What's more, A/B testing enabled us to test different elements and campaigns and activate the best performing ones to further improve our conversion rate.

Not just that, Insider's Account Management team is extremely supportive in helping us activate campaigns, and also addressing any challenges that pop up. Not just that, they lend their expertise by suggesting campaigns we can run at particular times of the year based on the market trends to boost our engagement game.

To put it simply, Insider is a must-have for every marketing team looking to personalize customer experiences across different channels.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The product's performance could be improved in terms of the speed. Sometimes it takes a while to upload a campaign. We hope this will be improved in the near future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to build cross-channel journeys which are consistent in the experience we offer our users. Insider has made this possible, and how easily too! We really enjoy using the platform to visualize and create both complex and rather simple cross-channel journeys, complete with detailed personalized elements and data-backed choices made possible by the platform. Not just that, we are engaging users on the correct channel at the right time with the right message and this has helped us improve all key marketing metrics.

Our conversion rate has increased significantly across different campaigns, and we are extremely satisfied with the results we have achieved. This has also had a positive impact on our ROI and we're delighted with our decision to use Insider's products to amp up our customer experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Ideal solution for Financial companies like ours
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
1. Relentless commitment to customer service.
2. Constantly growing product with innovative roadmap
3. Support team goes the extra mile to ensure our ideas were implemented. This level of dedication to quality in both product and service is quite rare

What do you dislike about Insider?
We need to be mindful and balanced in our use of Insider's platform. We were expecting instant results which we weren't able to see.  The more we engage with it, the higher the ROI we receive, which implies that our team needs to dedicate more time for Insider.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our low email open rates were a roadblock in enhancing customer engagement rates, and for sure, it was driving low traffic to our websites. The Email tool from Insider was the perfect remedy for this problem. This tool could swiftly turn a plain email into a conversion powerhouse by embedding interactive, responsive, and dynamic elements. We love that we can drag and drop interactive elements like real-time timers, coupons, and recommendations. It's fun and productive at the same time.

Another issue was when our users filled out leads, the information we received was inaccurate, making it harder for us to prepare scripts for genuine customer interactions. Insider's technology combats this by tracking and evaluating whether the users are potential leads or not. When customers left inaccurate information, the Architect tool automatically directed them to request verification. This saved a lot of our sales team resources.

Now we are enjoying the increased success rate of lead information with every coming year. It started in 2021 at 60%, and right now, at the end of 2023, it's 100%.

User-Friendliness: Insider has an intuitive interface that is easy for us to navigate, and this minimize the learning curve for new users and provide helpful prompts and guides where necessary.
Customizability: Our businesses model has an unique processes and requirements, so insider is highly customizable to adapt to different workflows. This includes the ability to add custom fields, create personalized campaigns, and integrate with other software platforms.

We also used their Customer Data Platform to enrich our tech stack and target our prospects in a more precise manner.

all_reviews.review_title: 40% uplift in sales with Insider's messaging products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
In the last quarter, we introduced an entire new product line but instead of better sales we saw a sudden drop in sales. We had been using Insider's Email, SMS, and WhatsApp for quite some time and had seen impressive results. But this sudden decline was kind of surprising. The growth team at Insider suggested we use their CDP - a data collection platform and Architect to resolve the issue. Harnessing the capabilities of CDP we were able to collect data for every user from both mobile app and web at a single place and identify the problem. Architect on the other hand helped us collect data at every customer touchpoint. Equipped with this goldmine of data we were able to design a user experience which made product discovery easy, send notifications on Email, SMS, WhatsApp with links embedded which directly took customers to the right product page thus enabling them to complete the purchase. Soon our sales improved and we saw an uplift of 40% in our overall sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The ability to embed easily clickable links in all our messaging is truly the highlight and helped turn around things. Insider is truly a pioneer in bring smart and innovative marketing automation solutions.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
After we launched our new product line on our web and app store, customers did not quite enjoy the new look, feel, and website navigation experience. As a result our sales were at an all time low. CDP and Architect helped pin point the exact juncture where customers were facing issues which helped us re-strategize are promotional campaigns and send the right messaging using Insider's highly responsive WhatsApp, SMS, and Email notifications. Our dwindling sales soon saw an upswing and we registered 40% more sales.

all_reviews.review_title: Increased AOV with Insider's Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
You only have 3 to 5 seconds to catch someone's interest when they visit your website. If they leave, getting them back is really tough. But with Insider's Web Push tool, we found a way to do it. It's excellent at bringing people back to our site so they can buy things. We also used the Web Suite tool from Insider. Its personalized banners and product recommendations have made people stay longer on our site instead of leaving quickly.This has, in turn, increased our average order value and boosted our revenue.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's team has always been open to feedback and customized their tools to fit our unique business needs making our business goals easy to achieve.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company struggled with keeping visitors on our website, affecting our revenue generation. Insider's tools helped us fix this by improving the experience for our users and bringing them back to our site. Their innovative, AI-driven system lets us focus on the right customers with our various campaigns. These campaigns caught the attention of our target audience, leading to more engagement.
With the addition of features like banner overlays, fun templates, and on-site messages, we've made our site more appealing. This has led to fewer people leaving the site, reduced customer acquisition costs, and increased our sales and overall profits.

all_reviews.review_title: Curated delightful shopping experiences for our users using Insider, observed uplift in AOV and CR
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The thing we like the most about Insider is their suite of tools that have had a significant impact on our overall marketing strategy. The Web Suite allowed us to create customer journeys that improved user engagement on our website, while the Web Push tool's powerful segmentation capabilities increased our conversion rates through targeted notifications.
Their Email tool revolutionized our email marketing efforts with customized, responsive emails, and the Architect tool helped us improve the customer experience through seamless cross-channel journeys. The AI-powered Recommendations
feature enhanced our customers' shopping experience, and their Mobile App solutions improved our mobile user engagement and retention with push notifications and in-app messages. Overall, Insider's tools have been an invaluable asset to our digital marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The platform can be a bit challenging for beginners due to its comprehensive features. However, Insider's customer service team is always ready to assist, ensuring a smooth onboarding process.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
To provide more individualized and relevant onsite experiences on the web and mobile web, we needed to segment our customers more accurately. Insider's team recommended using an onsite experiment feature to engage website visitors with the most relevant content and experiences. By customizing the homepage banner with products based on the user's previous browsing history, we were able to increase engagement.
We also faced low average order values (AOVs) on our website and mobile app and were looking for a highly engaging solution to motivate customers to add more checkout items and increase their AOV. Insider suggested implementing cart-page recommendations that targeted each user based on their unique purchasing preferences.
These recommendations showed related items and most frequently bought together items, optimizing engagement on the cart page and resulting in a significant uplift in conversion rates within a month.
Our email marketing strategy also needed improvement, as our emails were not resonating with our customers. Insider's Email tool transformed our strategy, allowing us to send personalized emails that increased open and click-through rates.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Architect helped us totally transform our marketing strategy and helped us design truly personalized and relevant campaigns for different stages in a customer life-cycle. The business we are in is nothing unusual and there are many players with similar products.
However, what sets us apart is our customization capabilities and Insider's all-in-one product suite helped us convey this message to our target customers and helped us enhance our visibility in a highly competitive marketplace.
Web Suite's deep segmentation and predictive analysis capabilities helped us identify and target the right customers and their plug and play templates and dynamic content, helping enhance our online presence. The Web Push tool has proven to be an efficient way to maintain communication with our audience. The Email tool has been instrumental in improving our outreach, allowing us to send targeted communications to our users.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Understanding the fine line between engaging and spamming was a challenge however Insider's team guided us on the best practices, helping us optimize our push strategies.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching out to the right audience and creating a strong identity among a sea of competitors was a big challenge. Insider's marketing tool kit comprising Architect, Smart Recommender, Web push, Email, and Mobile App helped us orchestrate the right personalized marketing campaigns for the right set of customers.
We could better engage with customers using web and app notifications, convey our USP, and create a brand recall value with their Emails. Since we have partnered with Insider, we have seen a significant rise in our subscription rate, people (customers and competitors) have started recognizing our brand.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
- Its multi-channel approach is great for any business to flourish! You can link up all communication channels into one automated flow/architect.
- The interface is really easy to use and navigate.
- The reporting dashboard makes it easy to see your weekly and monthly stats.
- We value to on-site personalisation of the website.
- The email editor is great and easy to use, for an all-in-one solution it's very flexible compared to some other email-only tools.
- Great customer support and one on one time with your account manager, I've never met such a dedicated account manager!

What do you dislike about Insider?

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?

- Automating emails: Never something we had the functionality to do and their Architect journeys make it so easy to set up. There's no coding involved, no complicated double negative rules to figure out. It's all listed simply and clearly, giving you plenty to segment and split off into targeted flow branches.
- Clear revenue tracking and reporting: With our email campaigns we were never able to get clear data on their performance, now with Insider's conversion and campaign tracking, we can see it all and more!

This combined with their templates for campaigns using WhatsApp, SMS, Email, and Eureka has helped us connect with our customers in a meaningful way. These campaigns are AI-driven which helps our business eliminate weeks of manual effort and guesswork at every point of our customer personalization journey.

We have run multiple campaigns to date with the Insider team and we are happy with the results of each and every one of them. We would recommend them to any retail or other businesses.

Improper UX was a major concern for us and one of the primary reason behind our low customer engagement. By leveraging the Desktop Web by Insider we were able to beautify our website and make it user-friendly by updating its information architecture. With the help of WhatsApp, SMS, Email, and Eureka we were able to deliver seamless, consistent, and personalized experiences to our customers.
The growth team at Insider also suggested a great strategy of sending personalized push notifications regarding price drops which increased our add-to-cart rates by 37.8% and improved our customer retention rates by 58%. All this was made possible in a short period of time and I'm thankful our brand got in touch with Insider.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As far as our website revenue goes, Insider contributes to a large share of 15%. This is a huge percentage and the impact they've create is quite good. We switched to Insider for Smart Recommender, their personalized product recommendation engine since we found their AI algorithms extremely robust, with numerous awesome features offering a lot of flexibility in usage. Using Smart Recommender, we have been able to show personalized product recommendations easily and they have ensured that we are getting more converions and sales.

At the forefront of this is Insider's amazing Customer Data Platform (CDP) as that's the product that knits everything together. Their CDP helps us integrate data from a variety of sources together to act on it to create engaging cross-channel campaigns. We are able to understand our customers better know since the data aren't siloed now but are in a single, centralized location.

Insider's suite of products have been a big plus for us and we're glad they've made a significant change to our website experience!

What do you dislike about Insider?
We're quite happy with the conversion rate uplift that we've seen with using Insider's products. Since they also provide us with a solid ROI and contribute to a lion's share of our revenue, they give us no reasons to complain.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted an improved smart recommendation tool compared to what we were previously using. We picked Insider because it offers more flexible features along with a stronger suite of algorithms that have proven to be more effective for our business than our previous vendor. With Insider's use, we have achieved increased CR.

The Smart Recommender's complementary recommendations are key to driving cross-sell and up-sell on our website, and these have pushed up key metrics like AOV as well. This data-driven approach to shopping directly translates to increased conversions for us. We have implemented a variety of recommendation algorithms on our website and mobile websites, and have witnessed relative improvements which are significant, even within different algorithms from Insider. In one case, we saw that on our mobile product page, the viewed together algorithm delivered a 50% higher CR uplift than the purchased together algorithm.

all_reviews.review_title: Boosted user engagement through discount offers and best-selling products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The integration was seamless and the team of consultants as well as Account Managers play an important role in knitting everything together to ensure it was a hassle-free process. At the start, we were expecting that it was going to take a lot of time, but it exceeded our expectations with such a quick turnaround.

We were able to show recommendations of the most trending products and along with discount coupons, we were able to nudge website visitors to buy more and increased conversions.

What do you dislike about Insider?
When we implemented the widget option on the website, Insider's algorithms were quite slow to react and display the right recommendations to users. But with assistance from team Insider, we were able to overcome this challenge.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to design the perfect experience for our customers - this involved notifying them about the ongoing as well as upcoming offers and best-selling products to optimize onsite customer engagement.

Insider worked collaboratively with our team to understand our goals and recommended we use their onsite experimentation tool to show a widget on a website for recently viewed products, which increased product discovery and helped our users to make their decisions faster.
With the help of this recently viewed items widget, we observed an uplift in Average Order Value, an increase in conversion rates, and a boost in our business' incremental revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: 70% Uplift in loyalty and customer retentition
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
In our line of business accurate patient information is important and Insider's CDP (Customer Data Platform) ensures we always have access to complete and accurate patient history making it our most favourite tool from Insider. Architect and Email are two other Insider tools we have been using and the results we managed to achieve have been unbelievable.

Architect - the journey orchestration tool by Insider tracks every possible customer touchpoint and using ready-to-use email and WhatsApp templates we ensure that our customers get to know the right offers, due tests and doctor follow-up visits on time. Also, running personalized campaigns for health check-ups is now easy and always a success. Our customer retention is up by 70% all thanks to Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The ready to use templates are a life-saver, however industry specific templates like for us would be a welcome addition. However, we do understand that given the spectrum of industries Insider caters to they need to have solutions that can be applicable in many different scenarios. However, Insider has gone that extra-mile to come up with tailored solutions to address our unique business needs.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were struggling to retain and expand our customers despite having the best doctors on-panel, state of the art medical facilities, and highly competitive pricing. Our biggest drawback was our inability to serve our customers the way they expected us, resulting in high customer churn. We got the Insider team onboard to fix this problem. The Growth managers at Insider suggested we use CDP, Architect, and Email by Insider.
CDP helped us gather all data at one place which enabled us to segment customers and run more targeted campaigns.
* Architect tracked every possible customer touchpoint and ensured we run a cohesive communication across all channels with our customers.
* Email helped us run a more personalized and targeted campaign ensuring better customer engagement.
With Insider we could significantly reduce customer churn and achieve a 70% uplift in customer retention.

all_reviews.review_title: Cross channel customer journeys boosted conversion rates by 21.83%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Architect tool's cross-channel journeys helped us engage our customers on their most preferred channels. The ability to launch such sophisticated journeys for different user personas across websites proved extremely beneficial for us, boosting our conversion rates by 5%.

Apart from Architect, we also used the Web Suite, Smart Recommender, Web Push, Email, SMS, and WhatsApp tools. The Web Suite stood out with its journey orchestrator. It enabled us to personalize campaigns using easy pop-ups. The messages delivered by these pop-ups were used to promote our products, generate leads, and encourage users to for loyalty sign ups

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Web Suite's behavioral targeting allowed us to target customers based on their behavior on our website and mobile app. This enabled us to deliver more relevant and timely messages to our customers. Initially, understanding the entire process was somewhat challenging, but Insider's support team assisted us throughout.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted a tool that consolidated all marketing channels into a single panel, which was easy to use and enabled us to create cross-website customer journeys with multiple channels. Insider's product suite became a dream come true. They provided an easy-to-use platform suitable for multiple use cases. We had all channels under one dashboard, which empowered us with efficient go-to-market strategies and improved agility.

This 360 marketing automation boosted our conversion rates, including purchases, code registrations, and sign-ups, and reduced cart abandonment and bounce rates, improving our overall gross profit margin. Thank you, Insider, for all your support.

all_reviews.review_title: 120% Uplift in requests for Test-drive
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
A tool or a technology is only as good as the team making it work. For us the best part about working with Insider is their brilliant team who makes all the magic that these tools create possible. The automotive industry is both dynamic and competitive in equal measure. Making the customer aware of any new launch is important in our industry to ensure sales and this perhaps was a big challenge cascading to many other issues like not getting enough bookings for a test-drive and therefore low sales. With InStory we could run stories on our website and app just like Insta stories giving customers a preview of our upcoming car launch generating the right buzz and excitement. Using Smart Recommender  we displayed actual user reviews about our existing cars and shared suggestions with cars and features tailored to a particular user's interest.
Eureka made discovering a new launch very easy.

Insider helped us get a whopping 120% uplift in test-drive requisitions leading to more sales. Thank you team Insider for nailing this.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The multitude of features Insider comes with can be overwhelming to begin with, but the ever supportive Insider team makes the entire process a cakewalk.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Generating awareness about new launches was a challenge, so was product discovery and navigation on our web store and mobile app. By leveraging Eureka, InStory, and Smart Recommender, product discovery and website navigation became easy and getting sign-ups for test-drive became seamless. With Insider we saw a 150% uplift in test-drive requisitions.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimizing our marketing strategies with Insider's suite of Personalization products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
One thing that we liked the most about Insider is that the platform enabled us to create personalized and targeted journeys for our customers based on their unique interests, preferences, and behavior. This approach helped us increase our customers' loyalty and engagement with our business.
We also leveraged their other tools, such as Architect, Smart Recommender, Instory, and Mobile app which not only boosted our conversion rates but also grew our revenue to multiple folds.
The Growth Management team at Insider suggested us to use their Web Push, Email, and Mobile App channels to reach out to a bulk of users through different channels and alert them about the ongoing offers, discounts, items back in stock, etc. This created FOMO and a sense of urgency among our users to purchase.
Overall, we're highly impressed by the ability of Insider products to help businesses overcome any marketing challenge and drive growth.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Overall, our experience with Insider has been great, and we don't have any specific dislikes. While we did need some guidance initially, the Insider team was incredibly supportive throughout the entire implementation and execution process.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
iyi iletisim ve samimiyet

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before partnering with Insider, we struggled with high drop-off rates and low conversion rates due to inadequate user experience resulting from limited internal resources. However, with Insider's AI-powered Smart Recommender and web suite, we have improved our website's performance significantly.
The platform's easy implementation and ability to conduct complex experiments across various pages and audiences helped us optimize our onsite experiences and recommend our users with products that matched best to their needs, preferences, and browsing history.
Apart from this, we also implemented their InStory feature on our website as well as the mobile app that encouraged visitors to interact and as a result, improved our onsite engagement rates. We also leveraged Insider's AI-backed customer journey builder, Architect, that enabled us to communicate with our right set of users at the right time with the right message at the right channel.
This helped us bring churned users back to our website and application, and furthermore enabled us to nudge them to complete their purchase. With this implementation, we observed a massive spike in engagement, retention, and conversion rates. In addition, we also observed that our drop-off rates were reduced and overall revenue grew significantly.

all_reviews.review_title: Drove incremental revenue of 100k+ with Insider's products in no time
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's suggestion to run A/B test campaigns delivered the results we were expecting. As we wanted to A/B test the campaigns to upsell our products and increase our conversion rate, the capability enabled us to determine the best-performing campaigns. The team of growth managers also recommended we change CTAs that performed positively and significantly improved our CTR.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, we observed a slight drop in turnover of one of our products. We found that the implementation of Hello Bar wasn't working for us as our users weren't clicking on the CTA, but with a few color and text changes in the CTA button, we're able to drive more conversions.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
By using Insider we wanted to build trust and a better user experience amongst the customers who were already in the funnel. We have launched dozens of experiments and A/B tests in the funnel. The main goal was also to increase our conversion rate and revenue at every step of the funnel. This is part of our process of continuous improvement of our e-commerce website. After discussing our requirements with Insider, we decided to leverage their Web Push suite to run A/B test web push notification campaigns. These campaigns enabled us to understand what's performing well and delivering better results. By sending out push messages to our customers, we were able to uplift our conversion rates.

These implementations enabled us to generate 100k+ incremental revenue in just a few weeks. And this wouldn't have been possible without the support of team Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Observed a boost in engagement rates by personalizing web push messages
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With Insider's Web Push solution, we got new users on our website and nudge them to engage for a longer time by showing discount coupons, check out our offerings, and eventually converting these into actual sales. We were also able to re-engage users who hadn't checked out our website for a long time by sending out web push notifications. This helped us ensure that we retain our customers and improve our customer loyalty.

Their AI-powered segmentation capabilities are one of the best in the industry and enabled us to target the most relevant customers for our various marketing campaigns at the right time. With Insider's Send Time Optimization capabilities, we were able to send personalized web push messages to our customers at an ideal time. This ensured that customers engaged with and spent time on our messages, significantly increasing our engagement rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
No complaints as such, the journey with Insider has been pleasant, fruitful, and full of good surprises so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Many of our old patrons were kind of disengaged and getting them back onboard was a big challenge. With Insider's personalized web push message and predictive segments, we could target these disinterested users and manage to bring them back to our website. We were also able to identify and target users who would engage when offered discount coupons. By getting back old customers and many new ones, we were able to maximize our sales and revenues.

all_reviews.review_title: 21% increase in cart recovery rate with targeted Web Push notifications
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's use of social proof techniques significantly impacted our sales and conversion by adding a layer of FOMO across our website and building trust in our products. Browse abandonment & web push notifications resulted in an impressive 21% increase in our cart recovery rate, showcasing Insider's effectiveness at re-engaging users.

By precisely targeting our audience and bridging the gap between user intentions and purchases, Insider helped optimise our website for maximum efficiency. Their ability to integrate dynamic coupons and countdown timers further motivated customers to make immediate buying decisions, enhancing our overall revenue.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The team has been really helpful with strategy planning, executions, and recommendations from active performance tracking & technical support support. Overall, I am very happy with the services provided by Insider & team.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One major challenge we had was maintaining growth after the return to offices post-COVID. Insider brought innovative solutions, particularly in the form of cart abandonment web pushes and web social proof techniques to help us boost sales. By leveraging Web Push notifications and onsite cart reminders using Insider's CDP, we were able to effectively drive customers down the sales funnel, with a sense of urgency while building credibility. This not only increased conversions but also instilled confidence in prospective buyers, helping them make informed decisions.

Also, Insider's collaborative and proactive approach has helped hugely streamline our marketing campaigns, allowing for real-time customisation and agility. Their expertise in social proof, combined with strategic segmentation, has not only addressed our challenges but also maximised our online sales potential.

all_reviews.review_title: Generated 15% higher sales, boosted AOV using Insider - Elektrix
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Choosing Insider as our Growth Management Platform was one of the best decisions we made. Utilizing their Web Suite channel, we not only improved the user experience and made it more personalized and delightful for our website visitors, but it also helped boost our engagement and conversion rates.

Additionally, we leveraged InStory, their immersive storytelling tool, on our website. This tool quickly captured users' attention through engaging and catchy social media-like stories related to our best-selling products, offers, and discounts.

To deliver highly personalized experiences to all our website visitors, we implemented the Insider team's suggestion of their Smart Recommendation engine, which helped us display the most reviewed and best-selling products to our users, encouraging them to make a purchase. In addition to these changes, we also utilized their Email channel to send out promotional emails to our existing customer database.

These implementations have been game-changers for our home appliances business, as our sales have increased by 15%, and the average order value (AOV) has seen a massive increase.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We didn't face any challenge working with the Insider team. While it took us a while to get a hang of each of their tools and identify what KPIs to track, with the support of their growth and customer success team, the process was smooth. Would surely recommend Insider to other businesses!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Insider's Web Suite improved the user experience for our website visitors, making it more personalized.
2. With the Smart Recommendation engine, we highlighted trending, recently viewed, best-selling, and frequently bought together products, leading to an increased Average Order Value (AOV)
3. The email channel allowed us to keep both existing and churned users updated about real-time offers, discounts, products back in stock, and more, ultimately bringing them back to our website and resulting in increased sales.

Additionally, they proposed web notifications to keep users engaged with updates on new listings, responses, and offers, even when they weren't actively browsing our site. Our experience with Insider has been wonderful, resulting in the acquisition of more quality leads.

So, we needed a data collection system that could help us divide customers into segments. Insider's CDP solution is just what we were looking for. It easily creates segments and allowed us to send personalized messages to our customers using modern channels like WhatsApp. We have already seen a significant uplift in test drives since using Insider's CDP.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The product helped us deliver personalization at scale and improve our team's productivity. Since they offer various types of solutions, we were unclear which ones we should leverage first. But the team offered us specific solutions to help hit our most important metrics - the support was great.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking to improve the number of test drive bookings; this is critical for us to get sales. In order to do that we needed to improve our CX and deliver personalized experiences that encouraged customers to engage with us. Insider helped us segment our customers in the easiest way possible, we were then able to send messages through WhatsApp to improve ROI. We've been so impressed with the results we've seen from Insider.

The utilization of the tools provided by Insider has fundamentally transformed our operational methodologies, yielding tangible benefits that have been empirically demonstrated. all_reviews.review_title: 11X increase in business ROI using Insider's product suite

Using Insider's Conversion Suite and Smart Recommender tool, we gained complete autonomy over our marketing campaigns. Furthermore, our website UX has never been better. With Insider's segmentation, dynamic content, user attributes, and product attributes, we truly individualized customer journeys for different personas, uplifting our AOV by 11%.

This data-driven shopping experience improved our conversion rates and allowed us to hyper-target our users using behavioral targeting. All thanks to Insider, our business is now experiencing a high growth with increased revenue-generation.

all_reviews.review_title: 46% uplift in overall engagement using Insider's multiple products we use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are using WhatsApp, web push, and Eureka by Insider. The Web Push in particular is our favorite thanks to its web push throttle speed feature. The notification delivery control in case of throttle speed lies with us, which means that when we launch a series of web push messages they do not get delivered to the recipient one after the other. The control over when these messages will be delivered lies with us. Web Push thus enables us to convey the information to a user at the right time. The WhatsApp tool by Insider  with its deep segmentation capabilities helps us design highly personalized and targeted WhatsApp campaigns. The ready to use conversational WhatsApp templates and the ability to add a CTA helps build a strong connection with the customers. With Eureka product discovery has become very easy for our customers.With all Insider tools combined we saw a 46% uplift in our customer engagement.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The sheer variety of ready-to-use templates for both WhatsApp and Web Push and the ease with which we can launch campaigns is truly commendable.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The modern-day customer uses more than 2 communication channels to connect with brands these days and as a business one needs to be available on all of these. With Insider we could launch a successful WhatsApp marketing campaign and connect with our customers where they are most comfortable. Being in retail we offer a large variety of products and often two variants of the same product (premium and economy). With Web Push we could target the right audience for the right product and Eureka made product discovery a seamless experience for our customers. As a result we were able to achieve a 49% uplift in user engagement.

all_reviews.review_title: Decrease in cart abandonment by 18.4%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Offering world-class services and products has always been our founding principle which is the reason when we experienced a customer churn, we contacted Insider. Their team worked closely with us to deploy personalization strategies across various channels such as websites, mobile applications, and social media

Our customer's shopping experiences were stagnant before with our cart abandonment rate at 81.22%. The goal was to improve the shopping experience and Insider, through their personalized campaigns using WhatsApp, Smart Recommender, Email, and Eureka delivered a frictionless and personalized experience for every customer. Our cart abandonment rate decreased gradually to 18.4% helping us to make a significant impact on our business this year.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The best part about Insider is there's no need for any tech support to implement the tools and launch campaigns. We are now no longer dependent on tech teams to deliver stellar customer experiences.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
There were many casual buyers on our website who were cart abandoners. They would add items to the cart and would disappear. With Insider's customized messages through WhatsApp and Email,  we inspired the buyers to continue their purchasing journey and more. With these personalized messaging strategies that created an urgency to drive sales, we turned our casual browsers into return customers.

Eureka made discovery of products and ongoing offers very easy and with Smart Recommendor we suggested them complementing similar products and offers based on their past buying behavior. With Insider's Smart Recommendor we have been able to deliver product recommendations that were too good to be turned down by the customers. This cross-selling and upselling strategy increased our AOV 3X in just 4 months.

all_reviews.review_content:

Great support from the Insider team; trainings, onboarding and on-going technical and strategic support.

Product works well, haven't found any bugs and there is a lot to offer to really power on-site optimisations, run campaigns, conduct A/B testing and plan user journeys out. Templates are aplenty and the team is always available to help set up the campaigns.

Data-driven Decision Making: Insider's comprehensive analytics and reporting tools have empowered us to make data-backed decisions. We can now track, analyze, and optimize our marketing strategies in real-time.

Unified Marketing Stack: Managing various tools for different aspects of our marketing efforts was cumbersome. With Insider, we've been able to centralize our tools, streamlining our processes and ensuring more cohesive campaigns.

Reduced Abandoned Carts: Through their predictive algorithms, we've been able to tackle our cart abandonment issue head-on. By sending timely, personalized reminders and offers, we've seen a noticeable reduction in cart drop-offs.

Mobile Marketing: Insider's robust mobile marketing solutions have allowed us to effectively tap into our mobile user base, driving higher conversions and improving user retention on our app.

all_reviews.review_title: 20% increment in AOV with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We use a plethora of tools by Insider such as Web Suite, Mobile App, and Recommendations. Picking a favorite is tough and honestly unfair as all of these have brought with them some truly unique abilities to drive more sales. We were already market leaders in our primary product category, but we wanted to get a larger share of the pie in the complementary product category as well.

With Insider, we could achieve this, thanks to Insider Smart Overlays. We were able to bring in spotlight a complementary product to the product the customer was about to purchase with a good deal and deep discounts. This ease of discovery resulted in a 20% rise in average order value. We finally achieved what we had set out to achieve.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Navigating through a plethora of features of the Web Suite and Mobile App was a bit overwhelming to be honest. But Insider's team were extremely helpful and walked us through every step of the process.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were market leaders in our primary product category. But our vast range of secondary products was largely going unnoticed by our customers despite great deals and competitive pricing given the quality we had. We soon realized that many a times customers didn't know that such a product exists. For example, you pick a book we have a number of throw options to go with it, however since we never promoted or marketed it we were unable to sell it.

This is where Insider stepped in and saved the day for us.

By using their Web Suite and Mobile App we were able to categorize and showcase our various products in an easy to discover manner. Through the use of magic banners we could highlight our various product bundles, discount offers, and more. Insider Smart Overlays ensured customers got irresistible deals for related products just before checkout and they added those to their basket.

With Insider's tool for targeting specific groups, our email messages started to feel more personal and relevant to our customers, and that got more people interested and buying our products.
By using other tools like Web Push and Architect, we've been able to remind customers about things like price drops or items being back in stock. This has helped us sell more.

Our sales and money saved have increased since we started these campaigns. Reminders about abandoned shopping carts and viewed products have been some of our best-performing strategies.
We even started a special program for our best customers, and we've found that they really like getting messages about loyalty rewards. All of this has helped our business do much better. All thanks to the Insider.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Given that the travel industry is highly competitive, our primary aim was to win the price war and bring back churned users to our website, transforming them into paying customers. After understanding our core objective, the account managers at Insider suggested we use their Architect tool, an AI-backed customer journey orchestration tool that could help us identify the best communication channel to reach a particular target customer and engage them.
As recommended by Insider's growth consultants, we also utilized this channel to notify our target customers about offers, discounts, and add-ons at discounted rates, leading to increased conversions, Average Order Value, and enhanced business profitability.
The team also advised us to leverage other channels such as Email, WhatsApp, and SMS to re-engage churned and existing customers respectively through personalized yet promotional messaging across multiple channels, including sending exciting coupon codes. This strategy helped us upsell related add-on products to users who had booked a flight ticket with us.
With these implementations, we observed a 10.4% spike in the conversion rate and a 12X boost in overall business ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: 3x more conversions with Insider's Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Prior to using Insider's GMP, we were searching for a tool that could help us reach out to our customers even when they're not on our website. With Insider's dynamic content based notifications, we were able to reach out to our target customers based on their browsing history, pending items in their cart, abandoned cart, and more. This technology helped us send price drop alerts to them to re-engage with them and create purchase urgency.

The implementation of this groundbreaking idea into our marketing strategy got us more conversions. To further expand our reach and encourage them to visit our website and check out our product and offering, we used Insider's other channels including Email and SMS that also helpedus get quite a few customers. In a limited time span, our CR spiked by 3x thanks to Insider's support team that guided us to implement everything in no time, without the support of the development team.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We found Insider's web push technology to have been very helpful in maximizing our marketing efforts. The tool came with a frequency capping feature that helped us control how many times a notification needed to be sent to a particular user.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's Web Push, Email, and SMS channels helped us:
- Expand our customer reach
- Send out alerts to users regarding their pending cart items, price drop, items back in stock, etc
- Target our customers across different channels
- Grow our email subscriber base
- Drive 3x more conversions

all_reviews.review_title: 4.5X ROI and 28% uplift in CR - All thanks to Insider's CDP
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Since we had a vast volume of customer data available with us, we were on the lookout for a tool that's capable of unifying data on a single level. That's when we got to know about Insider as a solution that's capable of solving all the problems that marketers and growth managers face. After using Insider's tools like CDP, Architect, etc for some time now, we are happy that these tools offer marketers the ease to collect and collate data on one platform, providing them the convenience of reaching out to a wide set of audience in a short span of time. From integration and implementation to execution and result monitoring, we've been impressed with every aspect of Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We understand that a single tool isn't just enough to cover everything. However, when we came across Insider, we were blown away with the  remarkable capabilities of its growth management platform. While initially, it did take some time to understand and integrate different tools and channels, it wasn't too challenging or time consuming because Insider's support team was readily available to guide us at every step.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a platform that could automate cross-channel marketing efforts and help us streamline and personalize our CX. Since we were struggling with data silos across different platforms, we needed a solution that could unify our data and enable us to build 1:1 experiences for our target customers. That's when we found Insider, a Growth Management Platform that's CDP tool offered us the fastest TTV without the support of IT teams. As suggested by team Insider, we also leveraged their Architect tool, an AI-powered customer journey builder that helped us track journeys for each customer throughout the browsing session. Within a few days of implementation, we were able to migrate entire data to a single platform and create individualized customer experiences, which further resulted in 4.5x ROI and 28% increase in conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: 4X Email Open Rates with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As an online grocery and daily needs store we have a big product line-up. To manage the promotions well we have been using many tools from Insider like their journey orchestration tool - The Architect, Mobile App, and Email. Among all my favorites has been the Email tool. Earlier our email campaigns were not personalized and more in a mass mail format. Due to this the email open rates were poor and the entire email promotion exercise futile.
Insider's deep segmentation and user behavior analysis capabilities coupled with their easy to use templates enabled us to launch personalized automated email campaigns that truly resonated with our audience and the templates helped us save a lot of time and effort. Our email open rates improved significantly and so did our sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, tracking the conversion rates and understanding the workflow automation of Insider's tools was a challenge. However, the team at Insider worked closely with us as one of our own to help us understand the tool inside-out and we were able to understand the workflows and track conversions pretty soon.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Given the fact we deal in groceries and daily needs items the product range we offer is not only diverse but it's also huge. However, the overall engagement and conversion levels were not satisfactory. This is because product discovery from this huge product catalog was a challenge for most of our app users and website visitors. We were unable to segment our user base and send them email and notifications that would interest them.

In a nutshell, we were dealing with low engagement, low email open rates, a very high bounce rate on our website, and a high drop rate on our mobile app. Insider's growth marketing team suggested we use Architect - their journey orchestration tool, Mobile App and Email with deep segmentation capabilities.

These 3 tools helped us segment our customers and run personalized campaigns with content they could resonate with. As a result our email open rates saw a 4x uplift, making product discovery easier. Using Architect we could send out the right message at the right time across email, SMS, notifications and web push. All of this enabled us to get better conversion and more revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: Observed a 25% uplift in conversions with Insider's WhatsApp, SMS, and email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As a travel business, our primary goal has always been to drive higher conversions through our website rather than simply obtaining clicks. Before using Insider, reaching a larger user base was challenging. However, after onboarding Insider, their account managers and growth team recommended that we utilize their WhatsApp marketing solution. And guess what? We succeeded in delighting our customers with superlative experiences.
By using their WhatsApp tool, we were able to send out promotional messages on one of the most-loved messaging platforms, alerting customers to discounts and offers on travel. While we recognized that WhatsApp is a crucial communication channel in today's times, to ensure that we don't miss any of our customers, we decided also to use their SMS and Email channels to provide discount updates. These strategies boosted our on-site conversions by 25% and ultimately increased our revenue and growth.

What do you dislike about Insider?
In the beginning, the platform seemed a bit difficult to understand since there are a number of products in their product suite. But their support team is super helpful and enables us tailor our marketing strategy to ensure positive business outcomes.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider proved to be quite useful for us. With just one platform, we got everything we needed in terms of acquiring, engaging, and retaining our customers while also generating greater return on investment. When we decided to choose Insider, we were a little skeptical about our decision but after witnessing significant improvements in our travel business' metrics, we found it to be one of the wisest choices as with changing customer needs, preferences, and demands, the platform helped us optimize our user experiences and achieve desired business outcomes.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's support teams are the most humble, knowledgeable, and proactive individuals we've ever worked with. Based on their suggestions, we opted for the Web Suite, Mobile App, and Recommendation tools. The personalized recommendation engine enabled our business to offer suitable products, content, and experience suggestions to our customers across all channels.
Using artificial intelligence and machine learning, the system analyzed customer data, including browsing history, purchase history, and demographics, to understand their preferences and interests. We used this data to better understand our customers' behaviors and recommend relevant home and furniture products to them. This positively impacted our items sales.

We are more than happy to recommend Insider to brands looking to improve their marketing campaigns. We're very satisfied with our choice to go with Insider.
