Our customer conversion rates were not satisfactory. We couldn't convert our website visitors into customers. We reached out to the Insider team and explained the problem. Their response was both immediate and impressive with their actions. The Web Suite, Mobile App, and recommendation engine all worked seamlessly together.
Before partnering with Insider, our mobile website was underutilized because we couldn't capitalize on its traffic. But using Insider's personalization capabilities, we have improved the user experience, which in turn has seen an improvement in the conversion rates. Thanks to Insider for making this possible.

all_reviews.review_title: A game changer: we work with greater efficiency and build closer relationships with customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider gives us the power to accelerate changes on the site, and the freedom to experiment without reliance on our dev/IT teams. This saves us huge amounts of time, making our team more productive and giving us more scope to advance and evolve.

Insider's cross-channel customer journey builder Architect allows us to have more touch points with our customers, providing more information, and more of what makes Picniq Picniq. We're able to create closer connections and trigger more relevant, personalised interactions that are more meaningful, and less transactional.

Having face to face meetings with the customer success team has been so useful. The team is so helpful and dedicating to ensuring that we get the most out of the platform.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Getting our head around what is possible and being fully educated on the platform took a while. We would have liked the onboarding process to be faster, starting with small bite size chunks. The support team are very responsive but often there's quite a lot of back and forth to find the right solution.

When taking on a product like Insider, I would definitely recommend doing your research beforehand to really understand what it is you're trying to achieve. Some of the concepts can be tricky to grasp from day one and there are so many possibilities that it's easy to get distracted. So make sure you have a firm grasp on your north star statements, drive towards those goals, and work with the Insider team to achieve them.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a platform to help us know and understand our customers better. The way the platform combines a CDP, aggregating our data, and an activation layer rich with personalisation was really attractive to us.

WhatsApp has been a game changer for us. Our customers are busy families and this 1:1 channel allows us to build a close consultative relationship with our customer base. In just six months we now conduct 80% of our customer service correspondence via WhatsApp and we're really excited to be launching more and more marketing messages via this channel to drive further conversions and revenue

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers features that have helped our business grow tremendously. Their suite of products such as Architect, Web Personalization, etc. has also been extremely beneficial in helping us elevate the web and app experience and improve the bottom line of our business.

Our customer retention and conversion rates increased. Over a period of time, we saw a 5.3X ROI in no time, which was a huge success for us.

To sum up, we're delighted with the level of support and the results we have achieved using Insider's platform.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Although we are quite satisfied with the platform's features and capabilities, there have been instances where resolving minor issues took longer than expected. But eventually, the team made considerable progress in reducing this delay and became more prompt and efficient in providing solutions. We at Mihyar, are overall satisfied with the platform's performance and the support offered by Insider's team.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before we started using Insider, we had a major issue: we couldn't create personalized experiences for our website visitors and mobile app users. It was frustrating, to say the least. But thanks to Insider's tools like web personalization, Web Push, and AI-backed customer journey builder (Architect). Leveraging these tools, we were able to trigger user journeys based on unique user behavior on our website as well as app, and target customers with relevant messages across different communication channels.

The result: We were able to deliver seamless and individualized experiences to our web visitors and app users, and the engagement rates on our website and mobile app grew exponentially.

Another issue, we noticed that the number of app users was dropping significantly, which was a matter of concern for us. But thankfully, Insider's Growth Consultants suggested using their Mobile App channel, which offers features such as push notifications, in-app messages, and personalized product recommendations.

all_reviews.review_title: Centralized customer data management doubled our business ROI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's CDP's Identity Resolution Management feature impressed us the most. By identifying and linking customer data from multiple sources, it created a unified customer profile for us. This enabled us to obtain a complete view of each customer and their interactions with our brand.

Using the CDP, we can now stay on top of data collection, gathering customer information from sources such as email addresses, phone numbers, and customer IDs.

This has made our management considerably easier. In addition to the CDP, we chose the Architect and Email tools, and neither failed to impress us. We experienced a significant increase in our business ROI as our marketing operations became more streamlined.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are very happy that we chose Insider as our growth development partner. They exceeded our expectations.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before working with Insider, our data experiences were siloed. We couldn't deliver personalized experiences to our customers. However, the Insider CDP, Email and Architect tools completely transformed this situation.
Marketing automation across channels became straightforward. We can now create automated campaigns in minutes, with both simple triggers, such as "subscribed," and complex ones like "browse abandonment," "price change," and "back in stock." Using the "Next Best Channel" feature, we have been able to reach each user on their preferred communication channel. This targeted approach ensures we connect with users on the right channel, preventing us from overwhelming them with messages.

all_reviews.review_title: Cart abandonment reduced by 30%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Among all the tools that we used, the best one in our opinion is the Web Push. Earlier our customers added products to the cart but very few completed their purchase, as a result the cart abandonment rates were quite high which honestly was a bummer and demotivating. Using the Web Push, Email, and SMS tools by Insider we were able to send out the notifications with special offers bang on time which pushed them to complete their purchase.

The web push in particular was instrumental in getting more sales closures as the web push was sent while the customers were still on the website browsing other products. The push was a reminder in a subtle non-intrusive way prompting them to finish their purchase.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are very happy with the results we achieved and the support we got, nothing to complain about. Would highly recommend Insider.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our cart abandonment rates were alarmingly high which was very disappointing to say the least. The Insider suite of tools (Web push, email, SMS) were instrumental in reducing our cart abandonment rates by 30% and significantly uplifting our sales. Not only did Insider help us increase our sales but also made sure we have a happy and motivated team.

all_reviews.review_title: An essential tool for driving engagement and onsite conversions, with limitless potential
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing about working with Insider is the huge variety of campaigns we can activate, there are so many possibilities. As well as launching multiple campaigns, we can run A/B tests, optimize user experiences, and much more

The regular calls we have with our dedicated customer success manager play a huge role in making this a great partnership. These interactions give us an opportunity to discuss our goals and fine-tune our strategies to get the best outcomes. The team is always super happy to help and give ideas and advice on getting the most out of the platform.

My advice for any potential Insider user is don't be afraid to ask for training from Insider's team. Always reach out to the technical support team, they are very willing to help. Be precise about what you're looking to achieve and rest assured that Insider's team have the expertise and experience to make it happen!

What do you dislike about Insider?
The templates are brilliant and so easy to implement, but there's sometimes a long wait time for custom developments.

It would have been useful to have more training workshops earlier in the onboarding process. The team have been so helpful in showing me things so I can work on the platform independently, I just wish I'd had that sooner.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Insider platform is an essential tool for driving engagement and onsite conversions. Its 1:1 personalized product recommendations aid product discovery and vastly increase average order value.

Its A/B testing capabilities allow us to build better user experiences and maximize the performance of every element on the site. The easy-to-use templates, such as countdown timers and social proofing, help us create urgency amongst customers and speed up the path to purchase.

Simple personalization campaigns can make a big impact.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect platform to improve over business' bottomline
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
There are several features that we like about Insider, and some of these include:

1. An extremely helpful support team that resolves queries in a timely and professional manner.

2. An easy to use platform enabling us to create great marketing campaigns.

3. The Architect tool which enables us to track customer journeys and buying behavior across channels like WhatsApp, Web Push, Email etc for individual customers in real time. This helps us gain deep insights into the journey basis which we are able to modify our campaign strategy and target customers across various touch points with the right messaging.

4. Implementing Instory and Smart Recommender feature which helped us improve onsite experiences for customers and showcase relevant products to them, which further boosted our website engagement rates.

5. Predefined cart abandonment template which enabled us to nudge  customers on time to complete purchasing the gaming products that they have already added to their cart.

6.Launching amazing push campaigns in just a few clicks that saves us a lot of time and effort.

7. Web and Mobile Suite that helped  improve onsite experiences, and led to a 9X spike in our ROI.

8. The email editor with its prebuilt templates with drag & drop elements made creating versatile campaigns quick and easy and helped drive conversions.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, we had to spend a lot of time on the platform to learn how to create campaigns and make them better. However, their Growth Management team was available 24*7  to support and guide us throughout the process. We're glad that we onboarded Insider as our growth partner.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a video game retail company, our main focus was always selling our products. But we observed that we could not deliver great onsite experiences to our customers visiting our website. That's when we decided to use Insider's tools and their capabilities to improve our desktop and mobile website experiences.

With the recommendations of their Account and Growth Management teams, we utilized their various tools including Architect, Instory, Web Push, Smart Recommender, Email, and Mobile and Web Suite to make end-to-end improvements, right from driving customers to the website, keeping them engaged, and influencing their decision to purchase our products. Within a few months, we were able to boost our conversion rates and drive onsite incremental revenue of 150.000 EUR in Q2. Not just that, our ROI was increased by 9 times.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider increased our Subscriber Base by 32%, CTR by 13%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Including Email and SMS with personalized messaging that converts, was a huge challenge for us. When we came to know about Insider as a Growth Management Platform and its excellent track record of helping businesses from various industries achieve their marketing goals, we were really impressed with the platform's capabilities.

To begin with, we decided to leverage the solutions that could help us communicate with our customers in a more personalized and efficient way. After understanding our requirements, their team recommended we use their Architect tool to test the journeys, see how they would operate and how customers would receive the messages. After getting a hang of it, we decided to use the channel to reach out to customers across different messaging channels including Email and SMS nurture them and notify them and notify them about the offers on electronic products in real-time. Happy to say that we achieved excellent results. We observed a 28% spike in conversion rates, leading to a 23x spike in quarterly sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Choosing Insider as our growth partner has been one of the best business decisions we have made. Working closely with team Insider, we found their growth and account managers to be highly detail oriented and supportive throughout the collaboration. With their continued support and guidance, we were able to monitor our business performance and growth in real time and honestly, after implementing Insider's solutions, it's been massive. We look forward to working with them again and using their other channels and tools to take our business to the next level.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's email automation channel also helped us stay more engaged with our target customers and bring high traffic to our website within just two months of time. The collection banner on our email also enabled us to increase our subscriber base by about 32%.In addition, using this channel, we were able to deliver highly personalized emails to our target customers that not only improved the product discovery but also uplifted our AOV by 18% and reduced cart abandonment by 10%.

By enabling us to send us emails at the right time to the right set of customers with the right messaging, we saw a significant increase of 13% in our CTR (click-through rate).

all_reviews.review_title: Hyper personalized onsite experiences delivered using Insider's tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
It's impressive how Insider enables you to design personalized web experiences tailored to individual user attributes. By using the Web Suite, Mobile App, and Recommendation tools, we gained a better understanding of our customers. These tools allowed us to segment users, launch complex, design-rich customizations, and conduct conversion optimization tests with minimal coding. The best part was that we could adjust the templates to any screen size, making it feel almost magical to design and expand our personalization strategies effortlessly. This made our home and furniture website look unique compared to our competitors.

What do you dislike about Insider?
From the moment we began working with Insider up to now, we've seen a threefold increase in our business ROI. We are very happy working with Insider.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before working with Insider, we knew we could utilize our website better and wanted a partner to assist us in achieving this goal. Since implementing interest-based personalized onsite experiences for our customers, we've seen an increase in conversion rates and customer retention. We've also noticed a decrease in bounce rates because when customers see content relevant to them, they're more engaged and likely to make a purchase. Insider provided a wealth of ready-made templates and engaging, game-like options to select from. We managed to expand our personalization efforts swiftly with minimal effort on our part.

all_reviews.review_title: 60% uplift in conversions with Insider's GMP (Cross-channel marketing solution)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using the Web Suite, Mobile App, and Web Push by Insider for quite sometime now. All the three tools have helped us increase our sales and overall business revenue significantly. But if I had to pick one favorite it has to be Web Suite and I will tell you why. We are an online marketplace and the categories of products we offer are huge. Despite having what customers want, we were unable to meet our sales targets as finding the right products was a challenge for the customers.
The growth managers at Insider suggested us to implement Web Suite which totally transformed the way our website looked and functioned making it very user-friendly. As a result, product discovery was easy, sales increased and customers were finally happy. Our conversions went up by 60% within a month.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The growth managers at Insider are experts at what they do and suggest personalized solutions specific to our business. A more business specific tailored library would be a great value add though.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being an online marketplace, we have a wide category and further sub-category of products. However, we were seeing a lot of cases of cart abandonment, high bounce rate, old customers not engaging with us anymore and so on. This was very disheartening and hence we knew that we needed to take some strong steps to fix this. We then approached Insider. They suggested we use their Web suite, Mobile App, and Web Push. By leveraging these we could achieve the following:We were able to transform our web store's look and feel thanks to Web Suite. Product discovery became much easier.
*By using magic banners we were able to showcase offers and products personalized to a specific user.
*Mobile App helped simplify our app and deliver a pleasant user experience
*Much like Instagram we were able to run personalized  beautiful stories using the InStory feature recommending products, ongoing offers, and more.
Using Smart Overlays on Mobile App we displayed attractive discounts at check-out encouraging customers to buy more.
*Web Push helped us send timely notifications on back in stock products, on-going deals, and more.

All-in-all Insider helped us increase our conversion rate by 60% and we can't be happier.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Running themed promotions on our website have always been our go-to strategy, especially for the holiday season. Insider's library is full of smart promotional templates that we could easily leverage to promote our seasonal offers while boosting conversions and revenue. One of our favorites has been the scratch-to-win countdown timer coupon that we triggered for visitors playing and browsing on the mobile web. The coupon was Christmas themed and when it was scratched, their discount was revealed. We were thrilled to see our conversion uplift by simply leveraging the Christmas theme and gamified experiences.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing at all really. Insider's team has always helped us with optimized strategies and possible solutions in case we hit a roadblock anywhere while implementing anything.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
While we always had a very structured approach to driving promotions with well-laid-out web pages. Our focus was to drive conversion uplifts for specific platforms like mobile. And, Insider helped us get this focus right with templates that could be deployed there. We also wanted to go beyond standard strategies to distribute promotions, and interactive templates like scratch coupons, wheel of fortune etc. helped us gamify the experience for the customer.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been collaborating with Insider for some time, and we're thoroughly impressed with their performance. Their marketing automation product suite stands out as one of the best in the market. We've used their Web Suite, Mobile App, and CDP tools.

With the CDP's Unified Customer Data feature, we effectively collected customer information from various sources, both online and offline. This tool provided us with the capability to enrich our customer profiles automatically by consolidating data from these diverse sources, streamlining our user management.

The Architect enabled us to craft cross-channel campaigns with ease.

We now engage our users not just on our website and mobile app but also through web push, SMS, and WhatsApp. A big thank you to Insider for their invaluable support.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's Web Suite made it easy for us to launch pop-up campaigns. Using pop-up windows we promoted products, collected leads, and encouraged users to sign up for our newsletters. This strategy increased our customer engagement rates by 28%. We're very happy with our choice to partner with Insider and have no complaints.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider has played a pivotal role in enhancing the effectiveness of our campaigns, leading to improved lead generation, sales, and ultimately, revenue. We were particularly impressed by the Web Suite tool for the following reasons:

- Responsive templates automatically adjusted to a user's screen size, ensuring our website looked appealing across all devices.
- The Cookieless personalization feature doesn't rely on cookies to track user behavior, boosting our customers' trust while giving us deeper insights into their behavior.
- The Action Builder allowed us to create custom actions for our campaigns without burdening our team with coding complexities.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been working with Insider for some time now and what we really enjoy as a team is Insider's ability to give traditional messaging channels a modern twist with engaging features.

Creating email campaigns with Insider's modular email editor is super easy. It's just a matter of dragging and dropping elements like coupons, real-time timers, and recommendations. With we combine these elements with Insider's segmentation capabilities, we get super individualized, converting email campaigns.

What do you dislike about Insider?
So far, we've seen pretty outstanding results from minimal campaigns which has made our expectations go over the roof. With what I've seen so far, I'm confident those expectations will be met.

Now that we are leveraging elements like coupons, real-time timers, and carousels, we are seeing higher engagement for our emails. Our email campaigns now encourage customers to conversion.

We noticed that a good chunk of customers were dropping off without making a purchase but we were struggling with figuring out the exact reason for the drop offs. So for this we need a solution that could help us gather customer feedback.After consulting with Insider, we were suggested to implement an exit-intent survey overlay on our website which included a few questions to understand the reason for leaving. From these overlays, we got to know that the customers were facing difficulties finding the product they were actually looking for.

What do you dislike about Insider?

These strategic implementations suggested by Insider reduced our drop off rates by 12% and increased website engagement rates by 4 times.

all_reviews.review_title: Maximized engagement and conversions with Insider's personalization capabilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We like Insider as a whole because all their tools come with great functionality enabling marketers to solve the toughest of their marketing challenges with AI-backed automation tools. Before we started using Insider we were experiencing poor engagement rates on our website as well as app. Also, delivering 1:1 experiences to our website visitors and app users wasn't easy because we had no clue on how to track user journeys for individual users and identify where exactly our customers were dropping off. After we discussed this problem with Insider, their support team provided us with some great suggestions. As advised by them, we utilized their web suite to optimize the layout of our website and also used their dynamic category optimizer to make category search seamless for our potential customers.

To create personalized onsite experiences, their team recommended we use their Architect tool to determine unique user behavior, identify their interests and preferences. The integration was quite seamless in that we were able to get a detailed 360-degree view of our customers and create individualized campaigns for a unique set of customers. After 2 months of applying these recommendations, our user drop off rates decreased drastically and our sales became 4x.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Partnering with Insider was one of the best decisions that we've ever made. All the tools and channels they suggested we use were simple and allowed fast integration. Happy that we used Insider as the platform helped us achieve noticeable results - improve CX, boost conversions.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previously, we were struggling to deliver personalized experiences to our customers and optimize categorization on our website and mobile app. Because of this, our customers were facing difficulties finding the products they actually wanted to buy and losing interest during the search process. Problems like these were leading to increased drop offs and poor conversions. But when Insider came into the picture, they gave us a few amazing recommendations including page and category optimization.By implementing these changes with the help of Insider's help, our visitors and app users started engaging on both the channels, resulting in improved engagement and retention rates. Not only this, we became successful in delighting our customers with personalized experiences, which as a result maximized our conversions.

The results were fast and we saw our user engagement and conversions increase by leap and bounds.

all_reviews.review_title: Created great customer personalization using Insider's user friendly platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The dedicated hands-on support from our Account manager made implementing Insider's product easy. The Insider team is also great at constantly recommending improvements and changes to the campaigns that we are running.

What do you dislike about Insider?
In the beginning, we experienced some issues with the onboarding of a few products. The Insider team was always available to guide and support us, the implementation didn't seem difficult. Overall, we like the products and their functionalities, but their Messaging channel didn't bring results as expected, especially in terms of revenue. But this is not much of a problem because we have observed great improvements in other key metrics.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our primary focus has always been on providing our customers with a personalized, excellent, and omnichannel experience. Therefore, we wanted a Unified Customer Platform that can enable us to unify all our customer data in one single platform. During our search for a platform that can allow us to get a unified view of our customer's data, we got to know about Insider. After getting to know about their innovative technologies, we realized that Insider can be our ideal solution.

As we wanted to deliver excellent stellar CX, the Growth Management Team at Insider suggested we use their Web and Mobile Personalization tool so as to make product discovery easier and seamless for our web or mobile users. The team also advised us to take advantage of their AI-backed customer journey builder, Architect, to track customer behavior across various touch points, and create advanced customer segments to target customers on the right channel, at the right time, with the right messaging using Email and Web Push suite. Within just a few weeks, we were able to drive more conversions.

As we have numerous products listed on our website and mobile app, finding relevant products was a big hassle for our customers. To improve product discovery, the Insider team suggested we use their Smart Recommendation Engine and with this implementation, we observed a massive boost in engagement and conversion rates, which further increased the incremental revenue many folds.

all_reviews.review_title: Digital presence revolutionalized with Insider's comprehensive Growth Management Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's suite of tools helped us approach our digital marketing strategy with a fresh perspective. The Web Suite has facilitated the creation of personalized, interest-based onsite experiences that have led to a better ROI. Insider's gamified templates and InStory played an instrumental role in driving ROI growth. We also liked their Mobile App channel as it is enriched with Insider's predictive segmentation that hyper-targets our users, enhancing engagement and retention rates. The Web Push and Email tools have enabled us to leverage dynamic content, user attributes, and product attributes for individualized customer journeys. Insider's Mobile App functionality has given us an edge by allowing us to engage with our mobile users effectively. The features like push notifications and in-app messages have significantly improved our mobile app user engagement and retention.

What do you dislike about Insider?
As we were getting started, we needed a little bit of assistance with Web Push notifications and the tool's segmentation capabilities. Insider's team was extremely helpful and provided clear guidance, making the process smoother. We look forward to leveraging their other tools in future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider has played a crucial role in resolving several critical challenges that we were facing. The Web Suite has helped us provide highly tailored experiences to our website visitors and improve onsite conversions by implementing tools such as  Smart Banners to drive more conversions during special campaigns. Additionally, we were finding it challenging to categorize our vast range of products on our own. With the help of the Insider's team, we implemented their Dynamic Category Optimizer and AI-backed Smart Recommendation engine on our website, which made product discovery easy and relevant for our users. Within a few weeks, we were able to enhance the overall layout of our website, resulting in higher engagement and increased conversions. As we were struggling with improving engagement and retention rates on our mobile application, Insider suggested we leverage their Mobile App channel, enablinling us to deliver a stellar experience to our app users. Bringing back churned users to our website and mobile application was a challenge, using Insider's Email channel to send out automated email campaigns helped us overcome this issue in a short span of time. We were particularly impressed with drag-and-drop elements such as real-time timers and coupons, which increased conversion rates as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Customer Engagement Boosted across the Messaging Channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using Insider's suite of marketing tools, including email, SMS, and mobile app marketing, for quite some time now, and the impact on our overall business has been quite positive. We love how easy it is to create and send personalized messages to our customers based on their behavior and interests. The drag-and-drop email builder has made creating visually appealing emails a cakewalk.

At the same time, the SMS and mobile app messaging capabilities have allowed us to reach customers on-the-go and in real-time. The data analytics and reporting features have also been incredibly helpful in tracking engagement and ROI.

What do you dislike about Insider?
So far there have been no major issues with Insider's email, SMS, and mobile app marketing tools. Getting a hang of some of their more advanced features is a steep learning curve, but the support team has been responsive and helpful in guiding us through any questions or issues we have encountered.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before using Insider's email, SMS, and mobile app marketing tools, we were finding it difficult to engage our customers across multiple channels effectively. With these tools, we have created personalized and targeted campaigns that have increased customer engagement and loyalty. The real-time messaging capabilities have been especially effective in driving immediate actions, such as purchases or sign-ups. Additionally, the data analytics and reporting features have helped us optimize our campaigns and improve ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: High conversions with Insider's CDP and Personalization solution - Amazing results!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using Architect, Customer Data Platform, Email, SMS, and WhatsApp by Insider. The Customer Data Platform, or CDP, assisted us in organizing all of our data by gathering data from several sources and compiling it into a single location which is my favourite. The Architect tool has made it simple to launch promotional campaigns across several channels and at scale. Email, SMS, and WhatsApp are now automated and triggered automatically with relevant messaging depending on customer behaviour. Customers get the right triggers at the right time which have helped us get good conversions.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Architect has enabled us to create a truly personalized experience for each individual customer and thus added a human touch which is often missing in the digital space.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to reach customers across channels and not intimidating them was a challenge. We were unclear on when and how frequently to send triggers. The objective was to build a promotional strategy that was subtle and non-intrusive but also one that stood out. Insider's CDP, Architect, Email, SMS, and WhatsApp tools collectively helped us achieve all of this and more. Insider's cutting-edge technology enables us to communicate with each customer in the way they prefer and also plan a robust strategy on how to reach out to different customers at different stages of the buying process. We have been successful in making our promotions more effective by better knowing our customers' expectations which has in turn piqued customers' interest in what we have to offer. The outcome is more conversions and higher profitability.

all_reviews.review_title: Expensive but all-in-one function does not require switching between multiple platforms.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
**All-in-one function does not require switching between multiple platforms.
**Fortunately, I met a positive and optimistic customer success manager. ( yeh...I mean who Jessica Wu.)

What do you dislike about Insider?
**Expensive.(Insurmountable in the early stages)

**In Taiwan, e-commerce is an industry that places great emphasis on efficiency, which means it must be fast. However, it is obvious that Insider is a foreign company in the local area. Many services require support from the headquarters, but there are still regional time differences. However, Insider was recently established in Taiwan. branch, hoping to overcome this problem sooner.

**At the beginning of the cooperation, it was stated that customer information before the cooperation could not be entered into the data platform. However, when it was planned not to continue using Insider in the near future, it was stated that past information could be entered. Not sure where the standards are?

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
There is no significant improvement in performance, but it coincides with the unblocking of the covid-19 epidemic, the flow of people returns to offline, and the balance between online and offline is regained.

Therefore, it is impossible to directly prove the performance improvement. In addition, it is expensive and the enterprise has a large expenditure burden. Under the influence of many factors, I think it is not a good time to use Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Gurgencler Insider Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our business operates in both online and offline mode. While delivering great in-store customer experience, providing the same experience online was a challenge. But after partnering with Insider, we were able to smoothly navigate this challenge. When we discussed our primary challenge with Insider's growth team, they suggested we use their web suite's onsite personalization capabilities to improve our website's UX and create individualized experiences for our website visitors.To incorporate personalization, we used Insider's smart banners on our website's homepage to display discounts and offers on products along with the coupon code. This helped us attract customers to explore our products and purchase the one they're most interested in. We also implemented product comparisons that resulted in enhanced engagement rates and improved customers' likelihood to purchase one of the products out of compared ones and sometimes purchase more than 1 product. To further alert users about the limited period offers, we used Insider's Web Push technology that created a sense of urgency and FOMO among our visitors and encouraged them to take action at the earliest. By implementing these strategic solutions, we saw substantial increase in cart size and AOV. In just a few months, our CR and business profitability grew massively.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider has got the best product and support team and it was a wonderful experience working closely with such dedicated professionals. The only thing that I can mention here is that there could be more creative and attractive industry-specific visualizations but that's just a suggestion, overall we're really happy and satisfied with the capabilities of Insider's products.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using Insider's tools, we were able to successfully:
- Provide our website visitors with great CX
- Enabled us implement personalization on our website to create
- Turn website visitors into paying customers
- Increase AOV
- Boost engagement and conversion rates

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's personalization led to a 52.80%  increase in promo email open rate
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We had a fantastic experience using Insider's Product Recommendation solution, Smart Recommender product, which delivered outstanding results for us. One of the key aspects we appreciated about the tool was its utilization of a diverse range of algorithms to monitor users' interactions on every page and provide tailored product recommendations based on users' possible interests. The tool's capabilities not only enabled us to generate high-quality leads but also led to a remarkable improvement in our conversion rate and a significant increase in our Average Order Value.

Working closely with Insider's team of growth professionals has been truly rewarding. Their support has played a pivotal role in enhancing the overall performance of our business and driving a better Return on Investment (ROI).

What do you dislike about Insider?
At the start, we noticed that their scripts weren't working seamlessly on our website and this made it difficult to track the revenue. However, the Insider team managed to resolve this issue in a bit of time.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before we started working with Insider, our conversion rates were quite low and cart abandonment rates were high. After discussing this issue with Insider, they advised us to use their Smart Recommendation engine to highlight trending products and showcase recently viewed items to our users. This strategy enabled us to create personalized recommendations across channels and encourage our users to check out our products and make a purchase.

We used the same strategy to run automated email recommendation campaigns to reach the right set of customers at the right time. Targeting customers by displaying trending products and alerting them about the products they had added to their carts increased our online conversions and significantly decreased cart abandonment rates. By implementing a recommendation strategy, we were able to achieve 52.80% of Promotional Email Open Rates, which further enabled us to generate better ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: Amplified click-through rates by 7% with Insider's email solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
To begin with, let's just say that we love our collaboration with Insider. Insider's comprehensive point system, real-time analytics, and user-level dashboard provide us with a holistic view of our marketing efforts. With Insider's real-time data-capturing capabilities, we succeeded in filtering and accessing different data points specific to our customers, allowing us to gain valuable insights into their behaviors, preferences, and engagement patterns. And that's not all! We count on Insider's reports to analyze crucial subscriber metrics such as opt-in rates and uninstall tracking. These insights help us gauge the effectiveness of our email campaigns and make necessary adjustments to improve our overall performance.

WhatsApp has proven to be an exceptional channel in terms of delivering an impressive return on investment (ROI) in a remarkably short span of time. Insider's Cart Reminder Push Notifications have proven to be remarkably successful in helping us achieve our revenue objectives and enhancing the retention of our mobile app users. These targeted push notifications serve as effective reminders, encouraging users to complete their abandoned purchases and driving revenue growth. Insider's exclusive in-app recommendations have played a pivotal role in revitalizing our merchandising strategy, resulting in impressive outcomes. With a much-needed nudge from personalized recommendations, we have been able to optimize product offerings and deliver tailored experiences that resonate with our users, ultimately leading to higher customer engagement and improved business performance.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have genuinely enjoyed utilizing the tool thus far and have not encountered any aspects that we dislike. As we march into more intricate use cases and workflows, we eagerly anticipate exploring Insider's other product offerings. We are convinced that Insider's offerings will provide us with the necessary capabilities to design and execute complex customer journeys and tighten our marketing efforts substantially.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
When we didn't know about Insider and its products, our marketing and analytics team was unable to break the barriers of user responsiveness. Especially across multiple media channels such as watch video, hang out rooms, and audio rooms, our team was unable to engage, influence, and convert new users productively.

To change this situation, we called on Insider's Mobile App Suite to save the day with their versatile templates that have been instrumental in capturing opt-in consent for communication channels such as WhatsApp and SMS at crucial touch points along the buyer journey. This allowed us to interact with our customers in a compliant and seamless fashion. As a result, our subscriber base has experienced significant growth of 20%, thanks to Insider's Mobile app push tool.

On another note, even our Email campaigns were suffering a severe downtime because of high bounce rates and minimal click-throughs. Our email domain was weak and lacked the efficiency it needed to captivate our users effectively. To our pleasant surprise, Insider's Modular Email Editor aided in setting up and launching an attention-grabbing email campaign with incredible ease. After running a quick spam test, we got our email domain reputation back on track and increased click-through rates to open emails by 7%.

Moreover, they're quite responsive and take the time to explain solutions in a clear and concise manner, ensuring that we were satisfied with the solutions and recommendations they provided.

The proactive suggestions from Insider's growth consultants were extremely helpful in enabling us to trigger personalized campaigns. After partnering with Insider, we witnessed that in just one year, we witnessed an ROI of 9.26x.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing major that we dislike, but in the beginning, we found Insider's ticketing system was not up to the mark and resolutions were taking a lot of time. After raising this to Insider, their team worked on it and made it efficient. Overall, we're glad that we onboarded them as our growth partner as with the support of their team, we have been able to achieve desired results.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before onboarding Insider, we were experiencing poor product discovery resulting in high abandoned rates. After understanding our issues, the Insider team suggested we use their Mobile Conversion Suite and AI-powered Smart Recommender tool. With this implementation, we were able to enable our users to narrow down their search and display the products based on their needs and preferences. As a result, the product discovery on our website was improved drastically, cart recovery and abandoned purchases were improved by 22%, and conversion rates were uplifted by 29%.

We also implemented  Insider's InStory tool on our desktop and mobile website to create social media-like stories. This implementation helped us keep our potential customers attracted, engaged, and converting them. Within just a few weeks, we observed that users who were exposed to stories were buying 25% more than those who did not.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us improve our conversion rate and the overall customer experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
By using Insider's cross-channel marketing solution, Architect, we managed to set up a solution that lets us expand and upsell to all our other domains as well. We've been able to improve our engagement and conversions by utilizing multiple communication channels. While as of now we have been working on the e-parts domain alone, we now have a working plan in place for expanding to the automotive domain by this year.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The boost in conversion and website experience has been significant and it has met our primary desire. However, we do feel that the improvement in ROI has not met the mark we expected yet. We are hoping this will pick up the pace soon, and we will reach that milestone soon enough.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since we were having difficulties improving our conversion rates, we were looking out for a solution that could help us improve user experience on our website. After getting acquainted with Insider's Web Suite, Architect, and a whole slew of products, we were able to focus on providing an individualized cross-channel customer experience to our customers which has been ideal for our business.

With the help of the Insider team, we managed to reduce our bounce rates and increase product page views. We were also experiencing high cart abandonment rates on our website and were looking for a way to address this. Using Insider's Email and Web Push Notifications technology and email campaigns, we had set up automated push notification and email targeting churned customers that had abandoned their carts. This helped us bring our churned customers back to our website and complete their purchase.

As a result, our cart abandonment rates dropped significantly, which further maximized our ROI.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We love that the platform is both unified and modular. It provides us a unified data solution and then numerous activation blocks to turn that data into campaigns and results.

We really appreciate the support from the Insider team, helping us to overcome challenges and drive strategies.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The platform could definitely load faster.

Whenever you schedule a web push for the future, you receive the same confirmation message as if you were sending straight away. It's a small thing but changing it would avoid many heart attacks.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before using Insider, we had to wait too long to make changes on the website and we were reliant on our tech team. With Insider, as marketers we have the freedom to make changes ourselves, at speed.

We have a lot of window shoppers on our site, and Insider is helping us to transform more visitors into customers.

Moving forward, we plan to expand our usage of the Insider platform to maximize retention and customer lifetime value, through Smart recommender and Insider's journey builder tool, Architect.

But with Insider's lead gathering template we could create gamified experiences and  reward new users for signing up. We could also offer first-time purchases discount codes at checkout if they signed up. The customizable templates also allowed us to add an opt-in consent box for platforms like WhatsApp and SMS at crucial points in the customer journey.Thus, we could run effective campaigns and communicate with customers on their choice of communication channel without annoying them. We could thus build a vast subscriber base and get nearly 20% uplift in new user registrations

all_reviews.review_title: 14.5% conversion rate uplift achieved on the website with Web Suite, Web Push, and Recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's AI powered recommendation engine is extremely impressive. It analyzes our customers' behavior and predicts what they might be interested in, making it easy to recommend the right products to the right customers.

The ability to personalize content and promotions with Web Push has also been a game-changer. We have been able to send push notifications that are tailored to each customer's interests, leading to higher engagement rates. These two products together have helped us see a 14.5% increase in conversion rate.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing to dislike about using Web Suite, Web Push, and recommendations beyond just understanding how to use the segmentations available to create campaigns that can deliver even better performance than what we already have.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were faced with improving the high bounce rate, low engagement, and conversion rate on our  website, even though our traffic was decently good. With Web Suite and Web Push, we were able to analyze our customers' past, real-time, and predicted behavior to make informed recommendations. This has helped us to improve our website's user experience and increase customer satisfaction.

The push notifications have also helped us to re-engage browse and cart abandoners rates by sending reminders to customers who have dropped off from our website without making any purchase. As a result, we have seen a significant improvement in engagement and a 14.5% uplift in conversion rates. Overall, using Insider has been a win-win for us and our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: 2X ROI using Insider's Web Personalization - Web Suite and Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's tool helped double our business ROI. Honestly, we didn't expect such great results in such a short period of time. Insider's team made the impossible possible. We utilized their Web Suite and Web Push tools, and they were better than we hoped. They fixed our biggest problems, like getting more users and making our website an interactive platform. The way Insider personalized the website for each visitor was a really smart move to make things better.

We could easily add things we wanted to our website and change them quickly using the Instory's element library. And their fun, game-like templates helped us get more subscribers and do it in a way that reduced our customer acquisition cost. This made our customers happy, which made us happy. Thanks to the Insider's team for their clever strategies.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Insider team did an excellent job. We're happy we picked them to work with us. We don't think anyone else could have given us the results that Insider did.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before collaborating with Insider our customer acquisition costs were high and customer retention very low. Using Insider was the best choice to fix these problems. The Web Push tool helped to bring users who aren't on our website and gets them to check out and spend time on it. This solved the low retention problem.
But that's not all. The responsive banners help us adopt a single template for both mobile and web personalization, making it easy for us to run a campaign that works everywhere. This was one of our biggest successes. What did this help us to achieve? Multiple positive results include faster conversion time, improved experience, reduced bounce rate, low CAC, and high click-through rate.

he growth management team at Insider advised us to use 'Smart Recommender' and  'InStory', we sure did and saw a 25% lift in AOV. all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic platform to improve UX across Website and Mobile App
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I like the level of support that the Insider team gives to its partners. The team walks you throughout the process, from ideation to integration to implementation of tools. Before we started working with Insider, we were not able to deliver great UX to our web and app users.

With the Insider team's suggestion, we decided to revamp our website and add certain solutions like countdown timer, coupons etc. As we run numerous special discount and limited time offers like 'bulk buy' and 'frequently bought together products' on a regular basis, we implemented a countdown timer on our website which helped us create FOMO amongst our customers and nudged them to purchase our products before the offer ends.

Also, we wanted to optimize category navigation on the homepage. Their growth consultants recommended the use of Hamburger Menu - it's a kind of secondary menu overlay which helped us grab the attention of our users and made it easy for them to redirect to relevant pages. Within the first month, we saw that our conversion rate on the website increased by 2.5% and on the app, it grew by 3.2%.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The price is somewhat higher though after seeing the results, I can definitely say that it's worth the investment.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since there are a number of products listed on our website and app, Insider has helped me place products under relevant categories. By implementing Insider's tool, I have seen significant growth in conversion rates and above all, my customers are finding it quite easy to find the products that they are actually looking for. All the implementations made user experience smooth and seamless on websites as well as the mobile app.

We recently signed up Insider and have been using many of their tools for improving our outreach, customer engagement and conversions. The tools that we have utilized include Architect, InStory, Web Push, MobileApp, and Recommender. Designing brilliant cutting edge tools is one thing, but what truly makes the difference between a good and an excellent service provider is the team's implementation and support capabilities.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider: Seasoned 'Growth Management' Product and Support team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
A good product or service is of no use if one can't utilize it in the best way possible. That's where the Insider team made the difference. Not only do they have the most advanced AI backed promotional tools, their growth consultants have the knowledge and acumen to suggest the right tools to address your pain points. For instance, we have a large customer base and not everybody has access to smartphones. Reaching out to those customers was a challenge.The growth consultants at Insider suggested using Architect - a journey orchestration tool which helps send triggers on all communication channels (Email, app, SMS, web push, notifications) across all touchpoints. This one product on top of the other tools that we were already using transformed the way we communicated with our huge customer base. That's not all, the support team held us at every juncture we kind of felt stuck.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider tools have a certain level of complexity, they are easy to use but getting a grasp on them for a first-timer can be tricky. But the support team made sure that we got over these initial hiccups without any challenge. We were able to master using and understanding the tools in no time.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didn't have a way to communicate the same message across different channels, which meant reaching out to the customer where they were was a challenge. A person for instance may be active on the web or WhatsApp at one point in time but not on email or Mobile App. This meant they missed out that special discount email or notification for the items lying in their cart that we sent.Architect helped us adopt an omnichannel messaging approach and we can't thank the Insider Growth Management team enough for recommending this tool to us. We would also like to give a special mention to the support team that helped us get a thorough understanding of each of the tools and how to utilize them to our advantage fully.

We have been using the entire Insider suite for a while now. They not only have a brilliant product for various marketing and promotional initiatives, but they also have a great customer support and growth management team.

But there's more - the self-help knowledge base that Insider has created is something else, it's a class apart. Mobile app we were able to automate the process. Their ready to use templates were easy to use and integrate and enabled our marketing teams to design captivating emails and notifications without any design and IT team support. all_reviews.review_title: Best tool for marketers to boost conversions
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Re-engaging customers was one the most critical aspects for our ecommerce business as it's a key to improving retention rates. We also noticed that we had a number of first-time visitors who were through our website but churning without leaving their contact details. Because of this, it was a challenge for us to create an efficient and personalized cross-channel strategy.

After understanding our problem, the strategic account management team at Insider suggested we opt for their cross-channel journey orchestration tool, Architect, to build unique customer journeys for individual customers and target them across different channels such as web push, emails, WhatsApp, mobile push, etc.

Happy to share that with this tool, we were able to personalize customer journeys for different customer lifecycle stages including welcome, browse abandonment, and cart abandonment. With such retargeting campaigns, our CR uplifted by 30% and that too in just 3 months of our partnership with Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It definitely took us some time to understand the features and capabilities of Insider's Architect tool but from the first month itself, we saw some major improvements in our business' key numbers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mapping customers' journey for every individual customer was a challenge for us. As we were unable to craft personalized experiences for customers, our churn rates were high and conversions were too low. For this reason, it was critical for us to gain a 360-degree view of each customer so as to personalize the communication and recommendations for them.

We also needed to identify whether they're dropping off while viewing the product, after adding products to their cart, etc. Using Insider's customer journey builder tool, we were able create better customer journeys based on each users' unique behavior and communicate with them with more personalized messaging on the right channel in order to reengage with them and convert them into paying customers.

Really happy to see significant uplift in our conversion rates and decrease in dropoffs after partnering with Insider.

Some of the other features that we leveraged and liked a lot are Social Proof, InStory, and Insider's suggestions to add responsive banners that we were able to implement on our website and mobile by using single templates. This saved us a lot of time and effort and the best thing is we were able to launch multi-channel campaigns in one go.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: The pricing for a few of their tools was somewhat high in comparison to other platforms but the capabilities that this platform brings is undoubtedly unmatched. We are highly satisfied with the results we've been able to achieve after partnering with Insider.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
- Easy to connect with customers on their most preferred channel
- Improved website and mobile app UX
- Succeeded in delivering stellar experiences to customers
- Faster integration as compared to other platforms
- Top-notch customer support

all_reviews.review_title: A really easy to use platform to set up marketing campaigns - 15% AOV increase
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
So many choices for us to choose from. Insider provides many ready to use templates for each of its products, making it very easy to setup campaigns at pace. This is apart from the custom options that are provided.

The platform is really easy and clear to use - and we also got ample support to understand its usage. Good features for previewing and testing before a campaign goes live. The analytics is very clear and easily exportable - while also giving us a good view of the performance of the campaigns.

Having weekly meetings with our customer success manager is a really great added value. It helps us have a trusted first point of call for guidance and assistance. It's really helpful.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Responsive templates have saved us so much time on creating homepage banners for multiple devices but this feature hasn't been rolled out across the whole platform yet. I hope this happens soon as it will make us more efficient.

In addition to more responsive templates, another thing that would reduce our output time would to be able to have multiple languages in the same campaigns.

The process for creating custom rules could be much more streamlined, so that we don't require as much coding or development assistance.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Most software providers help brands personalize experiences for known customers but what Insider has a step above than them is that it helped us personalize experiences for a large segment of unknown users too. This helped us increase conversions and also fetched us a higher AOV overall.

The AI powered product recommendations solution, Smart Recommender, helped us show "Recently Viewed" products at an important section, and this provided users an improved navigation, while also increasing AOV by 15% and conversion rates by 43%. The "top brand" placement on the homepage delivered a 10% average order value uplift and a 28% conversion rate uplift.  It was also super helpful in showing recommendations on the "404 / no product found pages" where the risk of user drop-off is quite high.

The abandoned cart web push messages helped us drive traffic back to the website while it also generated a 7 figure revenue (EUR) for us in just 6 months.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider kept getting our customers back for more and more purchases
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our marketing team was doing a great job of running campaigns however our website failed to captivate the audience since we were not able to maximize to show personalized experiences. The web suite from Insider changed the game thanks to their Personalize It Yourself kit.

Their journey orchestration tool helped us in tracking customer behavior and preferences and enabled us to display captivating and responsive results on the website ensuring the customers stayed and discovered more. All of this together helped us generate double the sales from our previous quarter.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were spoiled for choice with Insider, so many templates and tools to choose from, one of the best marketing solutions in the market. No complaints at all

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Holding the customers' interest and getting them to spend more time on our website was a task. Reaching out to customers only available on email and SMS to get back and finish their purchase was another tough nut to crack. Insider's Web Suite, Mobile App, Email, and SMS tools helped us overcome these challenges and double our sales within a quarter. Will definitely recommend Insider as a personalization vendor.

all_reviews.review_title: User Experience enhanced with Web Push and Conversion Rate boost
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been using Insider's channels and products for a while now and found their products to be feature-rich, fast, and efficient.
What makes this Growth Management Platform stand out from the rest is the support provided by their dedicated support team.

While we faced a few problems integrating the tools, their account and growth management teams were always available to solve any problem. We couldn't imagine that just by using a few of their functionalities, our conversion rates would grow.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We initially encountered a few integration problems, but the Insider team resolved them in a blink of an eye.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to optimize our website and boost conversion rates, and to achieve this, we were looking for a feature-rich platform that could help us run A/B testing and make the experimentation efficient. With Insider's Web Suite, we've been able to quickly run our experiments and implement changes on the production side. Insider's timely web push notifications helped us bring back customers who didn't complete their purchase and complete the transaction.
With the suggestion of Insider's growth management team, we also leveraged their AI-powered Smart Recommendation engine that enabled us to improve product discovery on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: Driven traffic and ramped up opt-in rates with Insider's superior, AI powered Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Web Push feature is a useful tool that offers us a range of benefits for our business. Firstly, we were able to set up campaigns with incredible ease, meaning that even those without extensive technical knowledge were able to take advantage of the tool's offerings and capabilities. With Insider's AI-powered segmentation, we are able to create segmented push notifications for each type of content, ensuring that our messages are delivered to the most relevant customers.

Tracking performance is also straightforward with Insider's Web Push, thanks to its intuitive analytics dashboard. We are able to quickly see how each campaign is performing and adjust our strategies accordingly to improve engagement and conversion rates.

Insider's Web Push also offers great customer support. Their Customer Success Managers are knowledgeable and responsive, ensuring that any issues or questions we have are resolved quickly and efficiently. With Insider's optimization capability, we were able to predict an ideal time of engagement for our users, increasing the likelihood of prompting positive responses from them.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Just as we were getting started with Web Push, we were in complete awe of the tool. It had so much to offer and all of it seemed extremely useful and handy. However, if we want to include an opt-in reminder in your web push notifications, we will need to purchase a separate feature as it is not included in the standard web push package. That being said, this was a short-lived problem and we managed to utilize Web Push in the best ways possible, thanks to the assistance we got from Insider's account management team.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's Web Push feature has really turned things around for our business in more ways than one. A primary standout benefit is the ability to reach users even after they have left our site. With high opt-in rates, we are able to interact with our customers effectively and keep them engaged with our brand.

As a matter of fact, Insider has even been recognized as one of the top 5 drivers of traffic to our PPTV site. This is due in large part to the power of Insider's Predictive Segments, which have helped us target disinterested users who haven't visited our website in a long time. By delivering personalized messages to these users, we have successfully brought many of them back to our site.

We have also leveraged Insider's web push messages to target users who are more likely to engage when offered discount coupons. This strategy has proven to be highly effective, as we were able to capture the interest of users who weren't even on our website. As a result, we have seen a significant boost in our revenues.

all_reviews.review_title: Advanced Personalization capabilities increase conversion rates by 20%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Growth Management Platform has genuinely revolutionized our campaign management. The pre-built templates enabled us to run campaigns seamlessly without extensive technical support. Their dedicated team of Customer Service Managers provided us with swift assistance to create customized campaigns as per the needs of an e-commerce platform.

We are particularly impressed with Insider's multilingual and personalized marketing capabilities that helped us run campaigns across 7 countries in 6 different languages.

Moreover, the Growth Management Platform provided valuable insights into our target users' past activity. This allowed us to optimize our website's landing page banners, displaying personalized promotional offers from the brands our users had visited. This implementation increased our engagement rates significantly.

Overall, Insider's platform has been a game changer for us. We highly recommend Insider to businesses looking to enhance their campaign management and achieve remarkable engagement and conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While there's nothing major that we dislike about the platform, there's one drawback: the absence of a Korean panel. Beyond that, we don't have many reasons to complain.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
By leveraging data-driven insights, Insider has provided us with a deeper understanding of the preferences and behaviors of our website as well as mobile app users, allowing us to curate genuinely personalized experiences. An example of this is when a visitor navigates away from our website or mobile app before completing their booking and later returns, a popup is triggered on the home page displaying their custom booking details. Once they click on the popup, they are redirected to the booking page, seamlessly continuing their booking process from where they left off.

When visitors land on our website or open our app, they are greeted with interactive elements and captivating content, such as promotions with countdown bars, creating a sense of urgency. Leveraging Insider's AI-backed Smart Recommendation engine and advanced customization capabilities, we have been able to deliver personalized experiences that cater to the unique interests and preferences of each user.

The platform's intelligent targeting and personalized messaging capabilities have also helped us run personalized web and app push notification campaigns that captivate the attention of our target customers. With this implementation, we can create unique experiences, resulting in improved engagement rates and a remarkable 20% increase in conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Achieved 9% Open rate with App Push and 240X ROI overall
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers a plethora of options when it comes to App Push templates such as Slider, Discovery, Carousel, etc. you name it they have it. This has for sure helped us bring a variety to our App Push campaigns, leading to highly engaged customers and achieving a phenomenal open rate and conversion rate. The App Reporting Dashboard is a life-saver and helps us see all important metrics around the campaigns in one place in an easy-to-understand format. All the tools be it Web Suite, App Suite, Email, or Architect have helped us optimize and enhance our productivity and efficiency.

Tracking performance is also straightforward on Insider's products, thanks to its intuitive analytics dashboard. We are able to quickly see how each campaign is performing and optimize our strategies accordingly to improve our key metrics.

What do you dislike about Insider?
A few good features that Insider could introduce can be an option to send an alert on missing coupons or add some new templates with an element of gamification to the App push template library. There's no WhatsApp push and WhatsApp related services yet

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We at Matahari have been struggling with low App Push open rates and conversion rates for a long-time now. Though we have been quite successful in the traditional marketplace we are still struggling with our online marketing campaigns. Insider helped us navigate this new realm of marketing.

Their seasoned and experienced Growth Consultants suggested just the right assortment of Insider products such as Web Suite, App Suite, Email, and Architect to help us achieve desired outcomes. With Insider, we got one of the best account managers and growth teams that helped us enhance customer experience, target the right set of customers with the right message, on the right channel, at the right time, and much more.

Ever since we were onboarded Insider we have seen a 9% increase in our open rates and a significant spike in conversion rates. The first quarter of 2023 has been a huge success with a 240X growth in ROI, thanks to Email Offline Attribution by Insider.
