all_reviews.review_title: Loyalty director and marketing automation projetc manager
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We did select insider according to 3 main dimensions : 1. The vision for marketing automation because every channel, from direct channels to the front-ends are really connected and coordinated for a continuous and engaging customer journey.

2. the level of personalization and customization it offers. The platform provides us with the ability to create highly targeted and personalized customer journeys based on their behavior, preferences, and interests. This has allowed us to engage with our customers in a more meaningful way and increase their loyalty to our brand.

Insider is helping us address the challenge of managing our multi-channel marketing campaigns effectively. Before partnering with Insider, we struggled to unify data from different channels and create cohesive customer experiences. However, with Insider's comprehensive suite of tools, we have been able to streamline our marketing efforts and gain better visibility into customer interactions across various touchpoints.

Additionally, Insider's AI-powered predictive audiences have been instrumental in identifying new customer segments and opportunities for growth. We are constantly impressed with the platform's ability to deliver on its promises and stay ahead of the curve in terms of innovation and technology.

3. The ergonomy : insider has an outstanding customer experience, allowing really marketing teams to use it and leverage all the advanced features for the best results. Besides, their customer success program, support and training are amazing, personnalized in a way. At the end of the journey and in less than 2 months, we were able to fully manage the platform : journeys, advanced personnalization and scoring.

What do you dislike about Insider?
One aspect we found challenging with Insider is the learning curve when using some of the more advanced features. It is always a bit hard to upgrade marketing talents into more advanced features. While the platform is comprehensive and offers a wide range of tools and functionalities, it can take time and effort to fully understand how to use them effectively. Nonetheless, we feel that some improvements in the user experience and onboarding process could make the platform more accessible to users who are less tech-savvy.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We selected insider to re-activate our loyalty program and also our connection with clients. As a result of the project, we did measure very soon improvement in key engagement metrics : opens/clicks but also coupon redemption and loyalty card contribution in the overall business turnover.
Insider's platform has enabled us to leverage data insights to create more personalized and relevant experiences for our customers. The integration of Insider's tools with our existing systems has been seamless, and the support team has been extremely responsive and helpful throughout the process. The predictive audience tool, in particular, has been instrumental in helping us identify and target new customer segments effectively.

Moreover, the integration of Insider's tools with our existing systems has been smooth, and their support team has been very responsive and helpful throughout the process. Insider's platform has also enabled us to analyze the performance of our marketing campaigns in real-time, allowing us to make data-driven decisions and optimize our strategy accordingly.

We did also a very fast paced project : full integration with online and offline data (transactions and offline behaviors) in more or less 3 months : outstanding.

Overall, Insider's platform has helped us address the critical challenges of data unification and channel management, resulting in improved customer engagement and conversions.

all_reviews.review_title: Designed and delivered hassle-free shopping experiences for our customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Web Suite is an extremely handy tool as it helped us create a persona-based customer journey and target our users accordingly. Insider's Web Push offers a wide variety of segmentation capabilities that help us roll out relevant campaigns to the right audience with ease. Thanks to this platform, we have managed to alter customer behavior in our favor with pushes like price alerts and back-in-stock alerts. This has boosted our revenue and conversion rates exponentially. With Insider's email product and Architect tool, all our campaigns performed with fewer clicks right within the right channels. We were able to create robust emails and consider customer feedback and user preference at different touchpoints to make it a one-a-kind experience. Lastly, Insider's Architect served as a valuable tool for facilitating cross-channel journey orchestration, allowing us to seamlessly design and implement our customer engagement strategy across various touchpoints.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Just as we were getting started with Insider, we realized there is a learning curve involved before you are well-versed with the tools and products. We faced this problem only for a few brief moments until Insider's top-notch support team reached out to us and offered us the assistance we needed.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
For a while, we were faced with high bounce rates as we were unable to offer our customers a personalized shopping experience in a seamless and creative way. Once we started using Insider's Web Suite, we were able to customize our offerings with the tool's highly responsive and user-friendly templates. We also leveraged Insider's AI-backed customer journey builder, Architect, to send out the right message to our customers on the right channel at the right time. This enabled us to alert our target customers about the ongoing offers, price drops, etc., which encouraged them to purchase our products. In addition, we also implemented Insider's Web Push to send out web push notifications to our users as soon as they leave our website. This helped us bring our users back to our website, which further improved our engagement rates and reduced the number of churn users. Another challenge that we were facing was to increase conversions through email campaigns. With Insider's Email optimization product, we were able to incentivize the process by offering elements such as coupons and real-time timers and carousels. This further improved our conversion rates significantly.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best tools to boost Conversion Rates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I've been working with Insider for almost a year now and found it to be truly amazing as it has helped me accelerate my marketing efforts and drive exceptional results. Before using its tools, I was struggling to boost conversion rates on the website and mobile application. I observed that people were visiting our website and app but churning without making any purchase.
After understanding this challenge, the account managers at Insider proposed running Social Proof campaigns. It's their conversion tool that taps into the psychology of the customer, analyzes their behavior, and then displays relevant products which other customers have viewed, bought, and reviewed.
Another change that Insider suggested to me was changing the color of the 'Add to Cart' button from red to green as it makes the CTA stand out. This minor color change improved the CTR on site and app by 3%. By running Social Proof campaigns on my website and app's product pages, I was surprised to see the results.
The conversion rates went up by 10% and that too in just a month. Indeed, this platform has done wonders for my business and I'd love to use its other tools in the future.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The integration definitely took a while as it was a bit difficult to understand the tools. But with Insider's support, it seemed to be a cakewalk. Indeed, Insider has great solutions and a wonderful support team. Would definitely recommend this to others.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Insider, I got a better understanding of the fact that even a small change can make a big difference. Simply a color change in add-to-card from red to green improved my CTR. Other than Social Proof, I also used Insider's web and mobile push functionality to send out notifications like discount offers, alerts about pending cart items, and back in stock items to my customers even when they're not browsing through the website or using the app. With push messaging functionality, I was able to nudge them to make a purchase and bring them back on the site or app. This reduced the customer churn rate and boosted engagement as well as conversion rates. Very helpful tool must say!

all_reviews.review_title: Uplift in retention rates on our mobile app achieved using Insider's Mobile App channel
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's templates have been a game-changer for us. With no coding effort, we're able to create interactive experiences within our mobile app. This kept our users returning to our app for more, which further improved our retention rates. One of the standout features is the ability to create scratch coupon experiences for our customers. Insider allows us to target our in-app promotions to those customers where it will create the most value, making it easy to manage our promotions in a smart way. Bulk promotions are no longer necessary, although it's still an option. With Insider, we can ensure that our promotions are tailored to the right audience, resulting in higher engagement and customer satisfaction.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, we faced challenges replicating our lead collection success on our mobile app due to the lack of relevant in-app templates. However, Insider has since addressed this issue by expanding their template library. This update has made it easier for us to experiment with immersive experiences like "Spin the Wheel" and other engaging tactics. Thanks to Insider's enhanced template selection, we now have the resources we need to capture leads and create successful mobile app campaigns.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Although we were seeing traffic and app installs, we still needed to improve the churn rate and reduce the number of app closures on first-time launches. With the help of Insider's recommendation to use their Mobile App too,  we were able to identify unregistered users using various identifiers. By capturing leads at this crucial stage of the customer lifecycle, we were able to leverage these data points to drive deeper cross-channel personalization. Insider's expertise in this area has been invaluable as it significantly reduced our bounce rates and improved our retention rates on our mobile app.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider adds a contemporary touch to conventional channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have integrated Insider into every aspect of our website, from onsite campaigns to web push notifications and product recommendation bars. Using Insider is a breeze, and our campaigns have a sleek and polished appearance.
The standout feature of Insider for us is the ability to deliver tailored experiences to our customers, such as personalized purchase triggers. We particularly appreciate the push notifications with product recommendations, which serve as a gentle reminder to shoppers to return to our online store.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's platform is user-friendly, but becoming proficient in its use takes practice. Fortunately, our account managers are always available to assist us.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to partnering with Insider, we recognized the untapped potential of our website and sought a capable ally to help unlock its full capabilities. Since implementing interest-based personalized onsite experiences for our customers, we have observed a considerable increase in conversion rates and customer retention. Moreover, we have seen a significant reduction in bounce rates as customers are now presented with relevant screens that capture their attention.

We were also hesitant about using web push as a marketing channel due to opt-in requirements and other concerns. However, since partnering with Insider, we have gained confidence and are extremely satisfied with our decision. Their web push platform provides exceptional features that allow us to manage opt-ins and optimize campaigns for maximum engagement without overwhelming our users with spam. We can confidently say that we have found the ideal product for our web push needs.

all_reviews.review_title: 10% conversion rate uplift and 4.3X ROI achieved with Insider's Web Push and Mobile App
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We're happy with Insider's mobile web and web push tools! They have completely changed the way we interact with our customers. The ability to send personalized and targeted messages in real-time has not only boosted customer engagement but also resulted in a significant increase in our sales. The interface is so easy to use, and we were able to create and manage campaigns without any hassle. Plus, the analytics helped us understand the impact of our campaigns and improve our strategy. We highly recommend Insider's tools to any business looking to improve their customer experience and grow their business.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing that we dislike about Insider so far. We didn't face any challenges while using their products, and the implementation process was quick and easy. Moreover, whenever we needed assistance, the Insider team was readily available to support us.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using Insider's Mobile Web tool, we were able to provide our users with captivating web experiences. Furthermore, Insider's Web Push messages allowed us to efficiently target and re-engage inactive users who had not visited our website for a considerable duration. Through personalized messaging, we successfully enticed them to revisit our website, leading to the acquisition of new users within just a few months.
Despite having a wide range of products, we recognized the need to improve user engagement and expand our customer base. To achieve this, we wanted to collect visitor information. The Insider team recommended that we request visitors to subscribe to our newsletter, which we were able to effectively communicate through Web Push.
This allowed us to interact with our customers and redirect them to our website to make a purchase. Within just a few weeks, we observed a significant increase in conversion rates of 10% and a 4X ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: Accelerated lead generation with solid triggers, ready templates, and easy recommendation strategies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Attracting new users and converting them into registered users without being intrusive seemed challenging for us. On the bright side, Insider's gamified lead collection templates provide an effective solution, allowing us to incentivize new users to register and make their first purchase through relevant discount codes at checkout.

Insider's recommendation engine has exceeded our expectations in several ways, with a seamless integration process and easy-to-use panels that enable us to set up and test recommendation strategies across different web pages. The analytics are also insightful, providing us with a better understanding of what works best and which products or categories are performing well.


Their omnichannel journey builder, Architect, has helped us design impactful customer journeys across multiple touchpoints, including web, email, and SMS. Their pre-built templates enable us to start much faster based on unique use cases like cart abandonment, browse abandonment, replenishment, and more. By delivering the right content to the right user at the right time and on the right channel, we have successfully increased our conversion rates.

Throughout our collaboration, their team has been supportive, offering invaluable guidance to ensure we achieve our goals. Amazing engagement so far with Insider!

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have had a great experience using the tool and haven't encountered any issues so far. As we explore more complex use cases and workflows, we are excited to leverage Insider's other tools and channels.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were in search of a comprehensive platform that could automate the delivery of personalized user experiences across multiple channels while boosting our conversion rates and ROI with a powerful recommendation engine. Insider fulfilled our requirements by providing a single platform with remarkable flexibility, ease of use, and positive impact on important metrics. Though we were able to attract website traffic and app downloads, reducing the bounce rate and app closure rates on first-time launch was a challenge.

Insider's identification of unregistered users with different identifiers proved to be critical in capturing leads at a crucial stage of the customer journey and achieving cross-channel personalization. Additionally, their automated deliverability calculation has helped us fine-tune our email campaigns for maximum impact. With the inclusion of features like coupons, real-time timers, and carousels, our email campaigns are now more engaging and effective at driving conversions.

all_reviews.review_content:

We've been working with Insider for a while, and as a team, we particularly like how it can update traditional messaging channels with amazing features. We are now observing higher engagement for our messages as a result of the use of elements like coupons, real-time timers, and carousels. all_reviews.review_title: Solution for creating personalized cross-channel customer experiences
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I'm super glad that we decided to go ahead with Insider for personalization and customer engagement. Creating campaigns has been ridiculously easy and fun with Insider's products! There's literally something new to learn every day and that makes it extremely enjoyable.

The CDP is cool as it brings data from all our channels together and creates unified profiles of each customer. This helps us understand and target our customers better as we are able to create better segments to craft personalized campaigns. Insider's cross-channel marketing automation platform, Architect, helps us create journeys for a single use case on multiple channels like web push, app push, in-app, Email, and SMS. Using the Next Best Channel capability, we target users on their preferred channels to increase user engagement. We plan to add WhatsApp also to our channel base super soon.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The capabilities of the product are slightly overwhelming since there's so much that you can do. It's hard to get a full grasp on all the features and capabilities. But when you get a hang of it, it's super cool and easy to use.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeting your users on multiple channels wasn't purely the goal for us. We wanted to understand each customer's ideal channel of engagement and with Insider we have been able to analyze that effectively. We ensure that users don't get messages on channels on which they have given opt-in permission as that would be intrusive.
Insider's CDP is essential in helping us target the right customer on the right channel at the right time with the right message.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's journey orchestration solution, Architect, has been a boon for us as it has enabled us to scale up our cross-channel marketing strategy by leaps and bounds. Through Architect, we were able to create orchestrated journeys across channels like web push, email, and SMS and integrate that with our existing mobile app communication. Architect's AI-powered Next Best Channel capability has been super critical in taking our engagement game up further because it suggests the ideal channel to communicate with our customers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It took us a while to get accustomed to all the capabilities of Architect. So to get it to function properly without creating any interruptions or problems took a bit of time.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
It was difficult for our brand to understand and choose which communication channel would be better to communicate with our customers to solve their queries. Still, Insider's Architect tool helped us to deal with this issue by analyzing the customer's behavior and recommending us a suitable channel from the list of Web Push, Email and ads. Now we are able to assist our customers better than before which helped our brand to gain their trust and loyalty. Also, our customers are more satisfied and happy than before which is positively impacting our brand's reputation.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped keep our customers hooked even when they were not on our app or website
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Architect is one of the best tools. It helped us extend our web push notifications campaigns to many other channels such as Email, SMS, and WhatsApp. It truly helped us reach out to our customers where they are.

The best part, the frequency at which these notifications were sent were not intimidating. In fact, they were timed so perfectly that it nudged the customers to keep thinking about our products even when they were not actually browsing our web or mobile app. The well-timed and highly relevant notifications ensured they came back and completed their purchase.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were not sure about the frequency at which we should be sending out notifications, by over sending we would be at the risk of losing out our valuable customers. The Growth manager from Insider gave the much needed guidance and ensured we timed our notifications well.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were dealing  with a typically out of sight out of mind scenario with our customers. The customers did come on our website or mobile app, browsed, in a few cases added the product to cart and left it that. Besides, we were unable to send them triggers across communication channels at the same time.

Now, it so happened that they ended up getting a notification either on email but not message and hence we missed getting their attention at the very moment we should have. With Architect from Insider, automated triggers were sent on all communication channels ensuring we hit the soft spot at the right time. In our mind we were reaching out through all possible communication channels and that did work wonderfully for us.

Insider has truly elevated our marketing efforts with its robust features. The ease of creating personalized omni-channel customer journeys from a single platform stands out. The platform's effectiveness in tackling cart abandonment through various channels, including email, SMS, and web push, has significantly boosted our conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While the overall experience with Insider has been great, the onboarding process was slightly lengthier than anticipated and the instructional content could be more accessible. However, once onboarded, the platform's performance has been excellent, making the initial onboarding time a minor concern.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The comprehensive analytics tools provided by Insider have empowered us to make informed, data-backed decisions in real-time.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform to expand market share by 20%. Loved it!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
A huge part of our customers aren't using channels like social media, WhatsApp, and the modern-age communication ways. They still rely on the old-school SMS. We really liked the SMS tool by Insider. The SMS campaigns not only help us reach out to customers only on SMS. Insider's SMS campaigns can also be connected to other channels such as Emails, App push, Web push and more with the help of their journey orchestrator Architect.

For us it means, no more running different campaigns for different channels and interacting and engaging with customers on a channel they are most comfortable. That's what I call a genius solution.

What do you dislike about Insider?
No complaints, we couldn't have asked for a better partner for all our marketing campaign needs.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Connecting with customers and running campaigns across various communication channels was a tedious task. Tracking the metrics and outcomes of those campaigns was another challenge. The Growth team at Insider's helped us overcome both these challenges by suggesting us to use Architect - an AI backed journey orchestration tool, with deep customer segmentation capabilities. This enabled us to run highly targeted and personalized campaigns and reaching out customers where they were.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us deliver stellar customer experiences and double our conversion rate
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's marketing suite consisting of Web Suite, Web Push, Email, and Mobile App worked like magic. The star was the advanced predictive analytics and segmentation capabilities of Web Suite's which helped us deliver hyper-personalized campaigns to customers resulting in customer delight experiences like never before.
The second favorite had to be the Email module which helped us create visually stunning and engaging emails within minutes and queue them to be triggered just in time to a customer's action.
Coupled with app and web notifications containing one click URLs ensured high conversion and a whopping 90% of the abandoned carts led to complete purchase. The Insider marketing suite was a total value for money package that helped us create customer experiences and get conversions like never before.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Although our experience with Insider's marketing suite has been predominantly positive, we have faced intermittent issues with the Mobile App's performance on specific devices. Nonetheless, we appreciate the Insider team's proactive approach in addressing these concerns and continuously working on enhancing the app's compatibility and performance.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The earlier platform we used failed to give us a proper segmentation of our customer profile as a result of which designing personalized campaigns that resonated with our customers was becoming increasingly challenging. With Insider's Web Suite, we could solve this biggest problem which essentially forms the foundation of any successful marketing campaign.
Add to it, the capabilities of Web Push, Email, and Mobile App, we were able to design highly-personalized and relevant campaigns like never before. Re-engaging old customers, getting customers who had abandoned their carts to complete their purchase, and keeping in constant touch with customers through highly personalized and relevant through their automated emails has been a breeze.
These tools namely Web Suite, Web Push, Email, and Mobile App have collectively resulted in improved customer satisfaction, stellar customer experiences, increased conversion rates, and ultimately, business growth.

all_reviews.review_title: Conversions maximized with Insider's Growth Management Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
At our company, we strive to optimize every aspect of our online presence to increase conversions. That's why we turned to Insider's Growth Management Platform to help us achieve our goals. The platform has been instrumental in optimizing our on-page conversions, and we've also been using it to generate both automated and manually submitted web push notifications.
Our primary reason for partnering with Insider was to improve our conversion rates, and we've seen significant results.

The web push notifications have been a valuable addition to our conversion optimization efforts, allowing us to connect with a new audience that was previously out of reach. By using online push notifications, we've been able to reach our target audience more effectively and increase engagement with our brand.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While there is room for improvement in the support provided, the product itself has been instrumental in helping us detect and fix bugs, ultimately leading to a better final product.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's platform has been an essential tool for us in maximizing conversions to their full potential. Insider offers a managed solution that helps us create and implement ideas rather than just providing a self-service platform. We felt that the Insider Growth Management Platform offered better value for the money.
The combination of automated web pushes and the Growth Management Platform has allowed us to create a seamless customer journey, resulting in increased conversions and a better overall user experience. If you're looking to take your online business to the next level, we highly recommend giving Insider a try.

all_reviews.review_title: CTR and Conversion rate growth using Insider's Web Suite and Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With the support of Insider's team, the implementation and integration process was smooth and seamless. Their experts supported us immensely in achieving what we desired.

The Web Suite product helped boost product discovery and this led to a reduction in bounce rate and an improvement in clickthrough rate and conversion rates. The web push messages we sent out helped bring back visitors to our website.

What do you dislike about Insider?
As it was quite easy for us to understand both products, there's nothing to dislike about the platform. We'd have liked it if they were clubbed together as a package in pricing.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before partnering up with Insider, we were struggling to create personalized onsite engagement and promote easier discovery. So we were looking for ways to improve user journeys and make them more friendly. Moreover, we wanted to personalize the user experience throughout their onsite engagement.

With the assistance of Insider's platform, we set up journeys, which were essentially a mix of onsite campaigns and web push notifications.

After incorporating Insider's Image Overlays into our onsite campaigns, we saw that it helped promote product categories and improve the visibility of trending products on the website.

We also utilized Insider's Web Push Notifications suite to promote offers and discounts on specific products or to create a sense of urgency among users who dropped off adding products to their cart. This enabled us to influence their buying decision and as a result, we saw a significant growth in click-through rates and user engagement rate, which further increased conversion rates on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: Achieved 4X ROI with Insider's cross-channel marketing campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We believe that Insider is the best product in the market for personalized cross-channel marketing automation. We started with website personalization as we thought that it would be less complex compared to using a multitude of channels right from the start. And that itself was a surprise as we were able to integrate swiftly and get started. This was the confidence we needed to take a step up and explore other channels. We heard about Architect, their cross-channel personalization solution to create campaigns on multiple channels at the same time. We have now started engaging our users across channels like on-site, web push, email, and WhatsApp. Their CDP has been incredibly useful in consolidating data from all these channels to help us create personalized campaigns together.

What do you dislike about Insider?
When we started working with Insider, the capabilities of WhatsApp and Email weren't good. But they've scaled up now and it's at the level that you'd expect it now.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider has helped us segment our customers better and reach them at the right time on the right channel and this has led to a 20% uplift in conversions.

The use of web push, email, and WhatsApp have been extremely useful in bringing disengaged users back onto our website. This has helped us arrest customer churn and extract maximum value from our hard-earner customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Conversion uplift using Insider's website personalization solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Being a luxury brand, growing our user base and building customer loyalty were key goals that we had when we were looking for a personalization vendor. We were able to achieve just that with Insider's suite of web products as it helped us generate incremental revenue.
We ended up using many of Insider's products and features like recommendations, the hamburger menu and the countdown timer.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The lack of autonomy with respect to the platform has been a challenge that we didn't expect as we were expecting the solution to be a self-use product. However, we've had to go through a long learning curve to get accustomed to all the products. This meant that we needed a lot of support from Insider's team to resolve some of the queries we had and this resulted in us having to raise a lot of tickets to get them addressed.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's products helped us create and grow our customers from website visitors to loyal customers thanks to their personalization capabilities. We activated countdown timers in many different campaigns to trigger a sense of purchase urgency amongst our users. We also successfully triggered exit intent pop-up messages to target users who exited our website without completing a purchase but after showing an interest in purchasing. This way we managed to immediately re-ignite the interest in our users' minds.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's advanced segmentation resulted in increased email open rates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's email send time optimization enabled us to deliver the right message at the right time to each of our subscribers, which ultimately resulted in better customer relationships.Although a small, rather simple-sounding feature, it is definitely one that's hugely impactful. By taking the guesswork out of the ideal time to send our emails, we have been able to get better results, and ultimately, that's what Insider is great at - taking the guesswork out of understanding customers and allowing us to serve them better based on data.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The email send time optimization tool from Insider doesn't currently have any known drawbacks, although the accuracy of consumer behavior analysis can always be improved.

all_reviews.review_title: Increased website traffic by offering discounts and showing personalized product recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've managed to scale our website experience significantly using Insider's different products for website engagement. We offered discount coupons to get our users to purchase more as they were getting products at cheaper prices. And by combining it with countdown timers, we managed to trigger purchase urgency and this significantly boosted our conversions. We also loved the AI-powered recommendations tool that the team offered to us as we were able to show personalized recommendations that our customers would love to buy. But what stood out for us above everything else was the customer support that was available 24x7 before the holiday season as well. Insider addressed the queries we had about their tools and guided us to a knowledge base which enlightened us on how to use them, particularly the web suite and the recommendations tools.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing we can think of right now. We are overwhelmed by the response we received from our customers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had worked with other companies and were struggling to automate and optimize our marketing campaigns. Some of them were not feasible because of the price and others because the features were not apt to the use cases that we had.  With Insider, we received great features at a great price and stellar customer service.

Insider helped us push personalized recommendations based on buying patterns and these were optimized over time, based on purchases by customers during the holiday season. So, if a customer got an expensive pair of headphones, then it would push a pair of earpads (as an accessory) or the same product in a different color or with an optional cable upgrade (in case the customer wants to buy another). We would struggle to map such personalized recommendations for each customer, but Insider made it a breeze. And this brought increased traffic to our website.

all_reviews.review_title: Personalized Marketing Campaigns from our product launches made better with Recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As a fast-fashion brand launching new products every week. Keeping our customers updated on these new launches is extremely important for us and directly impacts our sales and revenues. Insider's Architect helped us automate our marketing and customer communication workflows

This helped us save valuable time and resources that were otherwise spent in doing repetitive tasks with every product launch. Architect coupled with Web push, Email, Recommendations, and Mobile App ensured customers are notified about new product launches every weekend ahead of the launch.

Web Suites segmentation capabilities ensured that the right product recommendations, Web Push, App notification, and Email were sent to customers. These well planned campaigns ensured that customers are not only notified of new launches on time. Over the last few weeks, many of our products got sold out within the week of launch itself. There was a significant decline in cart abandonment and rise in actual sales.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Since we launch new products every week, it would be great if Insider can also update its Web and App push notifications template library and Email templates library more frequently. Not that there is any dearth of choice as on date, however, adding newer templates frequently will help us keep the look and feel of our marketing campaigns more fresh.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our business model is quite dynamic. However, we fell short of getting the same dynamism in our marketing efforts. As a result, despite launching new products every week, we didn't see sales rolling in, there used to be a lot of leftover stock week over week, which we had to sell at a loss eventually.
One major reason was our failure to inform the right customers about these launches on time. I am glad to say that Insider's suite of tools helped us solve this and enabled us to make the most of these weekly new product launches truly.
Web Suite helped us segment customers and ensure the right customers were reached out to, Architect automated the messaging flow, Web Push and Email tools ensured customers got notified of new launches on time, Recommendation tool sent them all the right recommendations to generate curiosity and compel them to check new products, Web and App notifications with deal links and abandoned cart links ensured people completed their purchase.
All in all we have seen big sales numbers ever since we started using Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Boost in website visitors and significant increase in Newsletter subscribers with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our customers have started spending more time browsing and discovering our website which was not the case earlier.  The entire product suite comprising the Web Suite, Web Push, Email, and Mobile App has been instrumental in helping us get meaningful customer engagement and more subscribers for our Newsletter.
The Web Push feature enabled us to reach customers with timely and relevant messages, even when they were not actively browsing our website nudging them to visit our website and spend more time browsing our products and offerings.
With the help of Web Suite, we were able to showcase highly personalized product recommendations that resonated with the customers interest on our website This also got our customers more interested in our offerings, leading to more sign-ups for our  newsletters. Automated Email with ready to use templates helped us deliver targeted and compelling content just in time in response to customer behavior.
Lastly, the Mobile App has provided our customers with a seamless and immersive brand experience, keeping them engaged and connected wherever they go.

What do you dislike about Insider?
No issues so far, rather with Insider we have been able to get more traffic on our website, reduced bounce rate, and high subscriptions and customer engagement.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a business we were devastated by the high bounce rates. Customers not spending enough time on our website meant low sales and subscriptions for our product bundles and newsletter. However, with Insider's Web Suite's predictive analytics and personalized recommendation features we could send web push notifications that would push customers to our website.
Based on the data, we could showcase recommendations and offers on the webpage that would compel them to stay and spend more time on our webpage.
All of this collectively lead to high engagement, increased conversions, and improved customer satisfaction.
There was a significant drop in our cart abandonment rates - thanks to Web Push feature, App notifications, and Email feature.  Insider's Email module, enabled us to automate our email campaigns and ensure the same message was conveyed to customers on all communication channels at the right time. With Insider we could achieve what we thought to be impossible.

all_reviews.review_title: We received 4x more credit card applications with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has been phenomenal for us at ING Bank, giving us a remarkable 4x increase in credit card applications. The conversion suite works so well and so smoothly, sometimes it feels like magic. We are able to predict user behavior and then customize their journeys accordingly for maximum effectiveness, and to nudge them towards desired goals. We love that we can work on everything from a simple action on a landing page to an app download, all from one place, effortlessly.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There is scope for improving the reports. There's nothing that we dislike, otherwise.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is a very capable, proficient platform for all businesses that have a digital arm that they have marketing plans for. The product is supported by stellar customer service that leaves no room for doubts or complaints. On the whole, Insider is a great investment for a successful digital marketing strategy.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalization is an integral part of the banking experience, and Insider has allowed us to deploy true personalization across the entire customer journey. This has proven successful for us and we are keen on sustained long-term progress with Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: 12% uplift in conversion rates with Insider's cross-channel journey orchestration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We found all their products that we leveraged, including Web Push, Onsite Personalization, WhatsApp, and Architect to be easy to understand and implement. Using their products, we were able to launch multiple campaigns at the same time without being dependent on their team for support. In a short span of time, we observed significant improvements in our engagement rates on our website.

Their product, Architect, helped us engage users across multiple channels like on-site, Web Push, and WhatsApp as a part of orchestrated and personalized journeys for users.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, there were a few bugs that we encountered in the panel. However, the team at Insider were able to resolve those issues in a timely manner and enabled us to achieve desired results.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Though the traffic on our website was good, we were struggling with high bounce rates and poor conversion rates. Therefore, we needed a solution that could help us keep them engaged on our website by showing relevant content and products to them.

After understanding our challenge, the Growth Consultants at Insider suggested we use their Architect tool, an AI-backed customer journey builder. The Architect enabled us to track the interests, behavior, intent to buy, and their search history. Having access to such useful information, we were able to create customized campaigns for our users based on their unique behavior and reach out to them with the right message, at the right time, and on the right channel.

In addition, the team recommended we implement onsite personalization to provide our website visitors with personalized experiences by showcasing the products of their choice and interest to them. Such personalized campaigns helped us nudge our customers to make a purchase. In just 4 months, we observed a 12% uplift in our conversion rates. We also leveraged their other channels like Web Push and WhatsApp to notify our users on price drop of products and send out discount coupons.

all_reviews.review_title: 10.02% CTR on Mobile Web campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Customer Data Platform has proven to be an outstanding solution that revolutionized our data management. By seamlessly integrating data from diverse sources, it empowers us to consolidate and create unified customer profiles. As a result, we have enhanced our database and expanded our reach to a broader audience, thereby strengthening our marketing campaigns across various channels.

The segmentation capabilities of Insider have left us deeply impressed. With this platform, we can precisely target the right audience and deliver personalized campaigns that significantly boost engagement and conversions. The impact on our marketing efforts has been remarkable.

Throughout our journey with Insider, the Customer Success team has been an invaluable asset. They have provided unwavering support during the onboarding process, campaign setup, and have consistently offered innovative ideas for continuous improvement. Their dedication has played a pivotal role in our success.

Furthermore, the Analytics dashboards provided by Insider are remarkably user-friendly. They enable us to effortlessly analyze the performance of our campaigns, empowering us with actionable insights to refine our strategies. Overall, Insider has been a game-changer for our marketing endeavors, driving our growth and helping us achieve our goals.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Due to the vast array of segmentation types provided by Insider, it is sometimes difficult for us to understand how to generate more advanced and customized segmentation. It takes a bit of training and learning to come up with the best-segmented campaigns.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Implementing lead collection campaigns on our website has resulted in increased opt-in rates for both the mobile app and web push notifications. Consequently, we have witnessed higher open rates for the campaigns we designed for these channels, amplifying their overall effectiveness.

One of the standout features of the platform is its impressive collection of pre-built templates. These templates, available across various products, facilitated rapid campaign setup without the need for developer intervention. Leveraging the built-in templates, we could effortlessly customize campaigns using the intuitive campaign builder and launch them swiftly. This streamlined process saved valuable time for our teams throughout the campaign creation process.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's reporting and analytics helped us track campaign performance in real time
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our company spans across 4 regions and our transaction volumes are high. Given the nature of our business there is never a dull day, however our customers often would browse for products, put them in the cart and later when they came back to purchase it would either be sold out or they would be unable to find them.

Product discovery was a major challenge, also from an operations standpoint we were unable to track and analyze the sales data to plan and strategize our inventory better.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Prior to Insider we had not been using any tech-driven tools for marketing. However, with Insider we have been able to eliminate the manual tasks involved in running a marketing campaign, have a tool to run omnichannel campaigns, and easily track all important sales and marketing metrics.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As first time users of a tech-based marketing tool our experience has been nothing short of a delight. With Architect - Insider's journey orchestration tool we have been able to track customers at various touch points along their journey and send communication to them across channels which is both personalized and relevant to them. Earlier we had a mountain of data but there was no way we could track or analyze it as a result most of our campaigns were planned purely on instinct rather than data

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been associated with Insider for the past few months now and working closely with them has been a wonderful experience for us. Their team provided us with immediate support whenever we faced any issue with integration.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There isn't anything specific that we dislike. Overall, the experience has been great for us. In the beginning, we needed a bit of hand-holding, but the Insider's team had supported us throughout the implementation and execution process.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As mobile screens are smaller, our customers were not interested in navigating to our mobile website. So we wanted to enhance this experience for our customers, and also drive more conversions through mobile. The account management team at Insider recommended we take advantage of their Category Optimizer tool to help users easily find categories they're more interested in.The tool reshuffles the category menu based on the browsing history of users. By implementing this, we were able to speed up product discovery for our mobile users, which further resulted in an uplift in conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: 42X ROI achieved using Insider's personalization suite
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We were mesmerized by the work done by the Insider team. Using Insider's Web Push suite, we were able to run multiple campaigns simultaneously, even without the support of the internal development team. With the suggestions and continual support of Growth Managers at Insider, we were able to increase our revenue by a whopping 42 times. We're glad to choose Insider as our growth partner.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are happy with the results we have achieved so far. There's nothing particular that we dislike about Insider. With the support of team Insider, we have been able to achieve what we wanted to and would definitely love to leverage their other products as well in the near future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Initially, our goal for this collaboration was to increase our conversion rate and sales through our mobile application. Having understood our requirement, Insider team recommended we leverage their Web Push channel that enabled us to run multiple campaigns at the same time and reach wider target audience. As we were failing to drive sales through our mobile application, Insider's Growth Management team advised us that we use their Mobile App suite.

With this implementation, we were able to improve the UI/UX of our application and provide our users with personalized customer experience. With the help of the tool, we were able to keep a tab on the unique user behavior and purchase intent. This further enabled us to enhance product discovery on our mobile app for our customers and nudge them to make a purchase.

As a result, our conversion rates were increased by 8.6% and the ROI shot up by an impressive 42 times.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The setup provided by the team at Insider was easy to use, simple, and fast. They created a segmentation for each type of content, taking our potential to the top. Thanks to Insider,  by optimizing just one follow-up strategy, we were able to reach our churn customers again and win them back without putting excessive effort into the process. The team of Account Managers at Insider has done a fantastic job in helping us achieve what we wanted to.

What do you dislike about Insider?
In the beginning, we felt that there was a communication gap between us and their team. Reaching out to their content team directly was a little hard but our Growth Consultants helped us connect with their team by setting up a proper communication channel that made connecting with their team easy for us.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the beginning, our primary goal was to reach our churn set of users, bring them back and increase traffic on our website. After collaborating with Insider, we leveraged their Web Push suite as suggested by their team of Growth Experts. By running Web Push campaigns, we were able to nudge the particular segment to check out the most trending products, offers, etc. on our website. This strategy enabled us to create a feeling of FOMO and a sense of urgency amongst our customers and encouraged them to revisit our website.

Within just a few weeks of implementation, we observed that our churned users are showing interest in our products and visiting our website on a more frequent basis. This improved our engagement and retention rates and drastically increased the monthly traffic on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: 70% clickthrough rate achieved with personalized discount coupons
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We implemented Insider's Coupon Code overlay on our desktop and mobile websites. This allowed us to target returning customers with personalized discount coupons, incentivizing purchases. By increasing the chances of product purchases, we were able to achieve a 69% clickthrough rate and also improve the conversions from returning customers

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were a little disappointed with the analytical capabilities as we were unable to decipher the true impact of all the campaigns and the investment we made in using Insider. Beyond this, the usage of Insider and their support has been close to flawless.

We need automated reports from Insider end. Also the CVR report is not accurate.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to present personalized coupons for customers returning to their website in a bid to improve the user experience, boost conversions, and increase customer loyalty, and retention. They required an on-site engagement strategy that could effectively engage and convert the segment of 'returning customers'.

Insider's segmentation capabilities helped us target different segments of users of different interests and affinities with differing campaigns with different goals. This helped us maximize our conversions as users were receiving tailored content and communication.

We also wanted to ensure that our customers stay on the website for a longer time to reduce the bounce rate. We also wanted to boost conversions by crafting seasonal campaigns to engage with the shoppers at the best time. All this was possible through Inisder's cross-channel campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Created personalized and gamified experiences for mobile visitors to drive higher conversions
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's InStory is truly remarkable in terms of its features and capabilities. We've witnessed great results with our mobile website engagement and conversion metrics. Also, the integration process was undoubtedly quick and fuss-free for us as their team assisted us throughout.

Our website experience saw a massive facelift once we started using Instory on our mobile website as users really liked the concept and started engaging more and more.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, it was a bit difficult for us to understand and implement the tool.  However, with the support of Account Managers at Insider and continuous usage of the tool, we were able to overcome this challenge.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Providing the best possible experiences to our website visitors is our top-most priority. Most of our interactions with our customers were taking place on mobile websites, so the marketing team at our company had their major focus on showing relevant and compelling content in order to maximize revenue through this channel.

We decided to use the InStory tool by Insider that's inspired by channels like Instagram, Snapchat etc. Leveraging this tool, we were able to deliver more immersive and gamified mobile web experiences to our customers. The tool enabled is to add relevant brand stories for individual users, including new arrivals, best picks, and last-minute offers. As a result, we succeeded in creating personalized story collections for our mobile visitors, which further helped us boost our overall conversion rate.

all_reviews.review_content:

We were able to enable a range of products over time, including the Web Suite, Mobile App, and Architect, we were still able to achieve great results in just a few weeks. Overall, we highly appreciate the versatility and effectiveness of the product suite and onboarding process.

Despite encountering some bugs during the integration phase, we were able to enable multiple products over time, resulting in improved business outcomes. all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Architect and Web Suite helped optimize our customer experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
For our marketing automation campaigns, we used both Insider's cross-channel journey orchestrator, Architect and Web Suite. We bounced back with Insider's Architect that suggested the website as our Next Best Channel option after WhatsApp campaigns did not find enough conversions.

What we liked most about the Web Suite was how we were able to tailor make our website to match the needs of our customers, not just the look and feel but also the banners we displayed and the recommendations we made. Everything made a difference.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Both the Web Suite and the Architect are just perfect for our use cases. The only problem was we couldn't integrate them together. However, we used Architect to build a few on-site use cases for our cross-channel campaigns.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's Architect recommended WhatsApp as the best channel to create our customer journeys on. This did work for us the first few months we ran our campaigns, but we noticed over the next month that something wasn't working. Customers were not responding. And discounts did help, but for a while.

A quick call to Insider's support team, which by the way is exemplary, and we were shown the right way. It was another neat option from Insider's Architect called the Next Best Channel. And the recommendation was to target the customers using the website.

We were recommended to use Insider's own Web Suite to better the website experience. And voila! We were pleasantly surprised as we optimized the layout and added festival specific banners and observed the increase in website traffic. This was pure magic. We had never experienced anything like this before.

Insider puts the marketer in the driving seat and helps drive customer conversions without breaking a sweat. We love Insider and wish that more people would use their suite to manage their marketing and elevate the customer experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Enhanced our customer's shopping experience across the journey with Architect
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Architect worked extremely well in helping us engage our shoppers across different channels across the customer journey.  As an e-commerce company, it is challenging to treat each client according to their preferences as every user on our website has different demands and interests. However, Architect's AI capability worked end-to-end with our team and enabled us to better service our customers.
Previously,  our consumers weren't able to relate to our recommendations but since Architect did the job of understanding our customer's behaviors, we are able to build a more tailored approach for each user, and they are delighted with the content shown to them.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's algorithms were a little sluggish to respond when we updated our website, but they still displayed the correct suggestions. This wasn't a huge problem, and we had full support from their team, and they quickly addressed the issue.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As we are an e-commerce firm, we weren't able to smoothly guide our customer's journey on our website as we lack the infrastructure for a well-guided customer automation journey. But the Architect tool by Insider helped us to level up and solve the crux part of our customer's automation journey. This AI-powered cross-channel marketing automation tool helped us to identify the moments that outlined our customer experiences and on the basis of the data received, we benefited our customers with recommendations and personalized messages to build strong relationships with them.

all_reviews.review_title: Product discovery improved by revamping our website experience with Web Personalization
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Web Push - reminded customers of abandoned browsing sessions. This has helped increase the website traffic and tackle high bounce rates.
Predictive capabilities provided us with the ability to predict customer needs and preferences.
Smart AI-powered personalized recommendations and layout optimization have made it easier for customers to find what they are looking for.

All these put together helped us show more relevant recommendations based on the interest, affinities and predicted behavior of the customer.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Syncing the recommendations to our product catalog proved to be a challenge. Whenever we added new products, getting those to be recommended to our products wasn't easy and this impacted the sales of the latest products.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before implementing Web Suite and Web Push, we faced a major challenge of a high bounce rate and low engagement on our website. Customers were unable to find the most relevant products easily and this was impacting our sales.

With Web Suite, we were able to analyze customers' browsing habits and preferences to create customized recommendations. We also optimized our website layout to make it more user-friendly and visually appealing. Additionally, Web Push helped us send timely reminders and notifications to customers who had abandoned their transactions, encouraging them to complete the process.

As a result of these changes, we have seen a significant improvement in engagement on our website. Customers are spending more time exploring our products and services, and the bounce rate has significantly reduced. We have also received positive feedback from our customers, who appreciate the personalized experience and the convenience of timely reminders.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's predictive segmentation tool proved to be a revelation for us
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We leveraged Insider's predictive segmentation to help us with our Instagram ads. What we noticed was that we were able to turn things around with Insider and actually increase our conversions within a very short span of a few weeks.
We ran these ads initially for our VIP customers but then seeing the positive results we decided to run them for our new customers as well and it paid off.

Insider's AI-driven predictive segmentation is spot on, customizable in terms of granularity and focus, and this is what we liked best about Insider.
Their web suite, another tool we used to help us in our task, enabled us to personalize the layout of our website to our liking, and the transformation from great to incredible was just wondrous to see. It must have been for our customers too because their numbers began to increase and continue to increase!

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's predictive segmentation feature is awesome and there is nothing about it we don't like. The initial challenge that we had was in figuring out which one to use where and once we cracked it, it was great!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our website allows users to trade comic books. Our website was trendy, modern, colorful and everything a comic lover ought to find most appealing. Most importantly it made the whole process of finding the comic book you want and trading yours in for another achievable in a matter of a few clicks. But we had few customers, and even they weren't very engaged.
We had an ad campaign on Instagram that was running for quite some time. It had not yet helped us much though.
By leveraging Insider's predictive segmentation, we were able to not only use great content on Instagram to our advantage but have our ads show up to just the right ones, our loyal customers.
Once we realized that Instagram ads were working for our loyal customers, we extended the scope of Insider's predictive segmentation to include new customers also and we were pleasantly surprised to find that they responded well too.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Segmentation made our email campaigns powerful and proved to be a winner for us
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's RFM and predictive segmentation helped us target our loyal customers and provide them the experience they deserve. This coupled with the email tool we used helped us deliver successful campaigns with content that was gorgeous and actionable at the same time.

Our mailers could be actioned within the inbox itself and the customer needn't come to our website to add in the crucial information.
This enabled us to hook the VIP customers onto our offers very quickly and engage them before their attention was turned elsewhere.

This also made the whole process very seamless and speedy and our conversions from email went up. We know, because Insider helped us track that too!

What do you dislike about Insider?
The segmentation tool has a learning curve associated with it to derive the best possible results, but once you do, the rewards are limitless.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our apparel website wasn't working for us. Our products (striped pants) were unique, fashionable, and up to speed with the latest trends, but we weren't able to capture the customer's attention.

all_reviews.review_title: 25% Conversion Rate uplift with Insider's Conversion Suite and Web Push tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We've been delighted to partner with the Insider team. They quickly got to know us and our challenges, acted as an extension of our team, and made practical suggestions that we could easily understand and implement. Their highly experienced and personable Account Managers were alongside us each step of the way through the planning and execution.

With their continual support and guidance, we were able to implement new use cases and test out hypotheses based on the results of each campaign.

What do you dislike about Insider?
No major issues were faced, but due to the website's layout and limitations of CRM, we weren't able to utilize the capability of the Insider panel to the full extent, especially with use cases for segmentation. However, with the support of Growth Consultants at Insider, we were able to improve these issues.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our conversion rates were low, and the bounce rate was high, and we needed to improve both to increase online revenue. Therefore, we needed a partner that would understand our challenges and provide solutions for the organization instead of pushing a one-size-fits-all approach. That's when Insider came into the picture and recommended we use their conversion suite to optimize the web layout and provide customers with an improved user journey.  Leveraging this tool, we could display and recommend options based on our customer's likes without having to ask the development team for help.

Their team of Growth Consultants also suggested we use their Web Push channel, which we could integrate with our existing CRM to deliver personalized recommendations, order confirmations, alert customers about the items added to their cart, and more. These initiatives resulted in an increase in AOV, up to 58% increase in ROI on QoQ basis, and 25% uplift in conversion rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Successful conversion boost thanks to Insider's Web Push
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's bulk web push coupled with their segmentation tool helped us successfully launch our new product to the right target audience. Conveying the right message, and product information, and sending deals at the right time are of utmost importance to make any new product a success and get maximum conversion. Insider's web push helped us achieve that. The best feature is the web push throttle speed though. When we line up a series of web push messages it is not that they will get delivered one after the other and important notifications may get lost or unnoticed in the process. Since the notification delivery control lies with us we can strategically send these to nudge the customers right on time.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider has a plethora of web push types, we haven't been able to tap the complete potential of these web push notifications. There is a lot that still needs to be discovered and leveraged.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We launch two variants of the same product, one for a niche segment which is priced at a premium with some extra features and one for a larger audience which is relatively economically priced. However, we were unable to send the right message to the right audience and in the process were losing out on nearly 50% of our sales every quarter.

Also, since the process was manual tracking customer behavior and sending them notifications timely was a huge challenge. With Insider's web push however and coupled with their Send Time Optimization capability, we were able to reach out to the right consumer at the right time and make up for the sales that we had lost in previous quarters.

all_reviews.review_title: We won back customers with Insider's predictive segmentation and Web Push messages
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Using Insider's predictive segmentation tool, we were able to target the right user segments. We brought back users who had left our site immediately by using welcome emails and targeted users who abandoned their carts with web push notifications.

We also used other tools from Insider such as personalization templates and the customer database to target the right users with push messages so that they resonate better with our customers. These helped us in the engagement strategy and we were able to see higher number of conversions henceforth.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It can be overwhelming at first to use the segmentation tool as the capabilities are quite a lot. But once we got to know how to best use it, it was phenomenal.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our bounce rates were much higher than the industry average. And several users who added our products would abandon their carts during the checkout process. We thought streamlining our checkout process would help. Of course, it did help for a while, but what really changed the game for us was predictive segmentation from Insider's AI. We were able to segment users more effectively.
Then with the help of the personalization templates, we were able to push relevant products to each customer. In addition, the unified customer database from Insider gave us a 360-degree view of each customer and were able to integrate our third-party data sources as well. We recommend Insider to anyone who wants to improve their customer experience and improve their ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's segmentation tool helped us segment our huge customer base with ease!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's AI-backed segmentation tool, of course! It is remarkable. We were able to segment our audience based on different attributes. Insider claims that they support up to 120 attributes, such as behavior, preferences, traits, age etc.
And we did not use so many attributes, but the difference it made to our campaigns was palpable.
We integrated our CRM data for segmentation, which means third-party apps are also supported. We also tried their personalization templates and their messaging tools and they did not disappoint us either.

Finally,  our Customer Success Manager is very helpful, and we can find answers to any of our questions about our campaigns quickly thanks to her.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing to dislike about Insider's segmentation tool. However, they need to review their support/help mechanism a bit. The current ticket mechanism works fast, but in some cases, our tech teams need to communicate directly with a tech person from their side, which would fasten the solution. This  (direct communication by doing a call etc.) is not encouraged in their current ticketing system. The process is very formal.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had just reached the European and US markets with our new line up of products only a year back. Though we identified a target audience, reaching the right customer would always be challenging.  Thankfully, Insider helped us to segment the audience.
With their predictive segmentation, in addition to the segmentation based on purchase history and CRM data, we could identify customers who wanted to shop from our app.
Coupled with other Insider tools, such as personalization templates and messaging apps, we could push relevant content to our customers and get the clicks and conversions we wanted. Thank you, Insider!

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Web Suite and Architect made customer journeys more profitable
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's CDP and predictive segmentation capabilities allowed us to predict when customers would churn, based on certain customer attributes. Insider helped us predict what each customer wants; it could be a discount or a reduced shipping time, but the predictions were spot on. We could store all the data in Insider's CDP and use all the data to build meaningful customer experiences on the website and beyond on other channels.
Our website got a completely revamped feel and customers spent more time transacting.

We were then able to orchestrate the perfect journey for such customers with Insider's cross-channel journey orchestrator, Architect. Insider Architect also allowed us to A/B test various possibilities and eliminate any friction during the checkout process.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Web Suite is awesome and there is nothing about it we don't like.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our website was just another e-commerce website selling consumer goods. Though our products were unique in the materials we used, the look and feel, and sustainability too, we had very few visitors.
We used just two features of the Web Suite to get the results we always wanted. The use of layout optimization helped us experiment with different layouts until we picked the right one with Insider's A/B testing tool.
Insider's Architect then helped us create customer journeys that led to more conversions. Not just that, but we were also able to A/B test the customer journeys on our website.
Both these products together helped us increase traffic to our website in just a matter of months. We are so happy that we used Insider. I would heartily recommend it to everyone.
