all_reviews.review_title: 99.5% delivery rate and 8.17% clickthrough rate achieved with Insider's Email
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our experience working with Insider has been nothing short of amazing. We're astounded by the exceptional results we've achieved with our email campaigns. Specifically, our unique click-through rates have surpassed industry benchmarks by a significant margin. This outstanding performance has exceeded our expectations and further solidified our trust in Insider's capabilities.

Additionally, we leveraged their Architect tool and found it to be quite intuitive. The tool enabled us to create more relevant and personalized customer journeys, which further maximized our use of first and zero-party data. While we are still in the initial stages of automating our marketing efforts with Insider, we are eager to leverage the platform to its fullest potential in the near future.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We found that Insider's email template creator is slightly more complex as compared to other ESP providers. When we started using the tool,  we did encounter occasional glitches. One such instance was the temporary unavailability of the formatting bar while creating an email. However, despite these minor issues, we still appreciate the advanced features and capabilities that the tool offers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As the competition in the education sector is fierce, establishing a strong position in the market was not an easy feat for us. Despite our efforts to run multiple email campaigns to reach out to a wide range of students, we were facing challenges with the high input time of our global team and low ROI on marketing spend. However, our fortunes changed when we discovered Insider.

We quickly realized the importance of Insider's tools, particularly their Architect and Email channels. By leveraging this tool, we were able to enhance our email campaigns and optimize them for maximum engagement and conversions. Insider's Architect tool enabled us to track user journeys and gain an inside view of unique user behavior. Consequently, we were able to communicate with students in a highly personalized manner at the right time. Using this tool, we managed to deliver personalized pages to different users at their most preferred channel, be it through Email, WhatsApp, or SMS, and get a unified customer view on a single dashboard. The results were remarkable, with a staggering 99.49% improvement in Email delivery rates and an average CTR increase of 8.17%.

Currently, we are in the testing phase of using Insider's tools for lead generation and looking forward to some great results. To sum up, our experience with Insider has been great, and we're happy with the results we have achieved so far.

When we started using the tool,  we did encounter occasional glitches. One such instance was the temporary unavailability of the formatting bar while creating an email. However, despite these minor issues, we still appreciate the advanced features and capabilities that the tool offers.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
As the competition in the education sector is fierce, establishing a strong position in the market was not an easy feat for us. Despite our efforts to run multiple email campaigns to reach out to a wide range of students, we were facing challenges with the high input time of our global team and low ROI on marketing spend. However, our fortunes changed when we discovered Insider.

We quickly realized the importance of Insider's tools, particularly their Architect and Email channels. By leveraging this tool, we were able to enhance our email campaigns and optimize them for maximum engagement and conversions. Insider's Architect tool enabled us to track user journeys and gain an inside view of unique user behavior. Consequently, we were able to communicate with students in a highly personalized manner at the right time. Using this tool, we managed to deliver personalized pages to different users at their most preferred channel, be it through Email, WhatsApp, or SMS, and get a unified customer view on a single dashboard. The results were remarkable, with a staggering 99.49% improvement in Email delivery rates and an average CTR increase of 8.17%.

Currently, we are in the testing phase of using Insider's tools for lead generation and looking forward to some great results. To sum up, our experience with Insider has been great, and we're happy with the results we have achieved so far.

all_reviews.review_title: Ideal tool to increase conversions on desktop and mobile web
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is helping us deliver highly personalized user experiences at every stage of the customer lifecycle. With InStory, we are able to bring an immersive social-media story-like browsing experience to our website, highlight relevant products, and shorten the path to purchase. Their personalized product recommendation algorithms across the entire shopping journey have also helped us increase conversion rates and AOV. With Insider, we are able to make every virtual shopping session count and deepen customer loyalty.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing that we dislike presently. We are looking to expand our usage of the product and experiment with responsive web templates to make it even easier to fire up unified personalization scenarios across our web platforms.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before Insider, we struggled to prevent drop-offs and improve our conversion rates across the desktop and mobile sites. Our user experience was not optimized enough and we didn't always have the internal resources to build more immersive and relevant experiences. Insider's web conversion capabilities and AI-powered Smart Recommender have been easy to implement, help run complex experiments across pages and audiences, and improve relevant product discovery. All this directly impacts our conversion rates and revenue, bringing down our customer acquisition costs significantly.

all_reviews.review_title: Best integrated platform for data-driven user experiences across channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
To start with, Insider has allowed us to do more with our customer data across our tech stack thanks to its ease of integration. Being able to accurately identify anonymous and existing users across platforms and devices, we can gather insights via detailed unique user profiles. By being able to understand our unique users' behaviors and intents, we are able to build and deliver very personalized user experiences across different channels like web, app, email, and SMS with Insider's Architect. This foundation of rich user data allows us the flexibility to strive for deeper personalization that directly impacts our engagement and conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were looking for more pre-built templates relevant to our industry and use case when it came to building cross-channel journeys. That has actually been addressed and has been a big help, allowing us to go from conceptualization to deployment much faster.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before Insider, we had access to customer data but we weren't able to activate it effectively across channels. This resulted in siloed and often broken user experiences, impacting our user retention. With Insider in the mix, we can trigger these cross-channel experiences in real-time while also predicting what they're likely to do next. That added layer of AI-led predictive intelligence complements our human marketing intelligence, helping us impact the conversion and retention metrics that matter the most.

all_reviews.review_title: Best solution for A/B testing website campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Through Insider, we were able to implement multiple A/B tests at the same time on our website without any technical requirements or problems. With the help of the A/B tests, we were easily able to understand the campaign that performed better, we got insights into our consumers' preferences and we were able to optimize our site to meet their needs easily.
By A/B testing the campaigns we want to launch, we ensure that we are creating the right kind of website experiences as we understand the pulse of our target audience while testing it out.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes creating the campaigns wasn't easy and we needed help from the team to design them. It isn't as DIY (Do-it-yourself) as it initially seemed. Having said that, Insider's team is super helpful and responsive and end up solving all our headaches pretty fast.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's A/B testing is a really effective tool. It's so easy to set up and understand, and it doesn't take long to see the results. It gives an in-depth understanding on how your users interact with the site.
This ensures that there are minimal errors from our side when it comes to launching campaigns that engage users.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Mobile App suite and Architect tool helped us boost conversion rates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The platform's multiple predefined customizable templates allowed us to personalize and automate messaging for our users based on their activities with great ease. With the help of Insider's academy and their CSMs, we were able to get reports and insights in real-time.

Their products are also amazing as they are effective in so many different ways. Our mobile app engagement has become so much better since we started using their solution. Tying up with their cross-channel journey builder, Architect, we have reached customers on many other channels. We are able to discover the best time and channel for different segments of users and we build our campaigns accordingly. It's been a great journey so far!

What do you dislike about Insider?
No major issues as such. Initially, we experienced minor bugs in mobile templates like dim effects. The bugs weren't too critical though and can be improved.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to improve the user experience for our mobile app users. To achieve this, we decided to explore Insider's in-app templates that helped us efficiently convey messages to them in a clear and efficient way. This implementation of the Insider product resulted in increased conversion rates.

We were also looking for a solution that could enable us track user activity within the app and automate campaigns accordingly. After understanding the requirement, the Account Management team at Insider recommended us to implement their Architect tool on our app. By using this technology, we were able to successfully entice users to complete their purchases, which significantly improved our conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Increased organic discovery of the website by 40% with Insider's Web suite
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Apart from the work we do, we hold communications and support in high regard. This was the main reason why we loved working with Insider. The UI is smooth and the support staff was wonderful. We got prompt replies to any queries we had. And this is just the tip of the ice-berg. We look forward to continuing our collaboration with Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While the experience with Insider was quite fulfilling, a little room to wiggle would have been more appealing. Having an option for custom rules and attributes without having to create a new ticket would have been helpful. Still, the Insider team accommodated our customizations with speed and efficiency.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our offline experience has always been the pride of our organization. It has always been unique for every customer, and so we wanted to translate the same onto our website by mapping out different customer journeys tailored to each visitor. We also wanted to provide our customers with an omnichannel experience. That's where Insider came into the picture and suggested us solutions like Web and Mobile Web Suite.

With the help of the Insider team, we implemented strategies like Social Proof, Hello Bar, and Countdowns on our website that resulted in increased customer engagement and higher conversion rates. In addition, we used their Web Push channel to alert our customers with discounts and offers in real-time. This strategy helped us drive customers to our website and make a purchase. In a short span of time, we observed a massive boost in our revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: Leveraging Insider for personalizing campaigns is a game changer
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has been a great partner for us. Their team of Growth Consultants have helped us with the ideation, creation, and execution of campaigns after we completed the integration.

One of the best things that we liked the most about Insider is that the Growth Management Platform offers a variety of predefined templates that not only saves time and effort but also allows us to run a number of campaigns simultaneously.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've loved utilizing the tool so far and there's nothing that we dislike so far. In the beginning, we needed a little hand-holding to get started. But the Account Management team has cooperated with us enthusiastically throughout, from implementation to execution. Overall, we're happy with the results we've achieved.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We observed that a significant proportion of our website users would add products to their cart but didn't complete their purchase. Therefore, we needed an innovative and automated solution that could help us turn our visitors into paying customers. Having understood our core needs, the Growth Consultants at Insider recommended we leverage their Web Suite channel to create personalized experiences for our customers. This enabled us to increase our website traffic and generate more leads.

In addition, the team suggested we use their web push channel to send out notifications to those who already had products in their cart. This implementation helped us remind our users to complete their purchase. In a short span of time, we observed that there was a spike in Average Order Value (AOV) and a significant increase in conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Surpassed sales target using Insider's email product recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The most viewed feature of Insider's email product recommendation turned out to be the best aspect for our brand because it allowed us to group consumers based on the things they were most interested in and only offer them the products that would best fit their preferences and tastes.

By individualizing our customer emails using Insider, we have been able to elevate the experience we offer our customers, and our brand feels more personalized. We are able to show our customers that we care, and it reflects in their increased purchases from us and the higher engagement that they give us.

This was originally inspired by the product recommendations that we were showing on the website. Powered by Insider's AI algorithms, we were showing users more relevant products on different pages of the website - right from the homepage to the product page and the cart page. Insider's algorithms were also able to pick up which were the most popular products, trending products, latest products and show them on the homepage.

This way we improved the website experience of our users and this ensured that they were spending more time and shopping more regularly from us. And we decided to take this to the next level, by sending recommendations in emails to re-engage users who drop off before purchasing products.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Since the algorithm functions flawlessly, we haven't seen any serious problems with this product to date. However, we believe there is always scope for improvement.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Don't think twice. Just go to the website, request a demo - their sales expert will get in touch with you and an expert will reach out to understand your requirements, take you through a real-life scenario of what is possible. The rest of the process with integration is really smooth and quick. They are available every step of the way to help you with your questions.

all_reviews.review_title: 7X ROI achieved by personalizing customer journeys across channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As a coffee equipment and beans supplier, one of our primary goals was to create better engagement with our customers to drive higher conversions. Insider was the perfect product to solve this problem as it was a simple platform to create customer journeys easily and faster. Insider's Customer Data Platform helped us unify data from many different channels and touchpoints to build consolidated user profiles to create personalized engagements.

Their customer support team was super supportive in helping us get started with our campaigns quickly after integration. The analytics were exceptionally well-detailed since we could individually track campaigns' performances across different channels and products.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider has some pre-built templates that help us start building campaigns quickly. However, it does take time when we need to customize the campaigns fully. Sometimes, we also need help from Insider's Account Management team to create them faster.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using Insider's products has helped us improve our cross-channel customer engagement game. We've created personalized customer journeys for our B2B and B2C users, which has helped us boost conversions, thereby increasing sales and revenues.

We achieved a 7X ROI in 2022 by creating eight automation customer journeys, including a welcome journey, retention journey, post-purchase journey, coffee subscription, survey to collect customer feedback, and more.

All in all, a great experience!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I like our collaboration with the Insider consultants as they are extremely helpful and super quick whenever we send a question to run campaigns. The platform is so easy to use, I think even my five-year-old niece could use it! We like being able to trial new campaigns on one domain. We learn what works then we can very easily replicate it across all seven of our domains.

The products are super impressive, to say the least. We've used a whole bunch of their products like the Web Suite, Web Push, Smart Recommender, and Eureka to improve the website experience for our customers. Smart Recommender has combined with Eureka, their Search Personalization tool to deliver AI-powered product recommendations when users search for products they're looking for. This is a super cool product of theirs that we've just started using.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The technical implementation right now is taking a lot of time because we have a lot of complex systems but that is to be expected. We hope to have everything fully integrated soon so that we can create even more valuable customer journeys for our customers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Conversion rate optimization is one of our biggest KPIs. We are doing a lot of work on removing friction points in the customer journey to make the path to purchase as smooth and quick as possible. We use Insider's cross-channel journey builder, Architect to create personalised and relevant campaigns across multiple channels to maximize engagement and drive our conversions.

We've used Architect for campaigns like cross-selling and up-selling relevant products for our customers to drive higher purchases and boost conversions. Web Push has helped us re-engage users on the desktop but not on our website with offers and recommendations to bring back traffic onto our website to engage them with more relevant content.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What I like most about the Insider platform is that it's really easy to use. The team provides great training to get you started quickly, but there's so much more you can learn by experimenting and having fun with it. It's very intuitive.

What I'm most excited about is the customer journeys based on product affinity that we are building. I think that's an amazing capability to have and believe it will be really powerful.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Because we do a lot of custom work with the Insider developers, we have to raise a lot of tickets. The team get back to us very quickly, which I'm really happy about but sometimes there is a miscommunication or I have to dig deeper and request more information. So that's something that I think could be improved.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our existing tech stack, predominantly Salesforce, didn't facilitate the level of personalization we wanted to provide to our customers. Insider enabled us to achieve our personalization goals, integrating easily with Marketing Cloud. Together they make a really powerful tech stack.

all_reviews.review_title: Great team, efficient processes, instant difference!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The team at Insider are great to work with to workshop and build ideas that best suit your business needs. They take the time to understand our brand and really get to know our data to best support decision-making. The process from ideation to implementation is the quickest I have ever experienced with a tech partner, and the service and attention we receive from our CSM is extremely helpful and reliable. We love the ability to discuss new features and ideas we've seen across other sites on different platforms, and within a week or two we are experimenting and testing that experience on our site.

What do you dislike about Insider?
You need someone in your internal team that can dedicate time and resource to the platform. To provide content, build and refine campaigns and track analytics. Your CSM is there for support and to help get you going, but ultimately it comes down to you as the client/brand to really utilise the data and features to its full capacity. To warrant the cost and see a significant ROI I think you need to commit to being hands on, consistently monitoring campaigns and performance and refining optimisations as you go. If you set and forget i don't think you're getting the most from the features.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider is allowing us to run CRO experiments across the site to review, which benefits our overall development roadmap. We review campaigns and determine if we should develop natively. Insider also allows us to add layers of personalisation to our overall e-commerce experiences, such as targeting visitors with region-specific website features/messages. We also run web push through Insider which integrates into our multi-channel communication approach.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider enabled us boost conversion rates with personalized mobile app experiences
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has enabled us to completely transform our users' mobile experience. Our mobile website was neglected before working with Insider because we couldn't do anything with the traffic there.

But by utilizing Insider's personalization features, we were able to enhance the user experience and boost conversion rates.

We began by leveraging templates on our mobile website to encourage users to download the app, which helped us grow the number of mobile app users. We grew our WhatsApp and email subscriber bases using Insider's gamified lead acquisition templates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, developing mobile website experiences for many device kinds, including smartphones and tablets, was difficult. On both, we had to individually and independently develop the campaigns. This is now much simpler thanks to responsive templates because only one campaign is needed.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider has assisted us in improving all aspects of our mobile donators experience, including customer acquisition, engagement, conversions, and retention.

The personalized experiences keep drawing our donators back to our website for more and more, giving the impression that the number of devoted donators we have increased dramatically since we began utilizing Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's email and mobile marketing suite gave our mobile marketing strategies a great lift
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Gaming is popular and many companies are now cashing in on gamification to increase customer conversion. We absolutely loved the wheel of fortune that Insider helped implement on our website. In this wheel of fortune, the customer could win anything from a Nike T-shirt to an Apple iPhone after the draw which we held on a monthly basis.
We would send out emails to the customer which again contained an AMP template that made it actionable within the inbox. This was another thing about Insider that we really appreciated. Customers could spin the wheel right from their inbox and had to visit the app only to submit their details and access the offered recommendations using the discount code we provided. The mobile marketing suite helped us with that too!

What do you dislike about Insider?
The mobile marketing suite is easy to use and highly recommended. There's nothing we don't like about it. Cracking the code in how it's to be used is the key.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
These increased the number of upsell and cross-sell from within the app.
Social proof from the mobile marketing suite also enabled us to leverage the existing and ongoing purchases more effectively to drive more sales.
The result: Within a short span of time, we were able to acquire more customers and witnessed a significant increase in the average order value. Thanks to Insider.

What do you like best about Insider?
It is an easy tool that simplifies the process of customizing the user experience, adding agility to the process and allowing us to allocate our resources more efficiently. The A/B testing functionality is also exciting as it helps us, quickly and with little effort, to be more sure about the effectiveness of the content we are promoting to our customers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Analyzing our report was difficult, as was reconciling the profitability with our internal data since we use different attribution models. It would also be nice to have more sophisticated visualizations in the dashboards to better understand campaign analytics.

We wanted to create a personalized experience for our clients, keeping them engaged and bringing loyalty. Using Insider's personalization suite, we have managed to achieve just that!

Their wide range of in-built templates has proved extremely useful in helping us create campaigns easily and quickly. Hence, we needed little help from their team once we were onboarded, as their tools are pretty easy to use.

Thus we could create an effective personalization engine on our website with little effort needed from our IT team.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's marketing tools gave our website a boost in traffic we needed!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
A responsive experience is very important for a website as a lot of people view websites too on mobile devices these days. The Personalize it Yourself (PIY) toolkit in the Web Suite from Architect lets marketers be great designers.
We were able to create responsive experiences that look spectacular on any device and on any platform. Marketers need not ask the IT personnel for help either as layout optimization requires no coding either.
Insider's Architect with its easy to design customer journeys also saved us a lot of time and increased conversions.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It can be overwhelming at first to use the Web Suite due to the vast amount of capabilities it has, but we quickly got around to making our website a lot better. A big thank you to Insider for that.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our website was just another e-commerce website selling consumer goods. Though our products were unique in the materials we used, the look and feel, and sustainability too, we had very few visitors.
We used just two features of the Web Suite to get the results we always wanted. The use of layout optimization helped us experiment with different layouts until we picked the right one with Insider's A/B testing tool.
Insider's Architect then helped us create customer journeys that led to more conversions. Not just that, but we were also able to A/B test the customer journeys on our website.
Both these products together helped us increase traffic to our website in just a matter of months. We are so happy that we used Insider. I would heartily recommend it to everyone.

all_reviews.review_content:

As a business, we understand that each customer is unique. With Insider's Web Suite we were able to capture the attention of our target audience with personalised bite-sized content that appeals to them. Their deep segmentation capabilities and ready-to-use templates helped us get the right customer eyeballs for the right product.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Their current templates save us a lot of time, it would be great if they could keep adding new templates frequently.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider's tools are very effective in increasing engagement and conversion rates in mobile. We would recommend their Mobile Web Solution to everyone.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had a mountain of customer data but we really didn't know what to do with it. Insider's Customer Data Platform (CDP) helped us consolidate all the data from different channels and bring it into meaningful insights from where we could segment audiences better to build personalised campaigns.

Insider helped us segment its basis into various parameters such as buying frequency, time-zone, country, past user behavior etc. Once we had all the data systematically segmented we were able to
think through and design highly personalized, easy to read and digest stories that helped us get more sales.

all_reviews.review_title: 3X ROI with unparalleled personalized cross-channel customer journey orchestration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are convinced that there's nobody that does cross-channel customer journey automation and orchestration better than Insider. The platform has it all - ease of use, a wide variety of features, flexible templates for easy campaign creation, simple, straightforward data reporting, and a great customer support team to enhance the overall experience of using the platform.

Along with cross-channel customer journeys, the platform also seamlessly gathers data from across our multiple channels and brings them into one place for us to get a deep understanding of our customers. Thanks to the CDP function, we have a larger picture in our mind of what our customer base is like, and we have been able to craft campaigns that have proven more effective than ever before.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There were a few hiccups in the implementation stage.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our goal was seamless cross-channel customer journey optimization. Insider's Architect is by far the most advanced technology that we have come across that covers a wide range of channels without complicating the user experience of the platform. With great ease, we can create new campaigns and whole journeys and execute them. 3x ROI from doing this is a delightful result for us to have in a matter of months.

all_reviews.review_title: Achieved substantial ROI and Net Revenue using Insider's Web Push notifications
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We believe that Insider's Web Push solution is the a great push notification solution. They offer so many capabilities and the messages can be sent out to engage different segments of users. We send out web push messages in such situations - instantly when a user abandons the cart, when a product they viewed previously has a discount, and also to send out generic sale announcements.

A trigger campaign that we sent out to try to re-engage inactive users brought a good conversion rate of 6.21% in just one month. That's quite amazing considering that these were users who hadn't been to our website for a long time and we managed to bring them back to our website.

Their segmentation functionality is good and we're able to create customized campaigns for different segments of users and due to this we're able to personalize experiences better. Combining this with Insider's AI-powered Send Time Optimization capability, we were able to ensure that the message is sent out at the right time to catch the attention of our users.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We haven't faced too many major challenges with Insider. At the start, we faced a bit of a hassle with the integration but once that was done, it's been pretty seamless.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Their web push messages have enabled us to target a wide variety of segments of users and we've increased the engagement since we're creating different campaigns for each segment and these users are now seeing more relevant messages than ever before.

Their Account Management team was super supportive at the start during integration. They also offer their industry expertise and give suggestions in terms of campaigns we can create to boost our engagement even more.

Our campaigns have generated amazing conversion rates. And this has led to a satisfying ROI too. We're therefore quite happy with Insider!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's cross-channel marketing automation solution, Architect, helped us segment customers into specific journeys using predictive segmentation. This was managed by their AI engine, which enabled us to target the right user segments based on a set of conditions, making it highly accurate for our needs.
We managed to engage the right users (who hadn't engaged for a long time) with the right content on the right channel using Architect and it was a win-win for us as we were able to stop the customers from churning.Insider's Architect can segment users based on several parameters. It personalizes the messages delivered to the user. There's a learning curve to how it works and it took us some time to come up to speed.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are happy with the experience so far and there is nothing we can recall that was not up to our expectations. We hope it remains the same in future as well!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We did not know the best way to segment our customers. Using Architect, we segmented customers based on their behavior and purchase history. These segments can be further categorized into static (segments that stay constant) and dynamic segments (those that change over time). The segments - likelihood to purchase and the customer lifetime value provided by Insider further helped us create better personalized campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer:
Insider's cross-channel marketing automation solution, Architect, helped us segment customers into specific journeys using predictive segmentation. This was managed by their AI engine, which enabled us to target the right user segments based on a set of conditions, making it highly accurate for our needs.
We managed to engage the right users (who hadn't engaged for a long time) with the right content on the right channel using Architect and it was a win-win for us as we were able to stop the customers from churning.Insider's Architect can segment users based on several parameters. It personalizes the messages delivered to the user. There's a learning curve to how it works and it took us some time to come up to speed.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: We are happy with the experience so far and there is nothing we can recall that was not up to our expectations. We hope it remains the same in future as well!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We did not know the best way to segment our customers. Using Architect, we segmented customers based on their behavior and purchase history. These segments can be further categorized into static (segments that stay constant) and dynamic segments (those that change over time). The segments - likelihood to purchase and the customer lifetime value provided by Insider further helped us create better personalized campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: High deliverability score with Insider's advanced email contact filtering
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Almost everything about Insider's email suite was great, but three things stood out for us:
1.	Contact filtering that enables high-precision targeting, leading to improvement in deliverability score
2.	Configuration of their email suite is easy
3.	They provide the best customer support and account management

Another aspect worthy of mention is that Insider has also served us as a great customer data platform that allows us to get a birds-eye view of all our customers with the ability to zone in on as many aspects as we like to segment and target them better.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were only bothered by Insider's lack of local language support on the platform.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a business, we want to have greater customer engagement through email marketing. In addition to being a promotional medium, it is also a tool for nurturing customer relationships. We wanted to establish effective communication and the deliverability score serves as a significant metric for measuring the success of this mission. Email suite seemed to be a perfect aid to help us achieve our target.

We started using it as a part of our marketing strategy. We have been successful in leveling up customer engagement with Insider's email suite. We strongly feel it has contributed to boosting our conversion rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Improved customer engagement and boosted conversions with InStory recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are highly elated to see how Insider has enabled us to provide our customers with a personalized customer experience and helped us boost our engagement rates. We implemented interactive quizzes on the product pages to engage visitors on our website. This implementation offered them a chance to win a discount coupon on answering all questions correctly, which further helped us personalize product recommendations and convert visitors into customers. By using Instory, Insider's gamified product recommendations product that shows recommendations in the form of Instagram-like stories, we have been able to engage our customers better.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Our experience with Insider has been delightful. There's nothing we didn't like about the platform except that there are separate dashboards for the different products we're using. A single, consolidated analytics dashboard would be good.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an media brand, we were witnessing a large number of customers dropping off from a few product pages. By implementing Insider's InStory tool on our website, we were able to boost product discovery by making experiences more interesting and rewarding by showing our latest offers. The tool enabled us to display our products in the form of a snackable storytelling format and caught the user's eye by showcasing highly interactive content to increase customer engagement. As a result, we saw a significant boost in conversion rates and reduction in bounce rate. Thanks to Instory as it also helped us improve the average session time on the homepage, increased user engagement, and retain customers on the site.

all_reviews.review_title: Improved lead collection with timely triggers and flexible templates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Converting anonymous or new users into registered users across the website and mobile app without pushing this user segment towards annoyance is a challenge. With Insider's gamified lead collection templates we are able to incentivize new users to register and encourage first-time purchase via relevant discount codes during checkout. Their flexible templates also help us capture opt-in consent for channels like WhatsApp and SMS at relevant stages of the buyer journey and aided our subscriber growth.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We wanted to replicate our lead collection success on our mobile app as well and for a while there weren't enough relevant in-app templates for this use case. However, that has been addressed and their expanded template library definitely makes it easier to experiment with immersive experiences like "Spin the Wheel" etc.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
While we were getting traffic and app downloads and launches, we needed to reduce the bounce rate and app closure rates on first-time launch. In this regard, identifying unregistered users with different identifiers was key with Insider. Not only are they helping us capture leads at a vital stage of the customer lifecycle, they also help leverage these data points to drive deeper cross-channel personalization.

all_reviews.review_content:

A mobile app takes a lot of convincing to be downloaded on to a customer's mobile device. When they do so, it's so important to give them an experience that makes your app worthy of being on their device without getting deleted soon. Insider's mobile app suite is a dream come true for marketers. It includes a really wide variety of features ranging from category optimisation to lead collection, each with its own set of templates for easy creation.

Our favorite part of the mobile app suite is the fun gamified experiences we are able to offer our customers. These play a huge role in improving the interactions on our app, giving customers the incentive to use the app.

We have been able to offer a highly personalized mobile app experience thanks to using Insider's mobile app suite.

We would really like some of the features to be more flexible in terms of their placement in the app.

Combined with their segmentation capabilities, you can push out some complex, design-heavy customizations and run CRO experiments with little to no coding efforts. Before introducing responsive templates it was quite hard for us to replicate our efforts on different devices which involved a lot of effort. Now that's been solved.

We had high bounce rates because of broken experiences that were not personalized and we couldn't scale our efforts in designing these experiences. Insider came in and transformed our lives with their plentiful pre-made templates and highly interactive and gamified options to choose from. We were able to scale our personalization efforts very quickly with very less effort from our end. A game-changer.

The AI-based recommendations helped us cross-sell and up-sell with relevant content. The wheel of fortune allowed us to gamify our app for a better experience and to engage more users. Social proof allowed us to leverage existing customer purchases more effectively.
The result: We were able to increase the number of positive reviews on the app store, increase the average order value, and most importantly reduce churn. I would recommend Insider's mobile marketing app to every e-commerce venture out there. Try it, to believe it!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The app suite has helped us achieve the desired outcomes from our campaign and the team has always been available to help and guide us. The team is probably one of the most important aspects of working with Insider that sets them apart from bigger vendors doing the same thing - they truly care about their customers and go out of their way to help us achieve our goals.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We had no idea about how to export analytics reports so we did lose out on the benefits initially. However, the Insider team walked us through each of these reports.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the biggest issues that we faced was a high churn rate and there was no way we could identify those cases, nor could we pinpoint the reason for such churn. But the Insider mobile app suite changed it all.

The reporting feature enables the download of campaign performance reports. Reports such as 'uninstall analytics' and 'app tracker' help track when users are uninstalling an app and what other apps they are using on their device.
This real-time tracking enabled us to reconnect with the customer on time, know their pain points, improvise the app for a better user experience, and nudge them to use the app again.

all_reviews.review_title: 40% more leads from Insider while also saving costs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's tools have performed exceptionally well for our business. One of the most impactful things from Insider has been how we have been able to save the costs of IT development because the platform is a self-service, easy-to-use interface that does all the work we would ever need on our website to create and execute new marketing campaigns.

With Social Proof, we were successful in convincing hesitant individuals to get a quote from us or select a plan, resulting in a 16.77% uplift in leads from just that one tool. The campaigns are all super easy to implement, and we can A/B test all elements that we work with to ensure the best combination for achieving impressive results.

Using Insider, our website has been optimized so well that we have also been able to save costs on paid media. The platform easily integrates with other marketing tools that we use, making it a winner in all ways. Plus, Insider is also a CDP, which offers huge value for money.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It is not quite what we dislike, but just a small issue. We have a bunch of different domains we work with. Since all of them are in the same panel on Insider, it is a little difficult for us to monitor performance for individual domains.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We understand the value of a good platform for marketing that can do multiple things, but we didn't know how much more value Insider would bring us - we have been able to save costs on IT development and paid media, along with getting great returns on the investment. We have also been able to get a higher number of leads than ever before, and this is tremendously impactful for our business. We are very happy with Insider.

all_reviews.review_content:

Choosing Insider for our marketing needs was one of the best decisions we've made as a business. They have redefined what it means to be able to cater to customers in a way that they like. With Insider, we are able to approach our users with a more personal touch instead of being all business-like with no humane element.
Personalizing our mobile app using Insider has resulted in increase in conversions, with our users feeling like we get their needs better. We are even able to send hyper-personalized email campaigns which have achieved great open rates that are above the industry average.

We are able to see data from these channels too, in one place, and this helps us understand the performance of our campaigns much better. We have achieved improvement in conversions and engagement since we started using Insider.

all_reviews.review_content:

We can easily communicate with the Insider team on all issues. When there is a new feature we want to implement on our website, we first contact the Insider. This feature is usually seen by someone on the Insider side and implemented. In this way, as a team, we can focus on developing this feature, not adding it to the website. In addition, they provide quick turnaround in customizing the features we add to our website according to our brand.
At the beginning of the working process with Insider, the integration processes progress very quickly. The availability and detailed documentation of all integrations and the availability of self-service control tools are major factors in this regard.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful and easy-to-use marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I use Insider on a daily basis for our direct marketing communications such as ad-hoc email campaigns, web push notifications, on-site campaigns, and automated journeys, and I can say that it is a powerful and easy-to-use omnichannel marketing platform.

Mostly I like the email builder, which is very easy to use and you can create designs with little HTML knowledge or without any.
Secondly, I like the Architect (automated journeys), in which you can use a variety of templates covering the most common user behaviors, such as Abandoned browse, Abandoned cart, etc.
You can also create your own journeys and add every channel you desire in one single journey, depending on the user's reachability.

Their Customer service is also good, they respond very quickly and you can write not only about issues or bugs but even if you need support for creating a campaign, or customizing a template for your business goals.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I like the platform a lot, however, like every other platform, it can't be perfect.
We had some issues related to the prices of the products visualized in emails.
And we faced some roadblocks with integrating Insider into our application.
However, Insider's team always responds to our requests.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can say that the use of Insider for more than a year has helped us implement a lot of campaigns, both ad-hoc and automated, which have had a great impact on increasing the company's Revenue, AoV, and ROI.

Data-powered marketing is the rule of the day and Insider, with it's potent technology, is here to stay. Insider is an able, feature-loaded platform that is a delight to use with its simple interface and intelligent technology. They offer great local support which is of immense value.Their email feature is also easily one of the best performing ones we've used, and we've seen a high average open rate of 52.89%. I especially like the many options to personalize these emails.

It is also an exceptional customer data platform that segments our audience into a wide range of precise segments that are easy to target, and which result in high conversions. I also really like the simplicity of the panel that displays the results of our campaigns in an easy-to-understand format.

What do you dislike about Insider?
1. The emails don't always display as we formatted them on some devices.
2. Coupon distribution can be improved so users don't need to do manual monitoring every day

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a part of our digital transformation, we decided to take a multichannel approach to our marketing strategy. Using Insider's CDP, we have brought in all of our channels under one umbrella, and we are able to overlook, edit, track, and compare all our different campaigns easily. We use almost all the features available and are able to offer a wide variety of experiences to our customers using this platform.

all_reviews.review_title: 35% CRU in less than one year of using Insider's AI-powered Personalization Engine
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Smart Recommender is not the first one we've used to show AI-powered personalized product recommendations but is surely a good solution compared with the past we've used. We are able to check real-time statistics, unlike previous vendors we had. It is also unbelievably easy to implement it on our website and we don't have to reach out to our IT department for that. We love that it is very flexible to work with, so we quite enjoy using it.

But above all, this technology delivers results that make a difference. 35% increase in conversion rate in less than one year of using it is no small feat. Among all, the revenue brought by Insider's smart recommendations has been growing. Which means machine learning continues to optimize and has been improving over the years.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Whenever we make changes to our website structure, the Smart Recommender campaigns get affected for some time before picking up again. Web push usage is under expectation, and did not bring as much business profit as predicted due to restriction.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were simply looking for a better solution than the one we were using before for product recommendations. We didn't have the option of having real-time statistics with our previous vendor, so when we found that Insider offers the same. It performs exceedingly well and delivers results that inspire us, and it is also very thoughtfully made with marketers in mind. All in all, it has been a great product for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Good tool for creating meaningful customer journey
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Starting from the onboarding we had great support from both product onboarding specialists and customer success manager, and it helped us learn and adapt to the products and easily use the panel later on. Insider panel is already user-friendly, but support from product onboarding team is very valuable.

What do you dislike about Insider?
now I understand that we need more user attributes, as well as events to do deeper user segmentation and triggers for user journeys. If we would have integrated all these events and attributes in the beginning, it would help me as digital marketing manager with user journeys now. But I undertand that IT-processes-wise it's not possible. So, my suggestion / idea is to make much deeper product training before IT starts integration, so that the marketer could prioritise some points knowing products possibilities in advance. Just an idea

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been working with Insider already for quite a long time in different regions. But here we implemented Insider a bit less than 1 year ago. Our main goal was to build a constent communication with our customers. With the help of Insider we onboard and retain users to become our loyal customers. We use Architect Journey builder with email, web push and app push channels to build customer journey from the moment a user first land on our website. The platform helps us to build meaningful journeys and interact with multi-channel users easily and quickly. Next move - adding SMS via call an API to user journeys

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
All of Insider's tools have been incredibly effective for our business, especially their web suite and onsite experimentation features. They offer a large number of templates which are flexible for usage and we can customize them however we like.

One thing that we were most impressed about is that their AI-powered smart recommender was integrated into our website with simply one line of code! We were amazed by how fast it happened and how smoothly we were able to carry out a pretty big change such as adding the smart recommender, without any hassle. And the product has been doing a great job serving our customers highly personalized product recommendations, resulting in an overall increase in conversions and average cart value. One of the smart recommendations - recently viewed items on the cart page, was able to generate a 42% uplift in CR for us, and we have been mighty impressed by these results.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It takes a little time to update and fix system rules whenever we have website updates.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted a tool to help us personalize our website experience by segmenting the audience on many levels. Insider works as a brilliant customer data platform that brings in customer data from many different sources to aid advanced segmentation that is accurate, granular and very useful for marketing campaigns. We have been able to target our audience with very relevant, highly precise content for each segment, only because of how neatly Insider has helped us segment our customer data. It is no surprise at all that since we started using Insider, we have achieved a 240X ROI.

all_reviews.review_title: Significant overall improvement in our marketing metrics using Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We now offer connected and cohesive user experiences across different channels thanks to using Insider. Insider's Customer Data Platform helps us consolidate the data from different channels, and segment our customers better to provide personalized customer experiences. We are able to maintain consistency in our brand communication because of being able to have all our channels under one roof and managing content for all of those from the same place.

Insider supports goal tracking and pretty advanced A/B testing without needing developer support. It has empowered our marketing team to take complete charge of our marketing tasks from beginning to end, and the analytics provided by Insider is the cherry on top of this. Our understanding of our customers has never been better.

Because of this, our customer satisfaction and engagement are also at an all-time high. We have achieved over 6% improvement in CR and a 4% improvement in AOV.

The platform is easy to use, offers many flexible templates for variety, and is a marketer's best friend when used well.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We haven't been able to relieve ourselves of the need for support from Insider's team, even though we have been using it for 2 years.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our overall user experience has vastly improved, leading to increased customer satisfaction levels. We have gained improvements in conversions and AOV using Insider, too.

all_reviews.review_title: We achieved a 275% uplift in conversion rate using Insider's personalization products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
It's been one of the best decisions for us to use Insider as the platform is easy to navigate. They've helped us personalize experiences across the customer lifecycle seamlessly. Their products offer so much more than we initially expected.

Not just that, but the way team Insider collaborated with us and provided us with comprehensive training is genuinely commendable. Not just in helping us address any challenges that we faced, they also provided us with ample solutions to improve our campaigns and in turn improve our key marketing metrics.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Initially, there were some minor discrepancies in settings, such as language settings due to which our campaigns got slightly delayed. But with the help of a highly responsive support team at Insider, we were able to troubleshoot those problems and understand how we can avoid them from happening again in the future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
As we work in a regulated industry, we're not able to run ad campaigns. This is why we wanted a solution that could help maximize conversions and AOV. That's where Insider came into the picture and suggested we leverage their Smart Recommender tool and implement conversion triggers on our website, such as progress bars and coupon codes using their Web Push suite. By doing this, we witnessed a significant increase in the Average Order Value and a boost of 275% in the conversion rates (CVR).

In addition, we used their Email channel to send personalized and promotional emails to our customers which enabled us to influence the decision of our customers to make their first purchase on our website.

all_reviews.review_title: 23% increase in revenue with Insider's expert products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Not only has Insider contributed to a 23% increase in revenue, we have also been able to win back 15% of our customers who abandoned their carts on our website. Using Insider's app suite, we have seen a 20% increase in the number of active users on our app. We would also like to give special mention to the amazingly automated, easy to use push notifications feature. Using Insider, we were able to create and send 1.2x more push notifications compared to our previous vendor.

On the whole, the products from Insider have worked impressively for us. We must also give due credit to the very supportive customer success team that has been present for us throughout our usage of Insider. Their business review meetings proved very useful for us, and the insights and recommendations from the team helped us make some good business decisions that have paid off well for us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
One of the features - retargeting audience on Facebook, has not been working for us as they are dependent on a third party. The issue, however, has been raised with Facebook and we're waiting for a response from them. But with Insider, itself, there's nothing to dislike

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We sell a lot of products and there are pretty long journeys for our customers for all of these. We were looking for a solution that would help us understand customer behavior at different points in their journey and different levels of the funnel they are in. We also wanted to optimize our automated marketing capabilities, and achieve incremental revenue from the same. Another focus area of ours was to increase the number of active users on our app. Using Insider was beneficial for us and helped us achieve our goals for all these issues. With advanced Insider analytics, we analyzed as many as 19 different funnel behaviors which heavily upgraded our marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider has overhauled our mobile web experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
A good mobile web experience does not leave the customer wishing they were using a desktop. Insider has helped us achieve this level of customer experience on our mobile website with their suite made especially for this purpose. It comes with a variety of features like dynamic menus, social proof and personalized banner management. These all work together extremely well and create a delectable, personalized experience for our users.

Our website is optimized for content delivery on different mobile devices, and Insider offers us complete freedom in rearranging the content on our website in the best way possible for each different element. They have an extensive element library that makes it feel like our websites were made by developers with a lot of coding, while in reality, we have only used Insider's amazingly easy-to-use platform to achieve such results.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While we have achieved good results, we don't like to settle for average when we can have the best. We would like to see how Insider performs in the long run and what kind of sustained growth it brings. We don't really dislike anything, though.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to create a frustration-free mobile web experience for our users which would encourage them to go through with their purchases instead of dropping off because our website wasn't easy to navigate. Insider has made our mobile website top-notch with great features and easy-to-change elements that help us provide a refreshing experience for our users.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly personalized customer experiences that our users love
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Being a grocery store offering online shopping, Insider has given us a complete overhaul of what our customers should experience when shopping from us. Insider's Customer Data Platform has helped us understand individual customers better and track their purchase patterns and behaviors with us over time. Their AI-powered Smart Recommender has helped us suggest products and relevant content before they even need them using the data captured by the CDP. Using Insider has helped us deliver a cohesive customer experience across the many different channels we engage with our customers including email and our mobile app. Marketing campaigns are made easy with a number of extensive, flexible templates that we can tweak to our requirements. It is a great self-service tool that delivers amazing value to our customers and brings in higher sales and conversions than ever before.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The price of the platform was quite high for us when we first checked it out. However, after using it for a good while now, we understand why it is priced the way it is.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Grocery shopping is filled with many opportunities to personalize the shopping experience for our customers and make them want to choose us over and over again. To execute such a transformation for our business, we were looking for a capable solution. Insider is the ideal personalization software, in our opinion, with its many customer-focused features that work on human psychology to get conversions and clicks. We love that we can use it all on our own, and yet, the Insider team is always around for help if we ever need it. Insider offers a complete package - a great product, customer service that is reliable, and value for money.

Insider is one of the most feature-rich marketing tools that we have used. They offer a user friendly interface that is also technologically advanced, helping us make our dream campaigns come true. One cart abandonment campaign with an exit intent overlay generated a remarkable CR uplift of 42%.

These have helped us achieve a significant improvement in our marketing, both on-site and for us at the office. all_reviews.review_title: Great platform, AMAZING people and I'll focus my review on them
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What I love (as opposed to like) are the people. I think the platform is one thing but without having the right partners who understand your objectives and limitations of your team/resources/time, it will be hard to get anything out of any platform and partnership you will engage with.
It's been a breeze to work with every single person we engage with, all super committed, knowledgeable and genuinely paying interest in your business. They learn about my current challenges and adjusted themselves to our needs. In our case are people, relevant skill set, and time.
The focus was on quick setup and quick sales win or at least data that will allow us to make better merchandise decisions. The Insider team did not rush us through the process and in fact, did a lot more heavy lifting for us than expected just to get the ball rolling. That terms built internal confidence in the platform and created more curiosity about what else we can do and achieve. We are also a new B2B platform in which most of what we do is new and we are almost creating the wheel. The purchasing behavior of our buyers is different than B2C space.
So once again I'd like to highlight the people behind the platform

I do like customer profiling management, event triggering, and personalization, also good at picking the best variations.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are fairly new with Insider and so far didn't find anything we didn't like. We really only focused on what will give us quick and easy wins as we learn to navigate through the platform

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
With limited resources to identify faults or opportunities, Insider's ability to provide data that we didn't have access to before or the resources to set it up. We also could jump on some easy wins to drive more revenue and in a new business like ours, it's critical.

all_reviews.review_title: A Plugin powerhouse of web features and gamification
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Without any need for an in-house developer, it's easy to get started on Insider to enhance navigation experience for customers.
- Notify them of price drops, new launches or campaigns via webpush notifications
- Spur urgency to shop with countdown timer or social proof
- Boost conversions with both new or existing users through Spin-the-wheel or voucher pop-ups (optional request for emails)
- Extract customer feedbacks through post-purchase surveys
- Use Smart Recommender to push other products relevant to the categories customers are viewing

These are just a few out of the plethora of useful features within Insider.
Create A/B scenarios and measure performance of clicks and incremental revenue.

Insider also allows you to segment the scenarios based on user behavior, sessions and many more.

Occasionally for big campaigns such as Singles' Day, Insider's development team would collaborate with us to create custom gamification. Great customer support from both dev team and our key account manager.

Another plus point if you're managing multiple regions/brands: Insider saves time by allowing  you to duplicate your scenarios to other sites with insider implemented.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We do encounter glitches in a few pop-ups where the "X" button could not be closed. This is absolutely common as with other tools by Insider's competitors. Ensure you do your testing extensively in both desktop and mobile browsers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Web push notification gets the word out to more customers who may have visited our site without purchasing. Extra features we wanted on our site without buying separate plugins or custom development such as Social Proof or lead collection pop-ups. Giving users a reason to make repeat purchases through post-sale vouchers. Gamifying and creating personalized shopping experience.

We have used gamification templates such as "wheel of fortune" or "Swipe" to significantly improve our lead generation strategies and increase user engagement. In only 4 months we have seen an 8.6x ROI and a 9.6% CR uplift with Insider. The Smart recommendations are one of our strongest features, we have also gotten amazing results here.
The team at Insider has made using the platform stress-free. We have constant support from them and they will always go over and above to make sure we can put out ideas into motion to get the best results in our campaigns. We really appreciate that Insider listens to our product recommendations and they are willing to improve based on customer feedback.
On the whole, this is a hugely scalable, always evolving, cross-channel platform that is easy to use and very effective.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Smart Recommender delivers 37X ROI by showing personalized product recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The Smart Recommender from Insider with its highly personalized and auto-optimized recommendations has given us an enticing 37x ROI on top of a great average conversion rate of over 23%. This particular product is extremely efficient in driving up-sell and cross-sell with recommendations that are most relevant to each user.

What we like the most about using Insider is that we are able to deliver a fully tailored experience for our visitors, entirely driven by reliable data that is accumulated by the user's interactions across channels. We have also noticed an uplift in product page view of 45.28%, which we believe is a reflection of the improved customer experience that is enabled by Insider. Another specific feature we really like is the ability to create unified profiles for our visitors with data across multiple channels. With these profiles, Insider then uses its predictive AI model to carry out segmentation, which leads to improved personalization.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The platform is built for marketers of all levels, and we found that some of the advanced features weren't as self-explanatory as others. This necessitates some level of extra training beyond their self-help resources to use the platform fully.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is, without a doubt, one of the best cross-channel campaign management software available today. It is packed with features that leave no room for complaints. With Insider, you not only get value for your money but multifold returns on your investment. Just make sure you learn to use all the features thoroughly so you don't miss out on anything.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to improve the customer experience across our channels and increase conversions. We can safely say that since using Insider, we have had phenomenal development on both these fronts and our business has been steadily growing. Our current trends indicate continuous growth, moving forward, and we are excited to see where Insider can take us.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With a wide selection of ready to use templates which are flexible and customizable, Insider has made marketing infinitely simpler and increased our team's productivity. They are a very amicable team to work with, as well, constantly coming up with new ideas and solutions to challenges that we face. Their local team support is amazing, and they have been key to helping us understand everything with their impeccable technical communication and know-how. In short, Insider makes for a great CDP that performs exceptionally well with easy to use tools that make our website highly optimized for our users. Insider's CDP helped us bring data from multiple channels into a single location, enabling us to extract true value from the data. It was easy to integrate with the rest of our tech stack and has brought in great marketing value by  helping us engage with our customers more efficiently by creating more personalized campaigns.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Some of the templates that we wanted to use were not very easy to implement and we needed the help of the Insider team to make them work for us.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to track data and our goals in one place without needing external support. Carrying out A/B testing is also an important part of our marketing strategy. Insider offers both of these in a highly efficient, easy to use manner which can give competitors a run for their money. Our internal development team no longer has to be called upon for simple website improvements or changes, and both our development and marketing teams are now a lot more productive and efficient, thanks to Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Improved interactivity using Insider's products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are Indonesia's first interactive app for pregnancy, and with Insider's help, our interactivity has gone one step further to become more timely and automated. Using their automated push notifications, we are able to send out vital, useful information to our users based on their daily updates. And insiders always help us with the new idea which can be more creative in push notifications/inApp.
From Insider's advanced analytics, we have also been able to understand different pregnancy stages of our users and tailor the onboarding process for each stage so that it is most effective in encouraging users to go through till the end. Once they have signed up to our app, we are then able to send highly personalized, relevant content which drives customer engagement.
Another useful function of Insider is analyzing and understanding the adoption rates of different features on our app which goes a long way in helping us decide what needs to be sunset and what needs to be improved.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We don't quite have anything that we have found negative about Insider so far.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Leave your marketing to Insider and sit back in your seat, because this platform truly does it all. With freed up time, we are able to put more effort into creative discussions to develop our app. We only need to check in periodically to make any tweaks if needed and just to ensure everything is running as we would like it to (which it usually does). Otherwise, Insider has been a brilliant choice for us as a growing business.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our requirement was for a platform that will enhance our interactivity and make it smoother through marketing automation. Insider's automated features are reliable and work efficiently like clockwork. We have been able to make a lot of important decisions regarding our app using the data we have analyzed with Insider's help. On the whole, Insider has been a must-have for our business, and the insiders themselves. The way they communicate, and very attractive to us
