all_reviews.review_title: App push that instantly clicks with customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With Insider's app push, we have been able to encourage our customers, especially the new ones, to activate their membership and take the first step towards a healthy life by motivating them to go to our gyms. The push notifications are very effective in delivering this much needed virtual "push" to our customers. The customizable templates are easy to use and we can create entirely new push notifications in a matter of minutes and send them out to hundreds and thousands of customers in one go.
This is, undoubtedly, the easiest way to find our customers at the right time with just the right kind of messaging designed to convert.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have noticed that sometimes the push notifications get delivered even when quiet hours or DND is turned on for our customers. However, we've been told that this is something the Insider team is working on and should be resolved soon. Otherwise, everything else works smoothly without any problems.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Sometimes, the simplest solutions often turn out to be the most effective, and this has been the case for us when using Insider's app push. We think it's quite hard to find another app push platform as good, efficient and dependable like Insider's.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to activate new members who had signed up but didn't make any progress after that, and others who had downloaded our app but didn't go through with the registration. With timely push notifications using Insider's app push, we were able to improve our click through rates, engagement and conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic tool that empowers the entire organization to test and succeed. Higher conversions + more
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Our customer case study pages are a key focal point of our site. One of our key goals was to reduce the bounce rate on these case study pages. Insider's exit intent technology detects when a user goes to close a page on web or mobile web and reengages them with an engaging overlay.

Another key ambition was to learn more about our visitors, in order to personalize the customer experience. We were so impressed with the number and variety of ready-to-go templates on the platform that can be applied to our site in minutes, with no coding or development work. The survey templates in particular have helped us to better understand our customers, guaging interest, gathering zero-party data and driving new business.

My team constantly come up with new ideas. With Insider, we can put them all to the test. With the ease and speed of the tool I can respond "yes, let's do it now", not next month or six months down the line. They feel empowered and motivated. And it drives results.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Insider platform is built to make it easy for businesses to be self-service creating their own campaigns without external resource. That in itself is great and the strategic support we receive is excellent. However, when my team is busy, it would be great to have a more full-service support option.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider saves us time, money and resource. Without the platform, we would have to allocate resources to our web agency and wait for the work to be done. With Insider, the wait is gone and we can take action straight away.

Being able to SMS messages both in of themselves and in cross channel journeys, cart and browse recovery has decreased as we are able to take proactive action. Our customers respond well to timely and relatable messages.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us achieve email open rates that were 63.64% higher than industry benchmark
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Using Insider's Email Marketing has been a refreshing, successful experience for us as it has helped us improve user engagement on emails. We sent highly targeted emails using Insider's segmentation, and these emails received an average open rate of 29.71%, which is far above the edtech industry benchmark.

There are many ready-to-use templates and interactive email features that help our emails stand apart and get opened. The templates are all easy to configure, so setting up a new email campaign is a breeze.

Insider's platform is also easily and seamlessly integrated with our blog, which has made it extremely smooth to collect contact information from the lead generation on our website.

We also use Architect, Insider's AI-powered cross-channel journey, to orchestrate customer journeys across channels and devices, and we have comfortably and easily automated many such user journeys for a wide variety of use cases. The product has helped us improve our overall conversions and revenues by improving our engagement across channels.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We would like ticket resolution to be more timely

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a solution that will allow us to convert our leads into registered users and registered users into active ones. Using Insider's customer journey orchestration tool, Architect, we have created journeys that convert, and emails that get opened. The segmentation abilities offered by Insider are unparalleled and we credit this entirely for our successful email marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Enhanced shopping experiences with Insider's personalized templates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has a wealth of marketing tools and features that helped us deliver personalized shopping experiences that resonate with our users. We really enjoyed using some of the gamified templates to make different parts of our website more interactive. They have been very beneficial to increasing our conversions and user engagement on various pages. We have also had an increase in the lead collection because our users are more willing to leave their contact information when we use gamified templates with small incentives for them in return. In our experience, we have found Insider's capabilities to be well thought out, and with their high-performing technology, we have achieved improvement on all the aspects that we wanted to.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We were initially a little overwhelmed by the amount of features presented by the platform. It took us a little while to get around to using everything well.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been facing drop-outs in traffic after people browse our website. We wanted to decrease this and convert these users to shoppers who go through with their purchases. Insider helped us in two ways - one, their interactive templates which are personalized helped us speak to our users better, and this led to them converting more. Second, by using Insider's gamified lead collection templates, we were able to follow up better with users who abandoned us and bring them back to our website for cart recovery.

all_reviews.review_content:

Insider is a must-have for any business that caters to a digital audience. We use a range of their products from mobile app to email, and each of these products work brilliantly. Both on their own, and as a connected set of channels that a customer journeys through, these are all impactful and effective. We are able to present a consistent brand experience across a variety of channels because Insider brings everything under one roof. We are able to better analyze the data of customers in all these channels and plan our marketing campaigns better.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The email service is a little buggy at times.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to create a marketing strategy that smoothly includes and navigates multiple channels that our customers are present in. Insider became a much-needed product for us to make this happen. It is easy to execute and monitor campaigns for all these channels from one place, and easier still to analyze the data from these different sources. Insider is a powerhouse and has become essential for our business.

all_reviews.review_title: Achieved 15X ROI using Insider's strong suite of products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has allowed us to personalize our website across all pages with their incredible Smart Recommender. This product has, almost single handedly, elevated the shopping experience on our website by providing personalized product recommendations driven by data. We really enjoy using their web and mobile suite as well to personalize other aspects of our website such as banners. In one campaign with a cart reminder banner, we were able to achieve a conversion rate of 33%. This was a pretty exciting result for us.

We especially benefited from Insider's highly capable predictive segmentation feature that enabled us to target our customers better based on behavioral data and flexible trigger rules. Another thing worthy of mention about Insider as a platform is the easy-to-use editor that allows us to quickly edit templates and create the content we want.

Special mention should also be made for their support interface - Insider Help Centre contained everything we needed to know to set up a campaign and go live with it, while chat support was available at any time when we had questions about the product.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have signed up for many products of Insider, so when we had a change in our team, it was just a little challenging for the incoming person to come up with new campaign ideas. But we find this to be a challenge to improve towards rather than something to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
When signing up for Insider, it will save you a lot of time and help you get the most out of your investment, as well.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to personalize our shopping experience and deliver relevant recommendations to our wide variety of users, based on their specific requirements, past searches, and so on. Insider has been a great platform that has taken care of this whole thing for us through auto-optimized recommendations. We barely have to do anything. We also enjoy the number of templates available when it comes to creating web and mobile personalized elements.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's web push tool is easily one of the bests in the category, having given us a great opt-in rate of 21%. We were able to broaden the conversation with our non-logged-in customers.
In one specific campaign for car loans, we were able to send 4.3M pushes, and achieved a CR of 2.39% from those. We love that with Insider's web push, doing very little can deliver great results.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have been struggling to include Insider's Web Push into our CRM journey, which the support team is working hard to help us out with. In the beginning, we believed that the configurations of segmentations and automations would be more easily implemented, however, as the Webmotors business is not a standard e-commerce, it was not that simple.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for lead generation, and to improve our marketing and business growth through digital efforts. Insider's web push was a small addition to this effort of ours, and it has proven to be quite useful for us. We have seen higher click-through rates with their push notifications, and an overall increase in customer engagement rates as well since the contextual messages have led to higher opt-ins.

all_reviews.review_title: Boost Site Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers some very creative features that are a delight to use, one of which is the personalized gamified experiences on the website. We set up a campaign to "Find the Puma Cat" during Singles' Day Campaign.

We love being able to combine multiple individual templates to create a single campaign, with flexible customization options available. These gamified templates have been phenomenal in improving our customer engagement across our website.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The thing we didn't like about the gamification campaigns using Insider was the amount of time it took for us to set up one campaign and the file limit of only 500kb allowed.

It is not very flexible in customizing visuals as I'm required to copy and paste image URLs and adjustments from HTML and CSS, especially when I need to prepare the campaign in Desktop and Mobile for multiple countries. It will take longer if I ask the team to adjust it for me.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem we aimed to solve was of customer engagement. Being a brand that really thrives on community engagement, we wanted to enable that experience on our website and make our visitors feel closer to us. With Insider's creative gamified templates, we have successfully increased engagement by a large percentage as the shoppers are spending longer time on the website.  We are eager to see this increased engagement result in improved sales as well in the future.

all_reviews.review_title: Great A/B testing tools and customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We wanted a data-driven approach to quickly test assumptions before developing new features, and Insider's A/B testing tools are exactly what we're looking for. It is a no brainer to use - Insider's tools are straightforward and don't require development work. Once you've integrated API, launching a new experiment could be as simple as a few clicks. All you have to do is define your scenarios and goals, confirm use cases and Insider support team will do the heavy lifting. Then you just wait for significance and probablity to tell you the winning variations. I like how Insider gives flexibility and full control of experiments. There are many options available, for example you can define user segment, traffic allocation or display time when designing campaigns. And Insider has the best partner support team - I was impressed by the fast response and the excellent support we have received.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The product is great and we're happy with the level of support. We'd like to see more in-depth reporting in the future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were after a straightforward A/B testing solution since online experiments could be frustrating and time-consuming. With Insider, we've been able to quickly carry out experiments, get a better understanding of user behaviours, and implement our findings in production.

all_reviews.review_content:

We like how all the processes are built: we don't need to push them, we receive immediate answers whenever a question appears, we can always ask for help, almost  24/7. The platform itself is also great and very easy to use. It is full of different templates and useful mechanics.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It is a difficult question, because from my point of view everything works at its best. The only problem we face is that due to the lack of time and person dedicated specifically to the platform we can't realize Insider's full potential.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
You should think of having a person who will be dedicated specifically to the platform , then you can reach all your goals with Insider.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We started working with Insider many years ago. We work in two main areas: mobile app and web. These products fulfill our main objectives. We use these tools as part of outreach goals and increasing brand loyalty. We primarily use web products to notify users about what is happening with us, what promotions and special offers we have. With the help of Insider segmentation, we personalize the entire process of communication with users. We are also launching segmented push notifications for different regions, cities, etc.
As part of the mobile app product, we've tried just about everything Insider has to offer. In addition to single push, we work with some much more complex mechanics, such as conversion pushes, in order to reach and work with the audience in the most targeted way. In addition to interacting with loyal users of the mobile application through mobile app pushes and in-apps, we use various on site communications .

all_reviews.review_title: Remarkable increase in AOV of 16.22% and an uplift in CR of 66.46% using Insider's personalization
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's segmentation is our favorite feature, something that we have immensely benefited
from. We cater to different kinds of customers, and this feature has been crucial in helping us
target the audience effectively to personalize the onsite experience for each type of customer.
Their web suite is geared for growth, and we achieved an AOV uplift of 16.22%. This was an
exciting result for us to achieve, because it is a pretty big margin by which we have increased
our sales. This was achieved by adding a sticky bar menu on our desktop website when visitors
were navigating and browsing on our platform. In another instance, we had displayed an exit-intent triggered cart-reminder overlay which
delivered a whopping 66.46% uplift in CR. That was truly phenomenal.

What do you dislike about Insider?
When we need to make custom segments, we always need to turn to the help center. We would
like to be able to do this otherwise also. We would also like to see personalized
recommendations being added to InStory.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to personalize our website for different segments of our customers and offer a
relevant experience to them according to the segment they are in. With Insider, we have
achieved this because their segmentation feature is top-notch and we can
rely on the platform to take care of the process on its own.

all_reviews.review_title: Great customer service & wide range of capabilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The thing we love the most is Insider's account management. We work with different vendors but Insider has the best team and the best expertise. It is also great that Insider has a lot of different features and mechanics  which help to retain customers across the entire funnel. One more thing which really matters is that we don't have to involve our IT department when we need to urgently launch a new campaign.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We like almost everything and we are more than satisfied with Insider, but it would be awesome if the price was a little lower. So, we have no complaints about the rest of the issues.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
My main advice would be to discuss in detail everything you want to receive from Insider beforehand, because due to the large number of products it is very easy to get confused and to start not from the relevant one. Discuss everything with Insider digital consultants, they will definitely help you.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We started working with Insider long ago mainly because of their mobile web capabilities. During this time we've launched a lot of different campaigns and used different products. I can highlite Insider's web push product. Very simple, but very profitable. With the help of Insider mechanic, we have collected a very huge base - more than 1 million subscribers, which is a very good indicator. We launch bulk pushes, automated pushes, segmented pushes, mainly geolocation ones, pushes in certain categories, for example, to users who viewed smartphones or users who were interested in a certain brand. It's great that there is such an opportunity - to tune in to certain brands and promote them, because now it's more important than ever - to hit the target audience so that our communications are as segmented as possible, as targeted as possible, especially so as not to overspam our users. Plus, due to this, we see a higher conversion rate. Now we are starting to work with the Architect product. This will help us to work with users in an even more personalized way.

all_reviews.review_title: All-in-one platform that offers great A/B testing and personalisation possibilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using Insider for about 6 months now and we have already launched several successful campaigns together. The price-saving campaign for our French speaking target audience, for example, has generated a high uplift of 67% in conversion rate on mobile.

One of the best things about Insider is that we are able to test a lot of different scenarios on our website before implementing new features permanently. The Insider team also suggests new testing ideas regularly, which has enabled us to launch functionalities that we wouldn't have come up with if we did not work together with Insider.

We also find it very useful to have many different templates to work with for personalizing our website. Working with the Insider platform is intuitive and, to a certain extent, we can create new scenarios all by ourselves.

Overall, Insider works well for our business and we are excited to keep using it in the future.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There was an issue with the executive summary dashboard and the results weren't quite
displayed properly. Luckily, Insider reacts quickly to issues like this in order to solve them asap.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you're someone who values the whole experience of working with an all-in-one platform, then Insider is definitely the best bet for you. Special shoutout to our Customer Success Manager Laurie as well, because she always offers great support and comes up with new A/B-testing ideas tailored to our business.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to elevate our user interface and experience through website personalization. For
this, we wanted to carry out A/B tests to observe and understand user interactions and make a
call on what we should go ahead with. While Insider has made all this possible, it has also
delivered a remarkable improvement in our conversions and when looking at the results in the Insider platform, we have gained good ROI from using Insider.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
It is great that Insider has a lot of functionality with a number of features. We decided to start working with Insider mainly because of their mobile app capabilities: in-app, app pushes and other technologies which can help us to build a better communication with our clients.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Since we work through the API, we are not able to get statistics on certain key metrics automatically, it is collected manually by our account manager. It would be better to look at the performance on the dashboards within the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider has a lot of products and technologies which can help you to grow your business, don't stop on using just one feature. Ask Insider business consultants to share with you all their capabilities. But don't expect to get the immediat results, everything good needs time.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's been almost a year since we started working with Insider. Our primary focus was the mobile application, as it is a channel where we have our most loyal customers. We have set the mobile app push through API, and we have integrated it with IOS. We are scaling the project to be able to trigger cart abandonment and page abandonment mechanics etc. In addition, we plan to expand our user database by launching in-app communications for users who have declined to sign up for push notification. In the future we want to use all Insider capabilities.

Both of these are such noticeably small additions to our digital marketing strategy, but have had a surprisingly amazing effect on our sales and conversions.

We have had an increased number of product page views, overall increase in traffic, and higher AOV. I could see that our customers had improved brand trust and on average, were buying more from us in one session than they were prior to implementing Insider.

My main goal when we signed up with Insider was to improve our website's conversions and engagement. all_reviews.review_title: Sophisticated multivariate testing for improved CX
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider allows us to carry out meticulous A/B testing on unlimited parameters, and we are amazed by its precision with each test. The algorithm is very efficient at picking the best, winning variation, and applying that everywhere, and this has resulted in improved AOV and an increased number of orders for us, apart from a big leap in our customer experience, as well. A very useful A/B testing feature that makes things a lot easier for our team is the dynamic traffic allocation, which we found to be not so common and not so reliable in other platforms.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing, we like every capability delivered with the A/B testing features offered by Insider. They're pretty incredible.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you're looking for A/B testing software that you can completely rely on for accurate results to take decisions based on, then look no further than Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Impressive improvement in customer satisfaction
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's app push feature and the impressive range of use-case scenarios is what we like the most. We have been able to drastically improve our app install rates and boost the engagement on our app. Most importantly - we've been able to improve our lead generation thanks to insider's predictive segmentation. With this we were able to accurate target our audience and get them to convert more effectively.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes it's difficult to visualize the campaigns on the mobile apps as different mobiles react differently. It would be nice to have more options available for these mobile app campaigns in terms of visual appeal.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Go for it. Insider is more than just a platform - think of it as a one-stop solution for all your requirement. We used the platform primarily for our mobile app marketing - so we recommend talking to a sales rep to identify your challenges and understand the right solutions you need to select from Insider. They're very helpful so you can reach out to them with confidence.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
When we started using Insider, the main challenges that we were faced with are: improving our app push rate, increase lead generation, increasing app install rates and improving our customer satisfaction ratio. We are happy to say that insider helped us accomplish all these and improve all the metrics. With highly individualized mobile app experiences, we were able to improve our customer satisfaction score in addition to increased lead generation and app install rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent tool for understanding customer behavior
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is super easy to use. The platform is intuitive and guides you through its features. I especially like how I don't have to rely on a team of developers to build segments or launch personalized customer journeys. Insider's customer support is unmatched. Not only do I get all my questions answered, I get unique insight into the fashion industry and deep expertise on what's resonating with customers in my vertical.
What's more, onboarding was a breeze. Our workflows weren't disrupted and because the platform is so easy-to-use, user adoption is at an all-time high.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I'd love to see even more in-depth reporting. Insider gives us a window into so much of customer behavior, I'd love even more ways to visualize and share that knowledge with other stakeholders in my company.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you're looking for a solution that can unify customer data and stitch it into actionable customer profiles, you can't go wrong. Insider gives you so many easy-to-use tools that help you build the cross-channel experiences today's customers expect. What's more, it's a self-guided tool supported by a world-class team that's committed to our success. I love the transparency and the way our support team communicates next steps and recommendations. As a result, we've grown substantially since the beginning of our partnership and have received positive feedback from our customers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our primary goal was to increase conversions and gain deeper insight into who customers are and what matters to them. With Insider's customer feedback collection tools and journey orchestration capabilities, we've not only been able to better understand our customers as individuals, but tailor our offerings in ways that matter to them. Beyond higher conversions, we've created more meaningful connections with our customers, which translates into higher customer satisfaction and lifetime value.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Being able to convert our website visitors into leads was something we've always struggled with. Insider gave us a strategic tool with which we could personally engage each visitor and improve our chances of converting visitors into leads. And we were surprised. What we really like about Insider is the gamified templates that improve the overall engagement on the site and their unified customer data which helped us capture every details about our customers and their journey

You won't need everything that the platform has, so It's important to nail down the specific tools that you will need, in order to get started. We recommend Insider to all those who are looking to improve the engagement on the website and target customers more accurately.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?

Once we started using Insider we saw a significant improvement in the onsite engagement which also meant that our lead generation improved. Insider's data-driven conversional abilities means that we were able to effectively target and engage our audiences individually and get them to convert more effectively And their unified customer data platform allowed us to get a 360 view of our customer segments. We're sure that going forward we can engage our customers more accurately.

all_reviews.review_content:

With app marketing, businesses tread a fine line between being on point and being overboard. Insider helps us always be on point with its highly integrated mobile app suite. It consists of incredible data reporting that allows us to continually improve and sharpen our messaging to suit the needs and preferences of our esteemed clientele, while also allowing us to experiment with interesting features that enhance the experience on our app. Insider's overlays are very adept at and succinct for conveying limited-time offers, special services, and more. all_reviews.review_title: Best-in-class cross-channel marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has all the makings to stitch together scattered anonymous and known data into actionable customer data profiles. The platform's Canvas streamlines personalized customer journey creation and delivery thanks to its easy-to-use drag and drop editor. I like how Architect Insider's journey-building tool gives you the next best channel recommendations and insight into what's performing. I'm also a big fan of InStory, thumbnails that expand to fullscreen stories. We feature products, hashtags, bestsellers, and more in these social media style stories. InStory has significantly increased our mobile engagement rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The support has been fantastic. I'd love to see even more use cases for my industry.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider has a variety of features to help you deliver the unified experiences your customers want. My best advice is to have a clear goal when you start. What is it that you want to achieve? By when? Insider's incredible support team will help you roadmap your way there.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're modernizing our customer experience. We're using Insider's best-in-class customer data platform and action layer to craft personalized experiences that reach customers where they want our brand to be. The other big thing we're solving for is scale. Before Insider, launching a personalized campaign was time-consuming and involved multiple stakeholders. With the platform, we've significantly streamlined the process.

all_reviews.review_title: Smooth, intuitive product discovery made possible by Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
When you sell a large number of products serving different functions, it's no small task to enable easy product discovery for your customers. With Insider's Smart Recommender, we have been able to understand individual shoppers, what they're looking for, what their preferences are, and other basic data about them as well and then serve them recommendations most suited to what they're likely to look for. This has proven to be very successful for us as it eliminates unnecessary steps from our customers' journeys, saving them a lot of time and helping them focus more on adding the right products to their carts.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It's been quite straightforward and pleasant, the whole experience with Insider so far. Nothing to dislike here.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is a capable platform that can do wonders. Go for it without a second thought.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to facilitate better product discovery. Smart Recommender has enabled us to do just that in the easiest way we could imagine. It does all the data sifting and analysing for us, and goes on to display most relevant products, and this is something that is constantly improving and being worked on, so it only keeps getting better. We have had higher conversion rates on our website since we started using Insider.

Web Push also deserves special mention because it was very successful in bringing us a large amount of traffic that we were then able to captivate and convert using the other products of Insider's that we use. Neither did we have the technological support and bandwidth internally to carry it out on our own. Insider has been a blessing with its ease of use and amazing ROI. all_reviews.review_title: A great GMP allowing omnichannel customer journeys
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
After trying out Insider during the POC, we were impressed by the wide-ranging capabilities it had, so we decided to go ahead and use all their offerings. Architect is one of them, which allows us to build customer journeys across multiple channels which we manage through Insider. This tool has been a milestone for us in improving our customer experience. We can activate our users from various segments without disturbing them by way of Architect.
By using Insider for all our channels, we now have unified profiles for our customers, and we have a detailed view of them, their preferences, behavior, and more. This has enabled a better understanding of our customers, and we have been able to improve our communication, content, and services based on the insights we have gained from Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It's taken us a little while to understand how each of them works. Sometimes template building widgets like email templates, on-site or in-app scenarios get stuck on.
Personalization in-app is harder than web because of the different natures of these environments, so Insider app personalization features are less successful than the web. It is understandable but possible users need to be aware of it.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have customers spread across various channels who interact and engage with us in different ways. We sought a solution that will help us bring it all under one umbrella, giving us a detailed view of our user data while also enabling us to build impactful journeys for them and improve the experience they have with us. Insider has been very adept at making this possible. They have an engaged, active support team that is always available to help us use the platform to its full potential, and we're happy with the whole experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Enhanced customer communication using Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have signed up for Insider's Web Push, which has been a very stable, extremely reliable product to send our users notifications on the go. Using this, we have been able to largely improve the communication with our customers, by sharing interesting things they'd like to click and read more about, or offers that they'd want to check out. Web Push makes it very easy to send push notifications by giving us the ability to schedule and automate them, and send them based on different customer segments, as well.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The push notifications don't come with too many customization options. For instance, there are not many different ways in which we can choose the placement of an image. Would like to see improvements in this.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
There are many web push solutions available, but from our experience, nobody else creates an experience quite like Insider. The tool is very easy to use and requires minimal technical knowledge, and can be of great benefit to businesses of all kinds and sizes.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We want to be in constant touch with our customers without making them weary of it. Push notifications seemed like a great alternative to sending lengthy emails that people don't even read fully. Using these crisp pieces of content/messaging, we have been able to improve our communication with our customers and convey our messages without bothering them too much.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: We have signed up for Insider's Web Push, which has been a very stable, extremely reliable product to send our users notifications on the go. Using this, we have been able to largely improve the communication with our customers, by sharing interesting things they'd like to click and read more about, or offers that they'd want to check out. Web Push makes it very easy to send push notifications by giving us the ability to schedule and automate them, and send them based on different customer segments, as well.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: The push notifications don't come with too many customization options. For instance, there are not many different ways in which we can choose the placement of an image. Would like to see improvements in this.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Insider:
review_question_answers.answer: There are many web push solutions available, but from our experience, nobody else creates an experience quite like Insider. The tool is very easy to use and requires minimal technical knowledge, and can be of great benefit to businesses of all kinds and sizes.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We want to be in constant touch with our customers without making them weary of it. Push notifications seemed like a great alternative to sending lengthy emails that people don't even read fully. Using these crisp pieces of content/messaging, we have been able to improve our communication with our customers and convey our messages without bothering them too much.

all_reviews.review_title: A brilliant platform supported by the best account management team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been using Insider's Conversion Suite for a while now. The deep segmentation it allows for is extremely effective in improving conversions. The predictions are precise, and we are able to configure a variety of events to design our customers' journeys, in almost no time. The tool is efficient, fast, and highly dependable for achieving a large number of conversions. For a brand like ours with a huge number and variety of products, this has been the most ideal tool to use.

What makes it even better is the excellent support from the team at Insider. Communication is clear and prompt, they are always available to help us when needed, and they constantly come up with innovative ideas aligned with our marketing strategy to help us make the most of the tool.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The reporting panel can be made more user-friendly, with more details available, too.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Although there might be many similar platforms, we think that Insider is the best out there, thanks to the excellent results we've achieved. The product also comes with an amazing support team, which adds a great deal of value to the whole experience.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have had a good amount of traffic but conversions were not proportionate to that. We needed to understand what was going wrong and how we could improve our customer experience to fuel conversions. Insider's team analyzed our website, and using the Conversion Suite, we started to see a significant uplift in conversions.

all_reviews.review_title: Great marketing tool for the travel industry
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
It's hard to choose just one thing. We like everything that increases conversion rates and drives sales.
And Insider does it. We can highlight their excellent account management team.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There is nothing we dislike at this moment. Let's see what happens next.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
I would recommend trying Insider. Even if you don't understand how to get started, rely on the expertise of Insider's growth consultants and account managers. They will choose the best possible way to grow your business.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a technology that can optimize our main metrics for quite a long time. It is much more complicated when talking about the travel industry. We wanted to optimize the engagement at each stage of the funnel. Of course, our primary goal was to increase conversion rates and drive revenue.
That's why we chose Insider. With its wide range of products and features, we can communicate with our users more efficiently and entertainingly. For example, the Instory product is irreplaceable when you want to attract user's attention to your last-minute offers, travel diaries, and special promotions. It helped us to increase CTR vastly. We also use their push notifications and social proof technology which enabled us to boost conversion rates. And, of course, Insider's segmentation. We don't use complex segments, but even basic ones show good results.

all_reviews.review_content:

Insider allows us to personalize the shopping experience to the T and using the A/B testing feature to test out variations on different campaigns has proven to be very effective for us. We have achieved significant uplift in incremental revenue, and a remarkable 36.39% increase in AOV. One specific product, InStory, has also contributed to a positive improvement in engagement. We are also quite impressed by the insights we have been able to amass from the product.

As a team and product, Insider's speed of execution has been really impressive, as well. Our overall experience is definitely one that has been pleasant and desirable.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We need a lot more time for certain things such as finalizing campaigns, but that's because we are short on resources from our end. Insider, for the most part, hasn't given us anything to dislike.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to use data gathered from our website to understand what drives our users to make purchases, and then use that information to improve conversion rates. We were able to do this very well using Insider's select range of products recommended for our business. We have also been able to improve our brand value by communicating our brand's story in more impactful ways than we used to before.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider has helped us build trust and grow our business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
There are all kinds of customers with a variety of different requirements when they're buying a car, especially a second hand one. And it also requires a lot of trust and confidence in the dealer one buys from. Insider's conversion suite has enabled us to build dependable relationships with our customers by making sure we display unique content and take them on their own journeys to different goals when they're on our website. By providing a personalized experience, Insider has helped us build trust with our customers, leading to more form fill ups, larger lead collection, and ultimately, purchases.

What do you dislike about Insider?
While we love the product for all its abilities right now, we would also like to see more use cases and ways to make the most of the conversion suite.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider provides amazing tools and technology to help our business achieve its full potential through sensitive, personalized experiences that customers seek today. It has been a great marketing choice for us, and based on all the good things we've heard about Insider from our marketing friends elsewhere, we believe this is a great choice for almost all kinds of digital businesses.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main goal was to increase lead generation. As an added benefit of deploying Insider and providing delightful personalized experiences through the conversion suite, we have also been able to improve customer engagement and their overall experience with us. Lead generation has also picked up very well and we are happy with the sustained amount of leads we are able to collect with Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's segmentation makes personalization easier than ever
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We love how Insider's Instory helped us categorize our large variety of products based on customer profiles. For example, we created categories for the elderly, pregnancy, kids, office workers & more. Our customers can click on their persona, and view the most relevant products using Instory. This has removed friction by helping us lower the customer's product discovery time significantly. We've also seen 4x conversion with customers who've interacted with Instory.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are enjoying Insider's powerful platform with over 100+ templates and 20+ algorithms so far. However,  sometimes the panel gets slower when we edit bigger or more complicated campaigns. Hoping this can be improved in the near future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are one of the biggest online pharmacies in Taiwan with over 1000+ different products. It is very important for us to provide necessary product information to customers when they come to our website. With Insider's comprehensive products, we are able to segment them clearly and have a personalized user experience tailored for them. Since Insider's implementation, we have seen an increase in AOV and conversion in the overall performance by using Insider's smart recommendations.

all_reviews.review_content:

Insider's push messaging and gamification set the platform wide apart from others in their range. These two features have performed phenomenally for us, with gamified experiences leading to a 20% uplift in AOV, and app push messaging delivering a stunning 30x ROI that took us by surprise. all_reviews.review_title: Everything you need for building a great communication with your users across all channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is the tool we use every day, and it is difficult to imagine a campaign we launch without Insider. We like almost everything: the platform itself, their account management team, and especially personalization and mobile app products.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It takes longer to launch customized campaigns compared to ordinary ones, but we are still glad that we can use customization. We want to have more gamification scenarios and more templates in the mobile app. And we want to get more details on reporting.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
With this platform, you can communicate with your user in a channel this user prefers most, so test different Insider's products to find the ones you need. And it is essential to work closely with Insider's consultants not to miss all the product opportunities.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
I guess we've already gone through everything together with Insider during the last five years. We wanted to unify our customer data and build communication across all channels. We wanted to create accurate segments and personalize our website and mobile app according to our customers' needs. With Insider, we were able to do that. We went deep into Insider's product and found many functions that are not visible at a glance. For example, Mobile App API push. Concerning our mobile app, the integration took two weeks to a month, and it was required only once. Since that moment, we have launched an average of 100 campaigns per year in Sportmaster's mobile app. With Insider, we have an excellent opportunity to test all the campaigns and elements even in our mobile app, which is our primary communication channel. We can use gamification and mobile app templates, which no one else has.

Before Insider, we were showing our customers best-selling products and trending ones, and while they were added to carts, they barely reached the product checkout page. After deploying Insider, we realized the true power of personalization. With SR & InStory, we were able to recommend products to our users which were highly relevant to them, personalized to them. all_reviews.review_title: 8.7x ROI with Insider's multi-channel marketing hub in just one quarter
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has consistently helped us achieve our growth targets. We started using their mobile capabilities, and were impressed by how much we were able to connect with our customers through non-traditional channels. Since then, we have decided to invest in InStory, as well, a social-media-inspired feature that offers an interactive way of showcasing products to improve their discovery. This feature comes with 100+ different templates which our e-commerce team has a lot of fun using. This, too, has impressed the team very much, and we are now planning to implement their Smart Recommender and Architect, their customer journey builder, in the next quarter.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We want to be able to deliver more push notifications that are automated and segmented, which is why we are trying out Architect, the customer journey builder. Otherwise, in all honesty, we have not found anything to dislike about the product yet.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
The capabilities of the Insider platform are so broad it is worth regularly checking in to see new features and involve additional teams in your business to drive the most value from a partnership.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider's AI engine is brilliant, and we haven't seen notifications so well-timed and personalized for individual customers before. With Insider's help, we have improved our personalization experience exponentially, so much so that more and more recurring customers of ours have been converted to VIP customers, significantly increasing their LTV, which is why we are continuing to invest in more Insider features to add to our marketing toolkit. Their account management team is second to none! They offer strategic support and give us recommendations that are impactful. We have already improved our revenue and customer retention rates since using Web Push and InStory. Now, we are excited to see how much more growth and marketing success we can achieve after implementing more features.

all_reviews.review_title: Best CDP solution with all  communication channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We like Insider's flexibility (when we need some feature Insider doesn't have, they always find how to solve the issue with the help of their product managers).
We like their account management team and technical specialists who are always ready to help.
And, of course, a user-friendly panel.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes it takes too long to implement something just because they don't have that same feature we want. But we should admit that most of the time, Insider can find a solution. On the whole, there is almost nothing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
It would be best to use Insider to avoid many different vendors. Insider has almost all the capabilities that you need if you are facing the same issues as we did. But try to understand the integration process and the steps you need to take to make it smooth.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We started working with Insider one year ago. And from the very beginning, we are delighted with what we receive. We could unify online and offline data and segment customers offline (dealerships) and online. With Insider, we created cascading trigger communications across all channels; we started using personalization on our websites and mobile app, sending special offers to those user segments which are most likely to convert.
But still, we are just at the beginning of our journey.

all_reviews.review_title: We improved our ROI by 53X using Insider's cart recovery and product discovery tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
There are so many things we love about using Insider, so it's difficult to find the best thing. The support team at Insider is amazing - it feels like we are working with our own internal marketing team and not a customer support team from a different company. The account managers are experienced and bring great insights across products and marketing strategies in different regions. We are able to get clear insights from their reporting dashboard and understand our ROI from using Insider. The technology is very flexible and easy to use and meets all our requirements -- the implementation is fast, easy and campaign management is a breeze. When Insider commits to a timeline they stick to it and we have achieved the fastest ROI with Insider. Using their product discovery tool and cart abandonment recovery notifications we improved our ROI by 53X.

What do you dislike about Insider?
To date, I haven't found anything to dislike. There have been some hiccups and glitches, but they have been immediately resolved by the team at Insider, so we are very happy.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
During the initial phase of testing Insider we only had owned channels and it was difficult to segment our users and automate our marketing efforts - which is why we decided to try Insider. We wanted to focus on online channels and improve our customer experience to create the best possible personalization scenarios. We have a lot of traffic but because we are unable to segment our users, we were not able to identify them and convert them through individualized experiences. With both an online and offline mode of operation, we wanted our customers to experience the same kind of experience online as they would get from one of our offline retail store. Insider made all of this possible. We have improved our engagement rate, our sign-up rates are higher and new user acquisition has significantly increased. Like I said earlier - our ROI after using Insider is 53X.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helps us provide meaningful banking experiences
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Banking has always had different products for different categories of customers. But, Insider is the first solution that has allowed us to deliver a truly tailored experience across our digital channels that are in line with our products. Using Insider's AI-backed segmentation, we have been able to create entirely different pages, layouts, and choices for different segments of customers, and this has been hugely successful in improving our form fill-ups and subsequently, conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The product is just a little expensive, although very much worth the money.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to offer truly tailored experiences to both our existing and potential customers. With the segmentation capabilities provided by Insider, we have been able to achieve this faster than we imagined, and what's more, we are able to consistently improve this by testing out various elements and using the results from our tests to make changes.

all_reviews.review_title: Great recommendation strategy for user journey engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We really like the ease of integration of the tools and also their effectiveness. Other products we've used before were easy to set up at first, but ran into some problems in further stages. Insider's tools are easy to integrate and are easy to use in all pages, including 404, Search, Cart and more. In addition to the ease of use the products are very effective and provide a considerable increase in click rates, engagement and conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We would appreciate a local language panel. Also sometimes, the customized feature or template would take a while for Insider to respond. Other than that we are happy with Insdier's service and product provided.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We started using Insider's Smart Recommender to create more individual journeys for our customers and increase engagement. The tool provided tailored recommendations that attracted our customers, and we were able to see a 10% increase in conversion rates and 12% increase in website revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's smart recommendation allows us to see transparent and real-time results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We really enjoyed Insider's panel as it allowed us to see real time and transparent results for our business. We are able to A/B test and now truly understand the behaviour of our onsite customers and visitors, insights we did not previously have. For instance, we learned that most of our mobile users actually enjoy looking at product recommendations, and 20% of them would scroll through till the end of the page. We then modified the page to never ending product recommendations along with Insider's smart recommendation engine.  After testing this out, we are extremely happy with the result, that is, a 44% conversion rate uplift.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The Insider Taiwan team tries to provide A-class support as fast as they can, but the time difference from the overseas engineering team is a bit inconvenient.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We enjoy the flexibility that the Insider's smart recommendation engine has brought to our ecommerce platform. After 6 months of investment, we've been able to achieve more than we have in the past few years. With over 100 templates and playbooks they have already created on their platform, we are able to kick off a new campaign easily with 0 IT support. Insider allows us to move faster and achieve more!

all_reviews.review_title: Insiders push notification tools are seamless and easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
I mostly use the web and app push notification tools on Insider. Campaigns are easy to set up and monitor, reporting is also made simple with Insiders' statistics panel. Not only has this provided us with an additional communication channel, it has also allowed us to broaden our messaging to users on their smartphones by using app push notifications and other InApp pop-ups. Insiders' support channels are phenomenal and help is always available.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There is very little not to like, however if there was one thing I would change, it would be a slight tweak to the functionality of the app push set up. Once a campaign has been created, there is no way to edit a scheduled app push or view a completed app push without cloning the entire campaign. Editing is possible for web push notifications, so I would like to see this functionality introduced to app push notifications as well.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Not only has this provided us with an additional communication channel, it has also allowed us to broaden our messaging to users on their smartphones by using app push notifications and other InApp pop-ups.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insider has helped us improve customer engagement by sending communication to both potential and current customers. We are also able to ensure brand awareness is top of mind with recurring communication, we use push notifications for cart abandonment, as watchlist reminders and many other retention tactics ultimately resulting in more sales for our platform.

all_reviews.review_title: 44 X ROI driven by Insider's personalized web push and smart recommendations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider has over 10 algorithms that can be applied on different pages based on visitor's behavior. It helps us deliver personalized experience to our users from lead generation, new acquisitions to customer retention and drive repeat business.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We are absolutely in awe of Insider's technology and consultant service. However, a localized panel would be more friendly to our team.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were approached by Insider 3 years ago - when we realized we are not converting enough paid traffic, and they are getting more expensive. With Insider's technology, we are now able to engage with our visitors and customers onsite based on their different behavior. We can predict their next move and send them messages or coupons to make them stay a bit longer, or encourage them to make the first buy, or recommend them the most popular or most likely to purchase products. We see a significant uplift of conversion rate in terms of revenue or leads after one year. We look forward to growing our business stronger and bigger with Insider!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: Insider has over 10 algorithms that can be applied on different pages based on visitor's behavior. It helps us deliver personalized experience to our users from lead generation, new acquisitions to customer retention and drive repeat business.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insider?
review_question_answers.answer: We are absolutely in awe of Insider's technology and consultant service. However, a localized panel would be more friendly to our team.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We were approached by Insider 3 years ago - when we realized we are not converting enough paid traffic, and they are getting more expensive. With Insider's technology, we are now able to engage with our visitors and customers onsite based on their different behavior. We can predict their next move and send them messages or coupons to make them stay a bit longer, or encourage them to make the first buy, or recommend them the most popular or most likely to purchase products. We see a significant uplift of conversion rate in terms of revenue or leads after one year. We look forward to growing our business stronger and bigger with Insider!

all_reviews.review_title: Finally, a CDP and marketing software that really works!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's products are packed full with many powerful, highly capable features that allow us to operate and execute campaigns at high speed, with agility and great flexibility. With the help of Insider's team, we were able to implement marketing personalization very easily and smoothly. In one campaign with the Web Suite, for example, we displayed personalized welcome pop-ups for our customers and saw a click rate of 37.9% and a download rate of 26.5% on the coupon. This was very effective in driving conversions.

Insider's Predictive Audience is another potent product that enables us to build high precision, targeted strategies by intelligently segmenting the users. We love being able to do this. Insider has truly levelled up our marketing strategy.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Using the dashboard was a little inconvenient for us when reviewing the campaign and analyzing the results.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Better product recommendations, improved personalization on our website are the areas we wanted Insider's help with. The team helped us pick the right set of products best suited for our requirements and we have been successfully able to achieve the results we expected.

We don't have much to dislike. The price could be a little lower, but on the whole, we like almost everything.

We recommend driving innovations in your company and starting using Insider earlier. And it is better working when you use multiple products in different channels.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The overall experience is excellent at the moment. Insider helps us to work with user's reviews - to highlight ratings and relevant comments. We are trying to make the most out of the capabilities of the Mobile web suite and effectively test UX hypotheses (this is especially important because there are more and more customers who use the phone when searching for a tour). We launch many different campaigns every month, such as Tab Talk, Versus, etc., and we are happy with the result. We are satisfied with the Instory and web push products.

all_reviews.review_title: A partner in crime you need!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The support and framework around planning, execution and optimizing from the Insider team are truly great. One of the best partners I've worked with to date. The platform offers so much opportunity to test and learn things, without needing to invest heavily into building features/investing into things you're not sure about. Using Google Analytics data to measure success is also really beneficial for reporting.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing really - everything has been positive with Insider. My only feedback would be as a retailer to ensure you have a resource to dedicate time/work to Insider - not only with providing/updating content but also testing, reviewing, and checking the reporting on campaigns. It's important to measure work vs reward. I don't think this is a platform you can set and forget campaigns.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're focussing on our abandon cart, personalized product recommendations and testing features on our site that don't exist. We're also using Insider to showcase more content where we are limited on-site. We A/B testing different campaigns to help provide guidance and data on what features we should get developed if we can. It has allowed us to identify key things to increase conversion rate and elevate our customer's experiences.

all_reviews.review_title: Recommending houses and apartments smarter led to 11.6% CRU
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As the leading realty agent in the country, we are proud to have over 132K listings on our site. Insider's smart recommendation engine is able to deliver most relevant housing information to our visitors based on the predicted behaviour. This completely changed the game for us. By delivering the most relevant listing to our visitors, shortened the product discovery process and successfully made our visitor stay longer and look at more options. After one year of cooperation, we have an 77.5% uplift in page views and 87.5% uplift in visit duration.

What do you dislike about Insider?
A localized panel would be really helpful.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending the most attractive information to the right person is the key to online businesses. After testing out Insider's segmentation, we were amazed by the result. They are staying longer on our site, looking at more listings and viewing more housing. We are also getting more house inspection bookings coming from our site - a CRU of 11.6% after one year of investment couldn't make us happier. We are looking forward to building our next journey with Insider!

all_reviews.review_title: Product recommendations so on point - our CR shot up to 511%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is incredibly powerful, with comparisons clearly showing its effectiveness and impact. On our email campaigns, we received a 560% increase in CR compared to other ad channels like FB & IG. The users who visited our website from these campaigns also showed a decrease of 86% in bounce rates. We had deployed their Smart Recommender, as well, and the personalized product recommendations displayed by it were admirably successful in improving our CR by a huge 511%. In a separate campaign to encourage product reviews, we achieved a 229.65% uplift in click rate. On the whole, all our activities with Insider resulted in a 274% increase in CR compared to our activities without it. These results are nothing but astonishing, and give us enough reason to continue using Insider.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It would be very convenient to have one panel where we can see and track activities across all our channels. This is not a feature, at present, but we hope it can be made possible at some point in the future.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you're a website selling more than just one product, then Insider is the best marketing assistant you could have. By automating plenty of mundane tasks, it helps you focus on other things that need your full attention. It comes with a very wide range of features that work wonders, and we'd suggest trying them all out to see what fits your bill, because we believe that Insider has something incredible to offer everyone.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Skincare is a confusing area for a lot of customers and we were striving to send consistent messages which are valuable for them, but at the same time, encourage them to engage with the CTA and come back to our website for increased revenue and sales. And since we have a vast range of products, we also wanted to better our product recommendations. With Smart Recommender, the product discovery has been better than ever before, and we see many more products added to carts than earlier. Insider's Email tool is also very capable and has made a considerable impact on our customer retention. All their products have worked very well for us, and we'd possibly try out more in the future as the need arises.

all_reviews.review_title: Useful platform with great customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Thanks to Insider, we were able to design and implement multiple campaigns on our website without the reliance of other design and tech teams. This was incredibly useful as we were able to execute campaigns much faster and more seamlessly. A huge plus point was the flexibility to edit any parts of our campaigns anytime as well, without requesting for the support of other teams.

I appreciated the range of campaigns and templates available for our choosing. However, the primary feature I love about using Insider is the great customer support I've experienced so far. From answering small questions (like how to utilise some design features) to brainstorming for larger solutions - I could always count on Insider to be there for me.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The backend setup itself can be cumbersome and not the most intuitive. It can get frustrating when some things are supposed to be easy to find/do, but this also gave opportunities for their great customer support to shine through.

Alongside, setting up of campaigns must be done separately for both desktop and mobile - it doesn't apply automatically, nor does it sit within the same page. This is also time-consuming when we're viewing performance reports.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were not able to track any real engagement on our website, nor had the tools to actually drive engagement/interaction. Insider really helped us out in this aspect and we were able to get some traction in this aspect.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy-to-use features, high performing campaigns, astounding results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider offers the best email automation we've used, delivering very satisfying results. Even the simplest, automated welcome email with a basic discount code on it got a great number of clicks and traffic to our website that subsequently converted. Insider's Web Push was the first such tool that we used on our website. We are impressed by the seamless cross-channel interaction we've been able to create and sustain with web push & email, while also using their intelligent technology to understand our website visitors' onsite behaviors. Using the many customization options available, we are able to create automated customer journeys for each visitor, following them through their lifecycle. This enables us to improve our products and user experience, which positively impacts our customers' affinity towards us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's nothing that we dislike about the platform yet. In fact, we absolutely love Insider so much that we're always keen on trying out their new products and features. Often, we end up trying beta versions of their products which sometimes are not stable, but then, that's what beta versions are for, so we don't have any problems with it.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
When using Insider, there are very clear use cases that it performs amazingly well for. And it is not a small number, either. We love that there are endless scenarios that the platform is able to handle comfortably, and the team consistently keeps updating it to accommodate more use cases as and when they come up. The simplicity of the platform is something that works great for us. Their amazing customer support team deserves special mention, too, making the overall experience of using Insider one that is pleasant and fruitful.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were facing issues with our older email marketing software, where we didn't have enough customization and automation options. We also hadn't tried out push notifications and were curious about it. Insider's Email & Web Push tools have been great for our business. They're simple and easy to use, backed by a great support team that's always around to clarify doubts and resolve issues.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been able to consistently communicate with our new and returning users and keep them engaged with Insider's intelligent Web Push tools. The tool has been so good, in fact, that the average time a visitor spends on our website has increased by a whole minute! The automated push tool has also proven to be extremely effective in gently nudging potential customers to revisit our website. We are able to be on the minds of our customers regularly by sending well-timed, tailored messages which have received an average CTR of 5% - 10%. This is easily one of the best Web Push tools available in the market.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have a little difficulty with geo segmentation, but believe it is something that can be easily fixed with an update.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Collecting customer data is important for us so that we can retarget them consistently with updates and other relevant messages that they'd find useful. Insider's Web Push tools have gotten us a 20% opt-in rate annually, which is brilliant. This is our only messaging channel achieving such a high opt-in rate, and we were very impressed when we started seeing these results. We also use Insider's survey function and it has been instrumental in helping us improve our user experience by leaps and bounds.
