all_reviews.review_title: One platform for A/B testing, web & mobile push, email and onsite personalization with great results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's web push and personalization features have been greatly appreciated by our organization - during the fourth quarter, Insider's web push campaigns accounted for +1500% ROI. Web push ranks 7th out of 1000+ revenue sources. It was an easy process to implement and use, and we were very satisfied with the overall results. We are amazed at how complex campaigns and scenarios can be executed in an effortless and straightforward manner.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've observed that flight search abandonment emails sometimes take a while to launch, mostly when lots of integrations are involved. Insider should resolve these delays in the future.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
There are several products and features that Insider offers for addressing different kinds of growth. It would help if you first spoke to their growth consultants to get an idea of what products you need to tackle your specific challenges.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The goal from day one has been to decrease the number of drop-offs and reduce search abandonments. We implemented Insider's push campaigns for search abandonment and saw a reduction in the drop-off rates almost immediately. Out of 300 web push campaigns, this campaign contributed 15% to our total push revenue. To combat booking abandonment and improve engagement and conversion rates, we're exploring more features like Facebook Messenger integration.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider is a great tool for segmenting and targeting the right users to improve customer engagement!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The platform is user-friendly and very easy to use. We are able to set up and go live with our own campaign in just a matter of minutes. The A/B testing feature is another brilliant tool from Insider that we love - we are able to test different copies of our app push notifications to see what works best in terms of language and tone of content, the insights from the panel are very helpful. Add to this Insider's geo fencing ability and that means we are able to target users at the right time and place also. The mobile app push notifications can be created in less than a minute given their ready-to-use templates and executing the campaign is fairly simple, allowing us to go live faster.

What do you dislike about Insider?
For some of our more complicated campaigns and flows, it would be nice to see a visual representation of what we are creating, however, Insider says that they have a different tool - Architect which can help us visualize complex journeys..

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our business goal when we started using Insider and before was to improve the engagement and retention on our mobile app. We wanted to target users and bring them back - the ride-booking space is a competitive one and we want to engage users at the right time in order to stay ahead. Insider's segmentation feature has enabled us to easily create accurate user segments and target these users at the right time with push notifications to convert them. Insider's quick and efficient real-time segmentation features come in handy when users open our app but do not book a ride in the next 5 minutes, normally because they are comparing prices against competitor apps. In such cases we are able to send a push notification immediately with a discount code to encourage these users to convert. And we're elated with the conversion rates we've achieved overall.

What impresses us at Insider is the flexibility of the solutions they propose. If it happens that we cannot implement the scenario according to our idea our Strategic Account Manager and Operational Account Manager will always advise what can be done differently.
The entire team is up to the task so that the scenarios meet ours assumptions and KPIs. They always provide advice and ideas on how to change a scenario to make it perform even better.
Insider has saved the day many times when changes have to be made "right now" on the website.

Some time ago we had communication problems. The previous Operational Account Manager didn't fully understand our needs. The problem was solved very quickly and the cooperation is going very well at the moment.

A transparent panel and monthly reporting meetings allow us to follow the results on an ongoing basis and make further decisions regarding the implementation of functionalities natively.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us become a customer-first company by streamlining our engagement strategy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are big admirers of the user-friendly design and easy-to-use dashboard of Insider's platform. Insider brings some of the best tools in the market to engage customers across channels and deliver individualized experiences not just on various channels. Our growth consultants at Insider recommended using Architect - it's their customer journey orchestration tool which helps us build flawless journeys across multiple channels like web, mobile web, email, and apps. As a result we were able to streamline our communication flow and observed better engagement and conversion rates on our campaigns. Insider is not only efficient but also user-friendly!

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've noticed that the HTML editor for email and architect is different on Insider, it would be nice if they were the same, because we can't use the template we created for one, on the other.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Don't think twice, go for Insider. Have a call with their sales - who'll walk you through the platform and all the products that you'll need for your particular challenges. If you do not know what your challenges are, Insider's growth consultants will help you identify pain points and areas for improvement.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our challenge was to automate our communication flow with our customers and we wanted a solution that would help us engage with our customers in a more personalized manner. There were two priorities that we were focused on - to create unique customer journeys for each customer, and to communicate with customers and leads about offers and news. With Insider we found the answer to both these challenges - Architect for unique journey orchestration and email newsletter feature to keep our customers in the loop. Both these features have seen immense results on the campaigns including improved sales and more conversions than before. Because of Insider, we've been able to streamline our communication flow with our customers and make it more efficient and customer-friendly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The flexibility and freedom Insider's panel offers is something we really like. It comes loaded with a lot of ready-to-use templates and scenarios that we can use in our campaigns right away, making it easier to deliver faster. The support we get from the team at Insider is brilliant and their responsiveness is admirable. The mobile app and web push features have helped us considerably improve the user engagement on our products using famified templates such as scratch-to-win coupons. We have even witnessed a conversion rate of 10K in just one day for a particular campaign.

all_reviews.review_title: 20x ROI with Insider's powerful suite of tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's segmentation capabilities are amazing, enabling a 19.76% CR uplift. This resulted from displaying highly relevant content and messages using the Web Suite & Web Push, based on the segments that we were able to create. Using an Architect, we could design the customer journey intuitively to flow smoothly from one touchpoint to another. Naturally, this led to an increase in our subscriber rate, as well, of 9.39%. We have also implemented the Smart Recommender on all website pages, actively recommending the most relevant products to our visitors. This mix of Insider's tools has given us a massive 20x ROI while also bringing in a steady flow of traffic that keeps converting into paying customers much more efficiently than before.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We sometimes don't find templates that are a 100% match for our requirements. But, the team at Insider helps customize templates for us in such cases, so it makes up for what we miss.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you're looking to improve the personalization experience of your website, look no further than Insider. This is a highly proficient platform that will blow your mind with its intelligent capabilities. We had high expectations when we signed up, and Insider has surpassed them and delivered results quicker than we thought we'd see. With a quick support team to resolve issues and help you navigate through the platform, you'll have a satisfying experience that leaves no space for complaints.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having a large amount of website traffic is excellent, but it is a problem if the traffic doesn't convert and isn't of relevant quality for the business. This is precisely what we needed to address. We also needed a capable technology solution that can execute personalization campaigns, carry out intelligent user segmentation & improve the product discovery experience on our website. Insider was the one answer to all of these problems we sought to resolve. Since its integration, we have had 30+ campaigns every month that is always running on our website and has made significant returns.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider's Smart Recommendations are the best, they lifted our CR up by 31.04%!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The Smart Recommender by Insider single-handedly drove a whopping 31.04% uplift in our conversion rates on our mobile product pages, with a 17.04% increase in Average Order Value. On our website, we were able to deploy 30 different personalization campaigns in a span of only two months. These helped increase our website conversion rates by 7.14%, which is no small number either. And all these wonderful results? They were made really easy to understand with the help of their user-friendly data dashboard. We were then able to learn from the data and optimize our campaigns further to improve them. The stunning technology is backed by a prompt and highly responsive support team, as well, which makes the entire Insider experience a wholesome one.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We would love to have support for our local language on the interface, which is presently not available.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Earlier, we had to manually pick products to show up on the product recommendation page, and we needed a lot of support from the IT team for even a small change. With Insider, we have been able to create and put out campaigns so fast that we now have a lot of time on our hands to focus on our core business processes. The AI algorithm is smart enough to exclude products that are out of stock from the recommendations, as well, which is the kind of intuitive technology that we were looking for to help us scale our revenues and growth.

all_reviews.review_title: One platform for A/B testing, web push, email and onsite personalization with great results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have fallen in love with Insider's web push and personalization features - during Q4 Insider helped us achieve +1500% ROI from web push campaigns and web push ranks as our 7th biggest revenue source out of 1000+ sources. We're very happy with the overall results we are able to achieve and the ease of implementation and usage. It's surprising how many complex scenarios and campaigns can be executed in such a simple and effortless manner.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've noticed that sometimes, flight search abandonment emails can take some time to launch, this mostly happens when there are a lot of advanced integrations in the back. We hope Insider will resolve these delays in the future.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
From the very beginning our goal was to reduce the no. of drop offs and reduce the search abandonments onsite. We launched the search-abandonment push campaigns from Insider and our drop off rates reduced immediately.
This one campaign also contributed to 15% of our total push revenue out of 300 other web push campaigns. We're now looking to explore more features like Facebook Messenger integration to tackle booking abandonment and improve engagement and conversion rates.

website/app, improving our click through and conversion rates through personalized
experiences tailored to each unique customer.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What I like most about working with Insider is their user-friendly panel. With correct integration, you can easily track the results of all campaigns without checking Google Analytics. Also, you can always rely on Insider's account management team - very supportive and responsive.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Overall, everything is good. The only thing I can mention here is timing. Sometimes you need to wait for quite a long time to get your customized campaign done.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you plan to implement any customization, it would be better if you think over the details beforehand and transfer your straightforward task to the Insider to implement it faster. The product itself is excellent and worse using.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Considering the specificity of the industry we work in, our primary goal is to build smooth communication with our users. With Insider's personalization product, we were able to modify our website without involving our IT department. For example, It took us less than one day to launch a campaign to notify our clients concerning possible delays in getting their tests' results. We saw the result immediately -  the number of dissatisfied calls to the call center has decreased drastically.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us deliver Hyper-personalized experiences for high conversion rates!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With Insider, we have been able to create hyper-personalized campaigns that have been extremely successful for us. Creating personalization campaigns has been a top priority for us, and Insider has been our go-to partner for executing them. We appreciate how easy the platform is to use, yet it packs a variety of powerful features that add significant value to our marketing data. We have also significantly improved our retargeting capabilities, achieving a conversion rate increase of 9.7% in one campaign and a massive 20% increase in another! In addition, the platform provides us with a great deal of flexibility when it comes to customizing our campaigns. We can segment our website visitors intelligently and tailor our campaigns to correspond to each section of our customer base, yielding notable results for us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The only issue we have faced with Insider is the inability to support Quiet Hours in the Web Push tool. Except for that, Insider has been a splendid platform to use.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Personalization is where the power lies! Our business has been able to unlock new levels of marketing success & customer satisfaction, while constantly improving our strategy based on intelligent insights derived from accurate data. Insider is a powerhouse that has propelled our business forward, and we have great confidence that it can do the same to any other business aiming to leverage the power of predictive tech and data to achieve success.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
In order to maintain our position as a brand that represents luxury, we need to attract affluent customers from across the country, so we must build strong relationships with all of our website visitors. As a result of Insider's hyper-personalization based on AI, we have been able to deliver customized messages to our customers at the right time, resulting in better customer experience and satisfaction. We've been able to build a more nuanced personalization strategy thanks to Insider's advanced integration feature!

all_reviews.review_title: Senior Growth Marketing Manager - Martech & LeadGen
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What really stands out about Insider is the ease of setting up campaigns and experimenting without having to depend on developers (frees up a lot of developer time so they can work on higher priority tasks). Insider's account managers are very supportive and provide remarkable insights on how we can run effective campaigns and also provide consultative strategies on how we can use the platform effectively. We also love the A/B testing feature of Insider which has helped us test a lot of content variations and also understand which works better, and we've been able to achieve great optimization on our site this way.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We have seen remarkable improvements and optimized our key metrics with Insider's products, so there's nothing major that we dislike. However, there are some technical aspects which require IT assistance but our account managers at Insider are always there to help us sort these out.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Very handy tool for companies who want to personalise their user journey and optimise their website without having to depend on technical teams. Strategic account manager from Insider team, works as a consultant for your company guiding you to solve your business problems using Insider.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for ways to personalize and optimize the onsite experience for our users and also conduct A/B testing of our campaigns to understand the content that works best. Being a brand in the hospitality industry, one of our main KPIs was to improve the number of people who would request to view our available rooms to rent, we call this lead submission. Using some highly engaging and interactive tools from Insider on our website, like hello bars, popups and personalized content blocks, we were able to optimize the onsite engagement and get more lead submissions. We're seeing a growth in number of leads generated month on month, this tool is very promising.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As long as you are familiar with GA, Google Ads or Facebook Ads, Insider's platform is quite easy to use. Before using Insider, it takes much time and energy to work with engineers to implement any kind of personalization or A/B testing. For now, we can easily start a A/B testing campaign in 10 mins via Insider's platform, which saves a lot of effort.

What do you dislike about Insider?
In the beginning, the required java script code by Insider affected our web performance and caused a poor Page Speed Insight score. However, it gets much better after Insider launch the new API last year.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
When web push becomes a valuable marketing channel, we start to seek for an all-round solution for our website. Insider's web push service could well-integrate with our GA data and users' onsite behavior and result in a highly personalized marketing message. Overall, we gain 5-6% more revenue monthly from our web push messages.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us scale up quickly with the fastest time-to--market compared to others
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The ready to use templates from Insider helped us achieve efficiency with our online campaigns and the level of customization that is possible with these templates means that we are able to deliver personalization like never before. The campaign interface and insights that we get from Insider is something that other vendors don't have. In 2020 we were able to win over 57,800 web push subscribers and our web push campaigns alone generated over TWD$154,500. Insider's web push also enabled us to make the most of seasonal spikes like New Year's shopping, by using surprise coupons in these web pushes we generated over 280 orders worth USD130,000. The web suite from Insider has helped us effectively shorten the product discovery time for our customers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Because Insider has a ton of products and functions, it is not easy to identify the performance of each on the dashboard. Also the lack of local language interface makes it difficult to understand and we have to rely on our account managers to explain the data to us. However, Insider's local expertise is top-notch and we are regularly updated on our campaign performance and ROI metrics, so again, it's hard to say we dislike something.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our regional team was low on manpower which meant we could not deliver campaigns at scale. We were looking for a platform that was low on IT efforts and which would enable us to deliver localized content and execute campaigns quickly. Another struggle we faced was the large list of products on our website which meant our website visitors had to make multiple search queries to find what they wanted - we wanted to shorten the product discovery process. After integrating with Insider we were able to leverage the web and mobile web suite to communicate with our online visitors more efficiently, the team at Insider took care of much of the IT heavy-lifting which meant we could focus on creating quality campaigns. We can now help users find what they are looking for faster and also improve the engagement onsite with customized web push campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: The best solution for quickly testing new ideas and a great platform for digital marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is a great tool covering all our business needs, from web customisation to personalization to pushes or search, we have them all in one place.  What I like most is the support that we get from their team, strategic or technical, they have our companies best interest in mind and they are: quickly replying to questions, ready to offer additional training, ready to offer insight on what scenarios are working for our industry and also ready to implement new features.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Since Insider is a 3rd party integration their customisations are not flawlessly integrating with our platform, slightly overlapping native content in some cases.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Insider to offer a better, more customized experience to our website visitors by providing better product recommendations. Adding an extra layer of communications and using the available tools to promote our current offers: banners, pop-ups, countdowns. And we also rely on Insider to deliver our Web Push campaigns.
We are saving time by quickly implementing personalisations and increasing conversion rates by offering a personalized experience and evidentiating our current promotions.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the most effective product recommendation tool with accurate user segmentations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The depth of segmentation possible with Insider is unlike any other platform that we have used before. It allows for creating highly targeted personalized campaigns that can be delivered with precision. It's also fairly easy to use and quick smooth to setup. With one platform, we can meet all our requirements instead of having to rely on multiple vendors. This also means that we are ableto consolidate all our data at one point instead of having disjointed and broken data across various platforms. We are using the website from Insider for both the desktop web and mobile web, and web push as a channel contributes to over 6% of our site traffic, and we love the bulk push feature as it's highly engageable.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The only drawback we see is that we can't view the pageviews uplift numbers on the dashboard.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Engagement:  Provides the ability to easily add CTAs without going through development team to get users to explore more content (Live TV button, Promo banners).

Customer journey: Establish users' loyalty through web pushes (users who opt in web pushes will keep coming back when receiving web pushes).  Insider is one of the top channels that has contributed to our monthly pageviews.

Conversion rates: It has increased our email subscriber base through email collection pop up that will appear when user attempts to leave the website. Increase rates for pages per session by having features enticing users to click more (ie: view following article popup, must-watch popup)

App users: Insider, however not integrated on app. Bringing loyal web users to install app by showing pop up based on user behaviour (if users' views more than 5 pages a day they will get a prompt)

Personalisation tools: Created user segments based on interest (politics, English) and push-related content through web pushes. Push content through web pushes or pop-ups based on user behaviour.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to increase our pageviews as this means more chances of conversion for us. We are using Insider to improve the pageview metrics and help our visitors to discover more categories once they arrive at our website. We rely on web push to engage and inform our users about the relevant types/categories/pages they may be interested in.

Insider's segmentation enables us to keep these web push notifications as relevant as possible to each users interests, and as a result, we have over 383,000 web push subscribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great experience with Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
One of the standout features from Insider is their ready-to-use templates that fit a wide range of use cases, these are pretty helpful when it comes to saving time and going live with campaigns in the absence of manpower. We use a combination of web push and web suite for desktop and mobile to drive our online sales and user experience optimization. We've seen a 44% uplift in conversion and achieved over 14% in lead submission rates using the gamified templates from Insider. The platform is also very easy to use and helps me meet our requirements and goals.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The only thing we can think of is the lack of integration between mobile web and desktop campaigns. It would be nice if we could use the same campaigns for both desktop and mobile web instead of having to create them separately.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been using Insider to help power our sales online and also to optimize the use experience onsite. We've been able to do this with the help of Insider's web suite products such as gamified templates and web push solutions that focus on bringing users back to complete the purchase. As an extension these gamified templates have also help us considerably improve our lead collection rate and we've achieved an 8X ROI from the engagement and improved BOFU metrics.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider is a great platform that can seamlessly be integrated with your business and provides ready-to-use personalization templates and products that can be deployed with a short amount of time and effort. Its complex product algorithms can best target and segment the various audience with the right messaging and content. In recent weeks we have been actively working on deploying the Smart Recommendation Engine across multiple touchpoints of the journey. The intelligent engine is robust and offers a wide variety of funtionality with the flexibility to personalized and segment based on data, products, or user behavior.

The web push is another rich feature that Insider has to offer both on the web and mobile. The capability to automate trigger pushes is something we have been utilizing and fine-tuning. We see some great results already. The ability to reach out and connect with a potential prospect at the right time and point in the journey is crucial for us.

The reporting dashboard and reports can be simplified

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving a common problem in our industry. Change takes time, effort and money. Through Insider we can deploy smart features quickly and shift the needle on some of our key metrics and goals

all_reviews.review_title: Creating unique experiences for first-time visitors is made easy with Insider's onsite optimization
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have seen a very supportive and hands-on approach to the table from Insider, they've taken extreme care in mapping their products to our unique challenges and thereby creating a custom solution architecture for us. Another great feature we like about Insider is their exit-intent overlay messages that are highly effective at engaging users who are about to leave the site with personalized content, helping us considerably increase our session durations and optimizing conversions.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Using the panel can be an intense learning process. But we don't want to term this as a negative.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
We're very satisfied with the experience so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We realized that a vital part of our goal was to focus on delivering the most relevant products to the right users when it counts. With Insider we've observed an immense improvement in many vital metrics, such as a healthy reduction in our cart abandonment rates, and browser abandonment rates while observing a promising uplift in conversions. Also, more than 60% of our traffic comes from new visitors, which made it imminent for us to focus on enhancing our new visitor experiences such as product discovery and re-engagement strategies which go beyond just traditional email marketing. Exit-intent was another feature that we've tried and liked. We've implemented 2 variations of this feature and our recovery rate has been 1.23% with a 101.59% uplift in conversion rates from these campaigns. We're also impressed by Insider's cart abandonment recovery features, which is part of their conversion suite. We've been able to reduce cart abandonment by as much as 8.4% while witnessing a conversion rate uplift of 181%.

With Insider we've observed an immense improvement in many vital metrics, such as a healthy reduction in our cart abandonment rates, and browser abandonment rates while observing a promising uplift in conversions. Also, more than 60% of our traffic comes from new visitors, which made it imminent for us to focus on enhancing our new visitor experiences such as product discovery and re-engagement strategies which go beyond just traditional email marketing. Exit-intent was another feature that we've tried and liked. We've implemented 2 variations of this feature and our recovery rate has been 1.23% with a 101.59% uplift in conversion rates from these campaigns. We're also impressed by Insider's cart abandonment recovery features, which is part of their conversion suite. We've been able to reduce cart abandonment by as much as 8.4% while witnessing a conversion rate uplift of 181%.

all_reviews.review_title: Building and delivering awesome online experiences
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Their recommendation engine tops the chart. It's easy to deliver excellent experiences to our website customers using this product and their AI-based segmentation features. One of the areas we wanted to focus on was to improve our key conversion metrics and revenue while optimizing the user experience. Insider's platform met our requirements, and we were able to start delivering personalized experiences immediately. Their platform is easy to use, and the integrations were also smooth and seamless. It's definitely a platform that helps boost the ROI from personalization campaigns!

What do you dislike about Insider?
Actually, there is nothing that we dislike, but there is always room for improvement.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
There are a lot of things that we love about Insider, but we think that testing the Smart Recommender product is a good option. It is the best recommendation engine on the market so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to build more personalized user experiences that would help us improve our conversion rate and revenue. Thanks to Insider's micro-segmentation features, we were able to personalize our recommendations and the engagement on our website according to each individual customer. This also improves product visibility and engagement on the product page as users were seeing more relevant recommendations. We started seeing the results in less than a quarter, our conversion rate and incremental revenues have increased significantly.

all_reviews.review_title: Chow Sang Sang - Most effective product recommendation tool with accurate user segmentation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We're a big fan of the flexibility and advanced scenarios that Insider's recommendation engine offers and all of these advanced features come with easy integration and smooth implementation, the panel is also easy to use and going live with campaigns was easy. The strategy and guidance from our account managers at Insider is another valuable thing we like, they provide us all the right information in implementing effective personalization scenarios.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Our crowd-sourced based product feed model is a tricky spot to operate in, and although Insider has enabled us to reduce a lot of cost and time in implementing personalization features on our product pages, it requires at least one user to visit the product page - and this is something we need to figure out.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were struggling with our recommendations strategy as the recommendation tool we were using before insider was less flexible and primitive with basic recommendation ability. With Insider's smart recommender, we were able to leverage AI-powered contextualized recommendations to improve engagement on our product pages. Not only that, we also generated a 10.5% uplift in conversion rates from the smart recommendations campaigns. We implemented the smart recommendations on our homepage and product page with a mix of popular items, most viewed products/categories, and top sellers - all of this was individualized to the customers' preference and intent which made them more effective. The best part is that all of this heavy lifting was done by Insider's recommendation engine. What we wanted was a solution with a strong performance that would help us improve our key metrics like conversions, CTR, AOV, and session duration and which provided high accuracy in user segmentation. We got all of this and much more with Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Target audiences more effectively with A/B testing, targeted web push and interactive templates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Setting up experiments on Insider's panel and creating customized personalized engagement is very easy especially with Insider's wide range of ready-to-use templates which are already optimized for a range of scenarios and user segments. The gamified templates from Insider work extremely well for boosting engagement on the web and we've seen an increase in retention metrics and average session duration from these campaigns. To top it all off, the account management team is always available to consult and they also provide strategic tips on how we can optimize our campaigns and deliver personalization that stands out. But it's not only about providing us with best practices, they're also  helpful in understanding our ideas and helping us implement these ideas using the tools available on the platform. The best mix of creativity and technology.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've observed some technical glitches with the banner management feature on some campaigns, and although the team at Insider was quick to resolve these issues so that we did not face any delays in going live, we believe there is room for improvement.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you are looking for a great partnership, Insider is one of the best in the market in terms of rendering services. Not everything relies on technology, but also a tad of human touch is essential to be able to make things work.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main KPI was to offer personalized experiences onsite to our customers, targeting them with content that was relevant and contextual to their behavior. Once we started using Insider, we realized that we could A/B test various personalization scenarios and track the performance through control groups. We're also using Insider's gamified templates to create excitement and boost engagement on our website, and we've observed a significant increase in incremental revenue from these. Insider's dynamic web push is another feature we are using to send targeted messages to segmented audiences. What we've observed is a higher ROI from these campaigns as these targeted messaging generates more conversions as compared to the general engagements.

all_reviews.review_title: A one-point solution for delivering integrated cross-channel customer journeys!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's user panel allows us to build and deliver highly personalized campaigns even if the complexity involved is high. What we really admire about Insider is the feature where we can create automated journeys that target specific user segments with individualized content across the user lifecycle. The platform also works great at driving cross-channel engagement, from engaging website visitors through web push notifications to continuing the journey across email, ad-channels. All of this is possible because insider's segmentation tools are effective at tracking onsite behavior and segmenting users based on their preferences.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've observed a few bugs related to production at times, but we've never had to face any delays on account of these.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before we started using Insider, our tech-stack was spread across different tools and there was no real-time data integration between our various marketing efforts since these tools operated in silos. It was also a big challenge for us to drive meaningful omnichannel experiences as there was no single platform from where we could orchestrate holistic customer journeys. With Insider we got a single-point tool which provided us engagement across channels, further enhanced by their AI-powered recommendations and segmentation features. What we realized was that we no longer had to engage customers one channel at a time, we could automate the engagement and build remarkable customer journey models that would follow users across their lifetime journey across multiple touchpoints with our brand. By using a combination of web-push journeys and email engagement, we were able to significantly improve our key metrics and optimize retention.

Highly recommend this platform for others looking to optimize their UX.

all_reviews.review_title: An effective tool for optimizing web engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The most impressive things about Insider are their Web Push feature and Smart Recommender engine, but the thing that sets Insider apart is that they not only provide the technology but also the support and have an active account management process.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We would like to see Insider's panel become available for the mobile platform as well. Since we update our web push content in real-time, it would be easy to be able to do it from a smartphone as well.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of our top focus was to improve the traffic to our website. We were looking for ways to increase page views and pages per session, which is when we decided to try out a POC with Insider. We soon realized that Insider's web push turned out to be a major driver for generating traffic. We also observed that our web push opt-in rate was higher than the industry average. We also made use of their exit-intent technology to improve our retention rates and paired it with Smart Recommender which greatly improved our pageviews. We saw an uplift of 8.73% in our sessions using these features.

The ability of Insider's products to adapt quickly and innovate based on the digital trends is something we love about the platform. The professional support from their account management team, the ease of use and more importantly the advanced personalization scenarios that are made possible has helped us design some highly performing campaigns that are individualized to each users preferences. One of their products, InStory is something that has helped us drive some really spectacular results. We've been able to deliver social-media-like experiences on the desktop and mobile web and coupled with their advanced segmentation features, we were able to target niche audiences with high performing personalized content.

As a digital commerce partner of enterprise companies our business goals are to increase our revenue and deliver value to our customers through our marketing engagements. By leveraging Insider's platform we've been able to considerably improve our MRR and Insider has ensured that we alway have their hands-on support whenever required. all_reviews.review_title: As a marketing tool, INSIDER has a complete and useful set of features and templates.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's Smart Recommender. The AI powered engine was able to provide visitors a better onboarding experience, shortening the product discovery time. Then there is the hands-on approach of the accounts team, where they provide us with valuable and insightful suggestions on how we can optimize our campaigns for the best results.

I have to say it with all my heart.
It is very helpful when your company has so many products for customers to choose and you want to show as complete as you can.

What do you dislike about Insider?
1. Not a fully translated panel, we need to spend some time to pick it up. That being said the panel is easy to navigate and standard across regions which means once we get a hang of it, it's a breeze to work on it.

2. the speed of the website makes the process not so fluently. (perhaps the reason is that they have too many tools combined together.)

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
As I say above,Insider team provide not only professional marketing tools,
but also their useful & creative point of view to help you .
It's very grateful for our company to be one of their partner.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We successfully lowered our bounce rate and reduced drop-offs across our customer's life cycle. In general, with Insider's smart recommender, we have a steady average monthly CR uplift of 15%. Our next step with Insider would be Instory. With only launching the feature 14 days, we were able to shorten product discovery time for our visitors. Successfully brought a good amount of incremental revenue and generated 31% of AOV uplift.

If you are seeking marketing tools and wanting to achieve some professional advice,Insider will be your best partner and consultant.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to  grow your business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The product itself and the way Insider accounting team works. They analyze current metrics of the site and provide great expertise in terms of recommendation engine and personalization. Also we really like the fact that we can see the results almost the same moment we implement new Insider's technology.

What do you dislike about Insider?
In our case there is nothing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you think of trying Insider just set some testing period for yourself, for example 6 month. Believe me, it worth testing. Usually you can see first results already in 2-3 weeks after the integration.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Main KPI was to increase CR rate and see the ROI. Before Insider, we were using standard recommendation technology. These old recommendations were not satisfying for us, as they had only two blocks (main page and product) and had no algorithms' logic behind and  they were not generating good amount of revenue as well as CR was low. We did an A/B test of our old recommendations VS Insider's ones. We started working with Insider's recommendations by testing different algorithms for blocks to get to the one performing better. The result was awesome - ROI 387x.
We've already worked with Insider's personalization product before the test, and it showed fantastic results as well.

all_reviews.review_content:

We find it very comfortable to use Insider by ourselves, and also make use of their segmentation to deliver just the kind of personalized and engaging content that we create to each and every individual user. Also, the pace of working with Insider from planning to actual execution of campaigns is smooth, quick, and easy.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes the statistics for certain campaigns we run with cross-channel tools are not available and we need to use data studio. Which we think is not really much to dislike.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've always wanted to build a sustainable traffic flow from our owned channels. One of the ways we wanted to achieve this was through creating unique customer journeys that covered cross-channel touchpoints. Insider has the right tool for this - Architect. Using this we've been able to engage our users with web push notifications, and the traffic from these has the 2nd highest engagement after organic traffic. The automated push using Architect has enabled us to realize almost 7X uplift in CTR as compared to manual push notifications. To top it all, the support from their dedicated local team is definitely a deal-maker!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's segmentation and AI-infused journey builder tools really help marketers create unique customer journeys across channels in a seamless manner. When we combine this with their various products for web, mobile web and app what you get is an amazing tool that has you covered for any situation. What we like best is the all-inclusive nature of their platform.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Barring a few delays in going-live with some campaigns, everything works perfectly, it would be unfair to say we dislike a particular aspect about their platform. It's one of the best performing tools we've used so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our goal was to create these omnichannel experiences that meet each user's individual requirements. all_reviews.review_title: The support has been phenomenal!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
One of the challenges that we had was getting the customer to understand the product nature of ACE hardware. And with Insider we could do that, reach different segments of the market and target customers in multiple ways, though recommendation, app notifications and many other channels throughout their journey. It wasn't just about giving the customers offers or incentives, but actually persuading them to take the next step and complete the purchase! These challenges were addressed by Insider and we have seen many positive results and we wouldn't have been able to do it with other vendors.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I wouldn't say dislike, but maybe something I hope to have, I have seen the gamification module that you offer, I would say that I would have hated not to have it. We have ideas as a business and we want to bring it to life and we wanted to be done right away and i really wish that you could have a team that can customize what we want, so i wish you had a team that can take our ideas and convert it into reality and just give it to us  which you are doing now in a more structured way. I would say it is a negative thing just a wish.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before we started using the push notifications and creating these segments we had seen that the conversion rates from the abandoned carts rate has increased and we had 30% increase in open rate through push notifications and also conversion from that push has been great, so we are getting from that 30% open rate, roughly 15 to 20 conversions from one single push which is a very high number for us in that sense and these notifications are segmented, it is not a bulk push. So from that one push, within 4 hours we had roughly around 20 people buying that item! And not just that, we had people coming to the store asking for that one item that they saw in the push and that is because of the nature of the product, they wanted to see if it would fit their house. So we managed to bridge the gap between online and offline and it all came from that one push!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
One of the things that really impressed us about Insider was its unified data layer. We can segment users based on past, real-time and predicted behavioural and use it on any channel. We like that they focus on constant development to meet customer demands. Also I definitely need to mention the role of our growth consultants at Insider. They always help us.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes it is really needed to see more local language support on their interface but on the whole everything is pretty good

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
With Insider you will be able to continuously optimize experiences both on desktop, mobile website and in mobile apps with no extra IT effort and the integration process literally takes minutes which can  save quite a bit of time and effort.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main issues we faced were increasing conversion rate, activating users (in other words, developing omnichannel) and working on the Sportmaster brand in the direction of a pro-sports retailer. It was important to convey to customers that Sportmaster is a store for everyone: here you can buy both goods for everyday use and professional equipment.
One of the ways to solve these problems for us was to implement personalization on the desktop, on the mobile web, as well as personalization and push notifications in the mobile application. In particular, I can highlight the work with Insider technology for mobile applications. A good example is the campaign launched for the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia.

all_reviews.review_title: A powerful customer engagement tool for the airline industry
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As an airlines brand, it was a tricky time during the COVID-19 lockdown period, we were short on resources and manpower - but Insider stepped forward to support our urgent requests and helped us simply some of our campaigns suggested various workaround and alternatives for implementing our campaigns on both web and mobile app. What we like most about Insider is their sense of partnership and desire to help us when times are tough, even though they don't need to go the extra mile, they do!

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes our campaigns face some glitches, and we would like to see some more automated scenarios for Facebook - but we've not really seen any grave issues to dislike anything about the platform.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
During this time of the global lockdown, our only goal was to do the best we can with our limited resources and wanted to improve the engagement on our web and mobile app. With Insider's help, our traffic is in the top 3, and in terms of revenue, we are in the top 5 among airlines in the region. We've also been using Insider's personalization tools to improve the engagement across our channels as well and their web push, email, and InStory features.

Insider stepped right in and filled that gap and we really love the support we receive from Insider's local teams. Insider's deep segmentation is another feature we love in their products, not to mention the A/B testing feature that is data-driven and which has helped us deliver true personalization in our engagements.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Insider's panel takes some getting used to, however, it's really unfair to point it out as a negative, since the range of features and analytics it has is amazing. Plus there's active support in helping us navigate the panel.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our goal was to automate much of our marketing efforts and integrate a powerful personalization tool into our mix. Some of our challenges were around automating our push notifications and being able to segment our user profiles. With insider, not only were we able to automate our push notifications, but we could now target our users with highly personalized engagement using insider's powerful segmentation feature. We achieved an open rate of 18.94% on our push notifications, which is much higher than our industry benchmarks. The results we've realized so far, is nothing short of remarkable.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We're just getting started with all the tools and solutions that Insider has to offer, so far there is nothing we dislike.

As a result, we were able to improve on our key metrics as well as improve customer engagement on our site. We love the results we are seeing.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helps our website to generate more traffic and conversions and enhance / customize UX
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
When we started working with Insider our goal was to improve our ecommerce arm. By using Insider's mobile and desktop web personalization tools, web push notifications, smart recommendation and triggered emails, we quickly achieved 6X ROI !

We are working with an operational account manager, who makes sure to activate each campaign that we want to implement on our website in a timely manner, with any customized specifications added if needed. However, if we want to create campaigns ourselves, Insider's dashboard is super simple and quite easy to use (the pre-packaged templates are very helpful). It's also possible and easy to track and follow live results of our campaign directly in the dashboard.

We are also working with a business account manager, who has been awesome: he helps us optimize our cross-channel campaigns with frequent business recommandations and is always listening and anticipating our needs. In consequence, our results keep increasing month after month !

What do you dislike about Insider?
We had some difficulties at the very beginning of the partnership with an operational account manager, but Insider quickly reacted and found a solution that positively overcame our expectations. Otherwise, there is nothing to dislike.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Insider, we can resolve UX issues (on all devices), enhance the visibility of important promotions and best-selling products, create and analyze A/B testing scenarios and test new ways of communicating and engaging with customers. As a result, Insider contributes to generate more traffic and conversions, as well as quickly create innovative campaigns that make us ahead of our competitors. Moreover, Insider keeps us informed of regular product updates, industry reports, live support and regional insight which help us being aware of our own business and industry's opportunities.

all_reviews.review_title: Experience using insider in marketing development
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We love Insider's customer data processing and consolidation feature, it is really a hub for customer data across platforms and channels. And it's not just about data, Insider's platform has all the tools a marketer needs to engage customers across all these channels and platforms.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Navigation can be a bit tricky sometimes but they also have round the clock assistance to help us with this.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The traffic to our website and mobile web has shown significant growth in the recent months, and we wanted a marketing solution that would enable us to optimize the user experience for our visitors, optimize each user's journey across our channels and engage them individually. We realized Insider's web suite had the perfect solutions for this. One challenge along the way was to get users to opt-in to our web push, easier said than done, but in reality, after using Insider we realized an opt-in rate of 9.3% which was better than the benchmark for our industry. Amazing tool really!

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool with the personalized support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Undoubtedly the best thing about Insider is the personalized support we get from their team. This kind of support is just as amazing as their personalization platform that helped us engage our users across different channels with unique and personalized experiences.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It's hard to find something to dislike when you have a support account manager who helps you with all your concerns and questions.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is a great tool to target customer segments with personalized messaging. We've found this to be extremely effective in driving sales. We recommend talking to their account managers to understand what works best for you.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Insider's web personalization, mobile web personalization, web push and InStory product. We use InStory as a new tool for interaction with users, as our brand always keeps up to date and introduces the most modern technologies not only in fashion design, but also on our website. InStory allows us to share the latest news about new arrivals and fashion collaborations, highlight promotional items, as well as different delivery options.This is a great tool and in addition with their predictive segmentation, we can actually predict and engage those users who are most likely to purchase from us. We had the benefit of improving our metrics and also optimize our strategies and make them more efficient.

all_reviews.review_title: It's a great platform for digital engagement across all channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We have been working with Insider for more than 4 years. During this time Insider team became not just usual contractors, but real partners with whom we shared all our ups and downs. The thing we really appreciate is the support of their partner success team. They really help to build strategy to engage our users and personalize their experience across different channels.

What do you dislike about Insider?
During these years of course we had some concerns, but mostly everything was fixed in a short time.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Don't limit yourself by using just one product. Insider platform enables to connect customer data across channels and systems and offers the widest set of product feature which impact ROI metrics such as conversion rate, CAC, LTV, and average order value

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating a consistent and relevant experience for our audience across our different channels was our biggest struggle. After we started using Insider we learnt how we could design custom journeys for all our users engaging them at all the right touch points. We use almost all products Insider has. We use web personalization, mobile web personalization, web push, mobile app product and many more. Using Insider's web push notification technology we are able to bring site visitors who have not yet completed their purchase back to the site. Using Mobile App Api push technology developed by Insider, we were able to effectively send messages targeted at the right audience during World Cup 2018, thus significantly increasing engagement and session duration. Too many things to mention.

all_reviews.review_title: Effective tool to help you increase your AOV and deliver great multichannel experience to customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The highlight about using Insider is their dedicated account management team - which means that we get dedicated and custom support based on our specific needs. Another great thing is their unique A/B testing feature which works amazingly well and we've been able to increase our AOV by testing variations we never thought possible.

What do you dislike about Insider?
When we ask for the customization that requires lots of additional changes, the timeline involved is high, which creates a problem when we run time-sensitive and urgent campaigns. If we plan this in advance, it solves the problem but it may not always be possible.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the primary things that we wanted to focus on was improving our AOV and also delivering a great customer experience across channels such as email, web push, ads, sms, etc. We found just the solution that we were looking for in Insider's A/B testing feature - which has enabled us to test variations of campaigns and find out which contribute to the highest AOV. We've also been able to improve our app downloads using personalized campaigns and offers on web push. And what really helped us is that we could test all these scenarios with Insider before going live, helping us prepare and execute better.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to increase traffic and AOV by enhancing UX
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Management team is great that they reply promptly and is helpful in solving problems in terms of the setting up all the campaigns.

Tool is brilliant in driving traffic by enhancing UX. It also provides lead generation pop-up, which is especially helpful for member acquisition.

They also provide useful suggestions/campaigns within the monthly meeting base, providing market trends/useful examples of their clients' campaigns.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I would say the insider dashboard is great, however, it could be more user-friendly. They do have a number of pre-set templates, but the variety is limited. For example, often there are times when the banner requires customization, and as I work in an industry with a very tight schedules, their management team may not be able to provide me with what I need within the given time period. It would be great if a tutorial could be provided on the CSS settings for my handling in any future upcoming campaigns.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the past, it was impossible to communicate with different onsite visitors. With the insider tool, it is possible to communicate to a specific segment by using web push notifications or to even customize their onsite experiences (I.e. banner).

Furthermore, it is up to the web developer needs to adjust the launch date and time for the banner. With the insider tool, it can pre-set the timer and launch it at a specific time which is helpful in minimizing delays and efforts from my web development team.

Insider has one of the most novel and engaging features to show recommendations. The InStory is a great way to recommend categories that you want to promote on your mobile website using instagram-like stories that stay on the top. The product is easy to configure and give a feel-good presence on the website.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We've faced some issues on their recommendations feature, particularly when it comes to updating our catalog. Some of the products that are recommended are out of stock- looking forward to their team resolving this sync-issue.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our objective was to deliver a more engaging online experience to our customers. We also wanted to improve on the engagement metrics and conversions - InStory recommendations proved to be a great way to recommend our top trending products as well as gain visibility among our customers. Smart recommender has increased CR by 35% on mobile main page. We're also evaluating to expand the Insider collaboration in the long term.

That's when Insider came along and we absolutely loved being able to consolidate all our requirements in one place. The product capabilities of the growth management platform is amazing and operates smoothly even under a lot of load. Having all our data and strategies in one tool is what we got from Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider helped us optimize our Advertising costs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The product we are using is Predict Ad Audience which helped us optimize our returns from advertising spend. It's helps marketers by predicting customers likely to churn, customers with a high likelihood to purchase, conversion range, lifecycle stage and all that. We were told that PAA will help us improve our Returns on Ad Spend by targeting only those users who are most likely to convert, but we believed it when the numbers came through.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We don't fully understand how this works from a layman's perspective, but it's AI so it's not as simple as it sounds. Overall, we are highly satisfied with this product, so not much to dislike.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
This particular product helped us segment our target audience more accurately by targeting only those with the highest possibility to convert. So, instead of blindly throwing money at the problem, we were able to focus our ad budgets for Facebook and Google more effectively. By targeting users who are more likely to make a purchase, we significantly improved our returns from ads.

all_reviews.review_title: We combined web push and location based targeting for superior user experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We find Insider's web push notification feature really helpful and easy to use. The level of personalization and customization that is possible is beyond any other tool that we've used so far. Combining this feature with location-based targeting is another strategy we implemented and this gave us stellar results. Another great feature is their conversion suite- which is a must have if you are looking for conversion rate optimization.

What do you dislike about Insider?
They have a lot of products and features- which makes it difficult to understand the use-cases. Most of the product names on the platform doesn't make sense to us and is confusing to know what they are used for.  Also editing variation is not easy to use as much as the platform itself.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the things that we wanted to focus on was reaching out to customers on mobile and desktop web but within specific locations. We found both these available in Insider's platform. We made use of their tailored push templates to send personalized product recommendations to customers from our platform. Furthermore, since we also want to promote specific products at specific locations, we combined this with insider's location-based targeting feature to promote said products to users within a geo-fence area.

all_reviews.review_title: Endless Personalization Possibilities with Automated Customer Journeys
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Insider's products help us create many scenarios, which would have taken our developers a lot more time to implement themselves.

Their managers and accounts specialists are a good source of information and have helped us realize a number of campaigns. This has made the completion of complex projects much easier.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We often receive answers and corrections to scenarios in the evening, which means that the scenarios are completed with a 24-hour delay. We wait for some responses even longer, e.g. monthly reports.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Cupsell is an ecommerce marketplace that supports entrepreneurs to reach the right audience with the right messages. For this we need to be agile and react to real time scenarios without depending on developers for UX updates.

With Insider's Desktop and Mobile push notifications, we were able to promote our shops, their individual designs, new promotions and products collections.

After using a bunch of online marketing tools I was really surprised that Insider delivers on their promise.

In order to test the changes one makes in the panel, you have to remember to "generate" the new version of API.
They should automate this

Test, Test, Test - launch and retest
Thats the best way to get most of this tool

all_reviews.review_title: Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best part about the Insider's Ad tool is being able to target users who are most likely to enage with the ad. This way you don't end up with an inflated Ad budget. The product is Predict Ad Audience. By predicting users such as most likely to churn, most likely to purchase and other factors, marketers can spend the Ad budgets more wisely.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There's not engogh resource material around this. Would love to see some more self-help content to understand how this works better.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
What we needed was a solution that helped us target users more effectively with our Ads. Insider made sure our Ads were targeting only those users who are most likely to convert, which helped us with accurate audience segmentation. Our ad budgets for Facebook and Google were used more effectively. We saw a significant improvement in our returns from ads by targeting users who were most likely to make a purchase. We were a bit unsure if this would be effective, but the numbers proved us wrong.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful web marketing tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing we like about Insider is how easy it is to get started and the adequate support that we get from our account manager to help us understand how to use the platform.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We would like to have an overall better usability of the panel, but understand from our Account Manager that this is in progress of improvement.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider's web suite is a great tool for all your web marketing requirements. But we recommend a detailed talk with your account manager over going blindly with the tools. They can help you choose the right set of product features to tackle your problems. We really liked what we've seen so far.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our most challenging issue was driving conversions and improving revenue. With Insider's web suite, we were able to significantly improve engagement on our website with web push campaigns. We achieved an average 2X conversion rate improvement from web push automations after using Insider. We also noticed our opt-in rate improved to over 19% during the partnership.

all_reviews.review_title: Robust tool for improving engagement on proptech website
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We were looking for a mobile and web suite that would help us improve our performance on our listing pages and app downloads, as it is vital that we retain customers through their journey of home-buying and engage them so that they complete an enquiry. Insider's suite of tools, especially the smart banner product and A/B test options, allowed us to do just that.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The current templates are pre-built with certain design options but do not allow for further customisation. We've sent our feedback to Insider and hope to see this implemented soon so that our design system can further integrate with Insider.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
It's a great tool to improve your web and app metrics and the results are visible within a few weeks. It was great that we had a dedicated account manager to discuss and bounce ideas with before proceeding with choosing the right solution for the right problem,

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were trying to find ways to improve the engagement on our website search page and also improve our app downloads. Our biggest challenge was plugging user drop-offs on our search page which required us to provide more personalized engagement.

With Insider's web suite, we were able to personalize our webpage based on user behavior using banner management, web push notifications and organic pushes to incentivise app downloads. Our CTRs increased by 8.7% from this strategy. Additionally, our app downloads have also improved, with a 30% uplift in app downloads MoM.

all_reviews.review_title: Using Carousel Push for greater engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We started using Insider's Carousel Push to redefine the mobile experience for our app users and the results were better than expected. This led us to check out other products from their platform and see how we could use them going forward.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We don't have any complaints with the products we are using right now, but it would be great to see their documentation become available in more regional languages.
Recommendations to others considering the product
Since we used the platform extensively for our mobile app requirements, we can confidently suggest Insider's mobile app suite as a great tool for out-of-the-box mobile app marketing. Especially tools like Carousel Push helped us take our push notifications to the next level.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The engagement on our Push Notifications was below average. The standard push notification with the small app icons and text would often be lost in the notification tray among other notifications. Using Insider's Carousel Mobile App push we greatly improved the clicks we got from push notifications. The ability to showcase multiple products in the same notification served us really well for our cart reminder campaigns, and we were able to reduce our cart abandonment by more than 20%.

all_reviews.review_title: The first preference to drive conversion rates with data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
In the case that the traffic dividend gradually disappears, how to increase the conversion rate becomes a problem that marketing personnel must solve.

INSIDER enables us to use the behavior of consumers on the website to give more accurate information, thereby enhancing the consumer's desire to purchase, in addition to the system marketing staff of Insider can record the actual data of each result. Let these data drive the next marketing campaign to achieve better results, form a healthy circle, and finally let the brand understand what consumers need, and continue to communicate with consumers.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Give some suggestions at the operation interface
First
Not every marketing person has a technical background. In the operation of the system, I hope that there will be more flexibility or a more complete educational program, so that each user can get familiar with the system more quickly.

Second
Every employee working in the insider has the professional knowledge and enthusiasm, so that the partners feel the pressure to constantly improve.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
For the brand, many consumers enter my website every day, we are eager to interact with consumers, but at first we can only give the same message to all consumers.

The first thing that insider solves for us is that we can decide the best message for her based on the different behaviors of consumers.
This makes consumers feel that the brand knows her preferences and knows his needs, and then trusts the brand.

The platform has helped us in engaging each customer in a much personalized manner according to their preferences and needs. And what makes it even better is that the platform makes use of the data from our website to predict customer behavior with accuracy. All this combined creates a greater package to boost conversion and ROI throughout the conversion funnel.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Sometimes the option to customize our messaging with specific colors or themes that we are looking for is not available. We could be more impactful if their templates could match our brand theme accurately.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
The goal was to improve our engagement metrics and improve our conversion rates, but our existing technology did not allow us to personalize our messaging beyond a certain degree. When we evaluated Insider, we found a tool that addressed each of our challenges. We used Insider's segmentation technology to effectively target each customer with personalized messaging that was relevant to their needs. We saw an improvement in our CTRs and average session durations which also resulted in greater conversions and lower cart abandonment. Great tool!
