all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
This is a great tool that worked brilliantly for us in terms of engaging mobile web users. While there are many options for mobile app engagement, there are few platforms like Insider that focus on mobile engagement as a whole. We leveraged it to build our promotion campaign with 'Scratch to Win Coupon' product. It created a more engaging gamified experience as compared to our usual promotion campaign and we loved it!

What do you dislike about Insider?
Nothing because so far all the features have been working great for us. And their customer support is commendable.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
By creating gamified experiences for the users, we were able to engage them better which was not happening with the previous promotion style that we were using. Using 'Scratch and Win' we build a curiosity in the users. Once they win their unique coupon, they are more likely to use their personalized coupon in the same session. And this led to a rise in our overall sales as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Great product!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The best thing about Insider is their Net Promoter Score (NPS) feature which has enabled us to understand the satisfaction level of our customers. We found that our retargeting strategies were not doing well mainly because we were not aware of how customers felt about using our product. With Insider's NPS we got vital feedback and were able to target customers based on their feedback and improve our retargeting metric.

What do you dislike about Insider?
Not a lot of option to personalize the NPS to match with our brand's theme. Would love to see some more options.
Recommendations to others considering the product
Insider's NPS tool is one of the best in the market. So if you're looking for ways to understand what customers are thinking about your brand, then go with Insider. Hands down.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been trying to understand customers' opinion about our products. Having this information was vital as it would help us target our customer better. While evaluating different solutions that showed potential we found NPS by Insider. This was great and worked perfectly for our need. After using NPS we started seeing immediate results, we were able to target customers more effectively with personalized messaging. We also saw an improvement in repeat purchases as a result of this. Definitely great for getting customer feedback.

all_reviews.review_title: Driving repeat purchases with cross-sell and up-sell
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
Getting users to convert for the first time is great, but we also wanted to drive repeat purchases on our website. We realized the best way to go about this was to engage in cross-selling and up-selling strategies. Insider's powerful, AI-backed recommendation engine--Smart Recommender--was crucial in helping us achieve this. Based on multiple user-behavior touchpoints, the Smart Recommender delivered highly relevant recommendations to users and the results were amazing. For instance, during our 11.11 sale, we were able to see an increase of almost 25% for our conversion rate in just one week.The tool worked perfectly, so there was nothing to be disappointed about. However, because of the nature of how recommendation engines first require user behavior to start delivering relevant content, there was an initial delay before things were up to speed.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The tool worked perfectly, so there was nothing to be disappointed about. However, because of the nature of how recommendation engines first require user behavior to start delivering relevant content, there was an initial delay before things were up to speed.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were trying to tackle the low-engagement and dormant user challenge. With Smart Recommender we were able to engage our users to take the step from browsing to purchasing--all because they received more relevant and personalized offers.

Insider provided us with a method to track these instances and with its GMP we were able to re-engage with these customers over email, Facebook and Google ads and more.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It took a little more time than expected to implement recovery techniques.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
If you are looking to re-engage with lost mobile users, Insider is amazing. Because it's not just meant for mobile marketing but also can communicate with users over push, email, web and more, you have a lot of opportunities to win back your lost mobile-app users.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking to find out who uninstalled our app and what was the problem and since Insider did that and also provided us ways to re-engage with our customers. We were able to do both monitoring and finding a solution for our problems.

all_reviews.review_title: Great account management support from a highly knowledgable & responsive team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
We are very happy with the level of support we receive from the customer success team.  Their industry knowledge really helps us in creating effective campaigns that best engage our customers.  Plus the quick turn around time for each campaign to go live ensures we stay on top of customer trends.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It is a difficulty question because we are very satisfied with Insider hence having had them as supplier for the last 2 years! However, to answer the question, artwork design might be a weakness Insider could improve. This is not their core business so it has never been an issue for us at all. We use our own in house design team to provide all the branded elements Insider might request. That way, we are sure that the high quality standard we are imposing to our brand is consistent across all platforms.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider's growth platform was very easy to integrate with our website and having multiple features that cover different channels, allows us to have a dynamic approach to our marketing activities.  Insider's account support makes things hassle free and helps us to get the most out of our mobile-first engagement.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Insider's intelligent customer segmentation capabilities, we have been able to effectively send the most relevant messages to the right target segment at optimal times.  That level of personalization helps in creating a more engaging and tailored experience for each of our customers. Having such a deep understanding of our customer segmentation also allows us to learn more about which stage of the funnel each customer is currently in and how to best communicate with them.  This has really helped our bottom line and also lowered our churn rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Reduced hiccups in Customer Lifecycle progression quite a bit
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
With Insider's Mobile-first Growth Management Platform, we were able to shorten the window for crucial decisions in the customer's lifecycle in our favor, by quite a bit. Insider has a predictive AI engine that segments users based on their actions, locations, history, and browsing activity. This allowed us to pinpoint the crucial stages our customers were stuck at. We were able to act on them and made sure that the customer progressed to the next stage.

What do you dislike about Insider?
It's an amazing platform with a lot of potential, but since it's the first in its space, I felt that there could a lot of fine tuning that can make this product go a long way.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is very simple to use and yet intuitive. You don't need a team of developers to integrate the product into your stack. Within minutes Insider's team does the job for you.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since Insider directly left its mark on our customer lifecycle, we were able to see lower churns, and more customer engagement with us. We were able to make crucial business decisions and strategy calls based on the data Insider provided us as well as the campaigns we deployed using Insider.

all_reviews.review_title: Once we knew where we were losing, we had all the power to fix it
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
What we loved the most it Insider's App Uninstall Analytics feature that helped us monitor the number of our mobile app uninstalls by our users on different devices and OS. This provided us with a direction to work. We understood we had to work on user retention more than anything

What do you dislike about Insider?
For the reporting; app platform's and web platform's reports could be in the same dashboard.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
It's definitely the best mobile software out there. It's easy to use makes it possible for any digital marketer or app owner to make sense of the metrics and direct their focus on the crucial aspects like mobile app retention which usually goes missing. Insider, not only highlights where your mobile app is lacking but also provides the solution to fix it with its features like in-app feedback, personalized surveys, visitor segmentation and so on. We don't see any reason not to recommend it to all the digital marketers.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our app uninstalls were very high which made it clear that we had to work on our user retention techniques. We leveraged many Insider's features like in-app feedback and smart incentives with contextual 1:1 communication for all the users to improve retention. Those who had recently uninstalled our app were re-targeted with FB ads. In the end, we could see all these efforts paying off. Within a months time, we could see the number of apps uninstalls dropping and conversion rates rising.

all_reviews.review_title: A great tool for the digital newsroom
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
As a news company with a solid user base, we expect secure and fast delivery on our push notifications. With Insider, the push sending speed is excellent as we are able to send millions of users our breaking news in seconds.

What do you dislike about Insider?
There could be more visibility into the data, especially for predictive segmentation and interest clustering reports.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider is an easy to use personalization platform that includes a wide range of features that are certain to make a positive impact on customers experiences. If you need to improve the user experience on youe webpage or mobile app, your segmentation processes, user targeting and marketing strategy and want to see your visitor base's actions and flow, then Insider is the product you need.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the main problems we have solved is the amount of customer feedback we receive, the engaging and timely customer surveys on our webpage have provided us with a wealth of data which we are able to use to optimize user experience. We were able to prioritize contents for our editors and locate those that are actually wanted by our readers.

all_reviews.review_title: Humanized connection with our customers through data insights
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The level of personalization we are able to achieve with Insider is quite amazing. We are able to deliver hyper-personalized experiences to micro segments of app users based on their historical and behavioural data in real time. We are able to engage and delight our customers through 1:1 messages, product recommendations and gamified promotions that are truly tailored for them. We feel like we know our customers better.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I don't have anything negative to say about the product, perhaps the reports could be more detailed.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Insider has a robust technology and smart algorithms behind all its features which makes their segmentation powerful. I believe this is the real differentiator compared to the other personalization tools I've used before. If you want to personalise your marketing strategy to build a connection with customers, this product delivers brilliantly. Definitely would recommend Insider as we've seen huge improvements in all of our important metrics including push open rates, retention, conversions and AOV.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to personalise our communication to make our customers feel more valued and build a relationship that didn't exist previously which has led to improved customer activity and repeat transactions through our mobile channels.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider is a Complete Solution for Web and App Conversion Optimization.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The smart prompts that we have implemented through Insider (e.g. urgency messaging for low stock items, building credibility and signalling demand through social proof messaging of how many people have bought items before) have helped us to improve engagement and conversion rates. They also offer push formats that I had never seen before (carousel push, discovery push, push notification followed by dedicated in-app messages etc.) which have done a great job for engagement and pushing up CTRs. Lastly, since we use insider across platforms we can leverage user data across platforms (e.g. send an app push notification based on abandoned cart on the web) - very powerful platform.

What do you dislike about Insider?
The account management team is great but we would really like a detailed FAQ so that we can do more by ourselves. The UI of the panel can probably be improved and be more user friendly (again, would be easier to use with a good FAQ that helps us figure things out by ourselves).


What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
One business problem we were experiencing was the ability to engage our app browsers and convert them into customers and make sure we don't lose them after the install. Insider has helped us achieve this in many ways through boosting overall engagement within our app. Our app now features product recommendations, rich push notifications, an on-boarding journey, social proof, in-app notifications, and 1:1 messages to name just a few.

all_reviews.review_title: Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?

Insider's web and mobile web suites create the most personalised customer experiences one can offer their visitors on their digital channels. Their predictive technology allows us to leverage real-time predictive data in an intelligent and impactful way, helping us optimize our ad budgets and reach out to customers with only relevant content, which boosted conversions and site engagement. Because they offer solutions addressed to all stages of the sales funnel. We're now able to deliver personalised and consistent experiences on both desktop web and mobile web. Even though their features are user-friendly and super easy to integrate, Insider has 24/7 management teams that provide us with full-time support, attending to our specific needs.

What do you dislike about Insider?
We didn't dislike much, if we had to choose something we'd say the design could be improved a bit.

Recommendations to others considering Insider:
Probably the best desktop web and mobile web suites out there as they allow us to communicate with our customers through a wide range of personalisation tools that suit their very individual needs.

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
While we thought we knew our customers' needs very well, the ability to observe the performance of personalization scenarios we design for our web and mobile web in real time changed the way we deliver experiences, for sure. Our online channels have literally been transformed, from simple and not very engaging, especially in regards to our messaging strategies, to higher traffic numbers and a boost of returning users. We've noticed higher retention, more engagement with our channels, since we were targeting customers with only content that was relevant to their interests, and an overall steady flow of visitors.

all_reviews.review_title: We know our customers and app users better than ever thanks to Insider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insider?
The predictive segments aspect of the technology implemented by Insider is impressive. We can use these segments in Adwords. We only show our ads to those users and customers who are more likely to buy, using the likelihood to convert segment provided through the platform. This helps us use our ad budget more wisely and improves our customer acquisition costs.

What do you dislike about Insider?
I don't dislike anything in particular, but additional demographic targeting would potentially improve this product.
Recommendations to others considering buying the product

Insider is a great app growth platform, we've seen so many aspects of this product improve our marketing strategy and more importantly our business margins in such a short space of time!

What problems is Insider solving and how is that benefiting you?
Predicting a user's likelihood to purchase is an extremely important aspect of marketing that was not being applied effectively in our previous mobile app marketing strategies. Through using Insider we have gained a better understanding of our app users and potential future customers. Our business has benefited greatly from the features of this product which has enabled us to increase conversions and improve our customer lifetime value.
